[sujeto(['The', induction, of, 'CYP2B', gene, expression, by, phenobarbital, '(', 'PB)', is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, translocation, of, the, constitutive, androstane, receptor, '(', 'CAR)', from, the, cytoplasm, to, the, nucleus])].
[sujeto(['The', 'CAR/RXR', heterodimer]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, two, 'DR-4', sites, in, a, complex, phenobarbital, responsive, unit, '(', 'PBRU)', in, the, 'CYP2B', gene])].
[sujeto(['The', short, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP),', an, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, lacks, a, conventional, 'DNA', binding, 'domain,', was, initially, identified, by, its, interaction, with, 'CAR'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, the, role, of, 'SHP', in, 'CAR-mediated', transactivation, of, the, 'CYP2B', gene])].
[sujeto(['Coexpression', of, 'SHP']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, transactivation, of, the, 'CYP2B', gene, by, 'CAR', in, cultured, hepatoma, cells, and, the, p160, coactivator, 'GRIP1', reversed, the, inhibition])].
[sujeto(['SHP', did, not, block, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, either, 'CAR/RXR', to, the, 'PBRU', or, binding, of, 'GRIP1', to, the, 'CAR/RXR', complex, in, gel, mobility, shift, 'assays,', but, slightly, increased, 'CAR/RXR', binding, and, slightly, altered, the, mobility, of, the, 'CAR/RXR/GRIP1', 'complex,', suggesting, an, interaction, of, 'SHP', with, these, complexes])].
[sujeto(['Recombinant', corepressors, 'mSin3A,', 'SMRT,', and, 'HDAC1,', but, not, 'NCoR1,']), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, 'GST-SHP', but, each, of, these, corepressors, in, liver, nuclear, extracts, bound, to, 'GST-SHP'])].
[sujeto(['SMRT', and, 'NCoR1']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['CAR-mediated', activation, independent, of, 'SHP,', but, mSin3A, and, 'HDAC1', had, little, effect, 'alone,', and, were, additive, with, 'SHP'])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, demonstrate, that, 'SHP', does, not]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['CAR-mediated', 'trans-activation', by, interfering, with, 'DNA', binding, or, by, competition, with, 'GRIP1'])].
[sujeto(['Instead,', 'SHP', may, either]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([recruitment, of, other, coactivators, by, 'GRIP1', or, actively, recruit, corepressors, directly, to, the, 'CAR/RXR/PBRU', complex])].
[sujeto(['The', apical, 'sodium-dependent', bile, salt, transporter, '(', 'ASBT/SLC10A2),', also, called, the, ileal, bile, acid, 'transporter,']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([the, intestinal, absorption, of, bile, salts])].
[sujeto(['The', minimal, construct, that]), verbo([confers]), complemento([full, promoter, activity, contains, three, functional, hepatocyte, nuclear, factor, 1, alpha, '(', 'HNF1alpha)', recognition, 'sites,', explaining, the, dependence, of, 'ASBT', gene, expression, upon, 'HNF1alpha'])].
[sujeto(['A']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, binding, site, arranged, as, a, direct, hexanucleotide, repeat, '(', 'DR1', 'motif)', is, localized, approximately, 1.6, kb, upstream, of, the, transcription, initiation, site])].
[sujeto(['The', 'DR1', element, was, shown, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([the, 'PPARalpha/9-cis-retinoic', acid, receptor, 'heterodimer,', and, targeted, mutagenesis, of, the, 'DR1', motif, abolished, 'PPARalpha', responsiveness])].
[sujeto(['Ciprofibrate', treatment, of, 'SK-ChA', cholangiocytes]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['ASBT', mRNA, 'levels,', suggesting, a, physiologic, role, for, 'PPARalpha-mediated', 'ASBT', gene, regulation])].
[sujeto(['The', potency, and, hierarchy, of, bile, acids, as, ligands, for, the, 'farnesyl/bile', acid, receptor, '(', 'FXR/BAR)', paralleled, their, ability, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['BSEP', in, human, hepatocyte, cultures])].
[sujeto(['FXR:RXR', heterodimers]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'IR1', elements, and, enhanced, bile, acid, transcriptional, activation, of, the, mouse, and, human, 'BSEP/SPGP', promoters])].
[sujeto(['In', 'FXR/BAR', nullizygous, 'mice,', which]), verbo([have]), complemento([dramatically, reduced, 'BSEP/SPGP', 'levels,', hepatic, 'CYP3A11', and, 'CYP2B10', were, strongly, but, unexpectedly, induced])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, hepatoprotective, bile, acid, ursodeoxycholic, 'acid,', which, reverses, hydrophobic, bile, acid, 'hepatotoxicity,']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['PXR', and, efficaciously, induces, 'CYP3A4', '(', a, 'bile-metabolizing', 'enzyme)', in, primary, human, hepatocytes, thus, providing, one, mechanism, for, its, hepatoprotection])].
[sujeto(['Because', serum, and, urinary, bile, acids]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'FXR/BAR', -, /, -, 'mice,', we, evaluated, hepatic, transporters, for, compensatory, changes, that, might, circumvent, the, profound, decrease, in, 'BSEP/SPGP'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([weak, 'MRP3', 'up-regulation'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'MRP4', was, substantially]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, the, 'FXR/BAR', nullizygous, mice, and, was, further, elevated, by, cholic, acid])].
[sujeto(['Thus,']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([hepatocellular, concentrations, of, bile, 'acids,', due, to, the, 'down-regulation', of, 'BSEP/SPGP-mediated', efflux, in, 'FXR', nullizygous, 'mice,', result, in, an, alternate, but, apparent, compensatory, 'up-regulation', of, 'CYP3A,', 'CYP2B,', and, some, 'ABC', transporters, that, is, consistent, with, activation, of, 'PXR/SXR', by, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['Major', transport, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, enterohepatic, circulation, of, bile, salts, include, the, hepatocellular, bile, salt, export, pump, '(', 'BSEP,', 'ABCB11),', the, apical, 'sodium-dependent', bile, salt, transporter, '(', 'ASBT,', 'SLC10A2)', in, cholangiocytes, and, 'enterocytes,', the, 'sodium-dependent', hepatocyte, bile, salt, uptake, system, 'NTCP', '(', 'SLC10A1),', the, organic, anion, transporting, polypeptides, 'OATP-C', '(', 'SLC21A6),', 'OATP8', '(', 'SLC21A8)', and, 'OATP-A', '(', 'SLC21A3),', and, the, multidrug, resistance, protein, 'MRP3', '(', 'ABCC3)'])].
[sujeto(['A', key, regulator, of, hepatocellular, bile, salt, homeostasis, is, the, bile, acid, 'receptor/farnesoid', 'X', receptor, 'FXR,', which]), verbo([activates]), complemento([transcription, of, the, 'BSEP', and, 'OATP8', genes, and, of, the, small, heterodimer, partner, 1, '(', 'SHP)'])].
[sujeto(['SHP', is, a, transcriptional, repressor, that]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([bile, 'acid-induced', repression, of, the, bile, salt, uptake, systems, rat, 'Ntcp', and, human, 'OATP-C'])].
[sujeto(['A']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, activates, rodent, 'Oatp2', '(', 'Slc21a5)', and, human, 'MRP2', '(', 'ABCC2)', is, the, pregnane, 'X', 'receptor/steroid', 'X', receptor, 'PXR/SXR'])].
[sujeto(['Intracellular', trafficking, and, membrane, insertion, of, bile, salt, transporters, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'lipid,', 'protein,', and, extracellular, 'signal-related', kinases, in, response, to, physiologic, stimuli, such, as, cyclic, adenosine, monophosphate, or, taurocholate])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', dysfunction, of, individual, bile, salt, transporters, such, as, 'BSEP,', on, account, of, genetic, 'mutations,', steric, 'inhibition,', suppression, of, gene, 'expression,', or, disturbed, 'signaling,', is, an, important]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, cholestatic, liver, disease])].
[sujeto(['Phenobarbital', '(', 'PB)']), verbo([increases]), complemento([hepatic, 'drug/steroid-metabolic', capability, by, coordinately, activating, transcription, of, the, genes, encoding, various, metabolizing, enzymes])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, 'CAR', was, first, implicated, as, a, transcription, factor, that, activates, the, cytochrome, 'P450', 'Cyp2b10', gene])].
[sujeto(['In', response, to, 'PB,', 'CAR', forms, a, heterodimer, with, the, retinoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'RXR),']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, a, 'PB', response, element, '(', typified, by, 'DR-4', 'motif),', and, activates, transcription, of, the, gene])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'CAR-null', 'mouse,', 'PB', does, not, only]), verbo([induce]), complemento([the, 'Cyp2b10', 'gene,', but, also, induces, genes, encoding, various, metabolizing, enzymes])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'CAR', is, a, general]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, is, essential, for, 'PB', induction, of, 'drug/steroid', metabolizing, enzymes])].
[sujeto(['PB', also]), verbo([induces]), complemento([amino, levulinate, synthase, 1, '(', 'ALAS-1),', the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, heme, 'biosynthesis,', to, increase, heme, supply])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'PB', induction, of, the, synthase, occurs, in, 'CAR-null', 'mice,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'CAR', does, not, coordinate, the, heme, synthesis, for, the, induction, of, 'drug/steroid', metabolism])].
[sujeto(['One', of, these, regulatory, elements, overlapped, a, sequence, that, is, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([in, most, members, of, the, 'CYP2', family])].
[sujeto(['This', 'element,', which, consists, of, a, degenerate, 'AGGTCA', direct, repeat, spaced, by, 1, base, pair, '(', 'DR1)', and, is, known, to, be, a]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, members, of, the, steroid, receptor, 'superfamily,', was, found, to, bind, in, vitro, translated, hepatocyte, nuclear, factor, 4, '(', 'HNF4)', in, gel, retardation, analysis])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'HepG2']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['extracts,', three, 'protein-DNA', complexes, were, formed, on, the, 'DR1', 'element,', one, of, which, was, confirmed, to, be, dependent, on, the, binding, of, 'HNF4'])].
[sujeto(['Experiments', in, 'COS-7', cells, showed, that, 'HNF4', could]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'CYP2D6', promoter, 30, -, fold])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', mutation, of, the, 'DR1', element, produced, a, relatively, minor, 23, '%']), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, activity, in, 'HepG2', cells])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', 'COUP-TFI', was, shown, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['HNF4', stimulation, of, the, 'CYP2D6', promoter, in, 'COS-7', 'cells,', suggesting, that, 'COUP-TFI', could, attenuate, the, effect, of, 'HNF4', in, 'HepG2', cells])].
[sujeto(['However,', when, 'HNF4', levels, were]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'HepG2', cells, by, 'co-transfection,', it, resulted, in, the, enhancement, of, 'CYP2D6', promoter, 'activity,', indicating, that, 'HNF4', could, overcome, the, repressive, effect, of, 'COUP-TFI'])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', the, contribution, of, the, 'DR1', element, in, controlling, the, transcription, of, the, 'CYP2D6', gene, depends, on, the, balance, between, positively, and, negatively]), verbo([acting]), complemento([transcription, factors])].
[sujeto([1, ',', 25, 'Dihydroxyvitamin', 'D', '(', 1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)(2)D)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, differentiation, of, keratinocytes])].
[sujeto([1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)(2)D', raises, intracellular, free, calcium, '(', 'Cai)', as, a, necessary, early, step, toward]), verbo([stimulating]), complemento([differentiation])].
[sujeto([1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)(2)D']), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, calcium, sensing, receptor, '(', 'CaR)', in, keratinocytes, and, enhances, the, calcium, response, of, these, cells])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, the, 'CaR', by, calcium]), verbo([increases]), complemento([intracellular, free, calcium, by, a, mechanism, involving, phospholipase, 'C', '(', 'PLC)', cleavage, of, phosphatidylinositolbisphosphate, into, inositoltrisphosphate, '(', 'IP(3))', and, diacylglycerol, '(', 'DG)'])].

[sujeto(['PLC-gamma1']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, 'DR6', 'VDRE', in, its, promoter, which, binds, and, is, activated, by, 'VDR/RAR', rather, than, 'VDR/RXR'])].
[sujeto(['The', involucrin, 'gene,', which, encodes, a, critical, component, of, the, cornified, 'envelope,', contains, a, 'DR3', 'VDRE', in, its, promoter, that]), verbo([acts]), complemento([in, conjunction, with, a, nearby, 'AP-1', site])].
[sujeto(['In', undifferentiated, 'keratinocytes,', the, 'VDR']), verbo([binds]), complemento([preferentially, to, the, 'DRIP', complex, of, coactivators])].

[sujeto(['The', catabolism, of, cholesterol, into, bile, acids, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, oxysterols, and, bile, 'acids,', which, induce, or, repress, transcription, of, the, 'pathway\'s', 'rate-limiting', enzyme, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, 'LXRalpha', binds, oxysterols, and, mediates, 'feed-forward', induction])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, repression, is, coordinately]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, a, triumvirate, of, nuclear, 'receptors,', including, the, bile, acid, 'receptor,', 'FXR;', the, 'promoter-specific', 'activator,', 'LRH-1;', and, the, 'promoter-specific', 'repressor,', 'SHP'])].
[sujeto(['Feedback', repression, of, 'CYP7A1', is, accomplished, by, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, bile, acids, to, 'FXR,', which, leads, to, transcription, of, 'SHP'])].
[sujeto(['Elevated', 'SHP', protein, then]), verbo([inactivates]), complemento(['LRH-1', by, forming, a, heterodimeric, complex, that, leads, to, 'promoter-specific', repression, of, both, 'CYP7A1', and, 'SHP'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([an, elaborate, autoregulatory, cascade, mediated, by, nuclear, receptors, for, the, maintenance, of, hepatic, cholesterol, catabolism])].
[sujeto(['Cholesterol', 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', plays, a, key, role, in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([lipid, and, bile, salt, homeostasis, as, it, is, the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, converting, cholesterol, to, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['Deficiency', of, 'CYP7A1']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, hyperlipidemia, in, man, and, mouse])].
[sujeto(['Our', present, study, revealed, that, 'CYP7A1', mRNA, expression, is, greatly]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([by, 'RA', in, both, human, hepatocytes, and, 'HepG2', cells, where, increased, fibroblast, growth, factor, 19, '(', 'FGF19)', and, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', expressions, were, also, 'observed,', suggesting, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', and, retinoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'RXR)', were, activated])].
[sujeto(['Promoter', reporter, assays, demonstrate, that, 'all-trans', 'RA', '(', 'atRA)', specifically]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['FXR/RXR'])].
[sujeto(['Knocking', down, of, 'FXR', or, 'RXRalpha', by, small, interference, 'RNA', '(', 'siRNA)', in, human, hepatocytes]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['CYP7A1', basal, 'expression,', but, the, repressive, effect, of, atRA, 'persisted,', suggesting, there, are, also, 'FXR/RXR-independent', mechanisms, mediating, atRA, repression, of, 'CYP7A1', expression])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, potential, explanation, for, hyperlipidemic, side, effects, observed, in, some, patients, treated, with, 'high-dose', 'RA'])].
[sujeto(['Hepatocyte']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, 1, alpha, '(', 'HNF1alpha)', and, 'HNF4alpha', are, 'liver-selective', transcription, factors, and, are, essential, for, hepatocyte, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['This', study, demonstrates, that, 'HNF1alpha', as, well, as, 'HNF4alpha', genes, contain, a, direct, repeat, with, a, space, of, one, nucleotide, '(', 'DR1)-retinoic', acid, '(', 'RA)', response, element, that, can, be]), verbo([bound]), complemento([and, regulated, by, 'RA', and, retinoid, x, receptor, alpha, '(', 'RXRalpha)', complex])].

[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'RXRalpha', further]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, activities, of, both, genes])].
[sujeto(['Two', putative, 'RXRalpha']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, on, the, 'HNF1alpha', '(', -, 295, to, -, 276, ')', and, 'HNF4alpha', '(', -, 418, to, -, 399, ')', genes, have, been, characterized])].
[sujeto(['By', transient, 'transfection,', both, sites, positively]), verbo([responded]), complemento([to, 'RA,', and, overexpression, of, 'RXRalpha', in, 'Hep3B', cells, increased, the, regulatory, effect])].

[sujeto(['Hepatocyte']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, 1, alpha, '(', 'HNF1alpha)', and, 'HNF4alpha', are, 'liver-selective', transcription, factors, and, are, essential, for, hepatocyte, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['This', study, demonstrates, that, 'HNF1alpha', as, well, as, 'HNF4alpha', genes, contain, a, direct, repeat, with, a, space, of, one, nucleotide, '(', 'DR1)-retinoic', acid, '(', 'RA)', response, element, that, can, be]), verbo([bound]), complemento([and, regulated, by, 'RA', and, retinoid, x, receptor, alpha, '(', 'RXRalpha)', complex])].

[sujeto(['Peroxisome', 'proliferator-activator', receptors, '(', 'PPAR)', are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cholesterol, homeostasis, through, the, regulation, of, bile, acids, 'synthesis,', 'composition,', and, reclamation])].
[sujeto(['Indeed,', treatment, with, the, 'PPARalpha-PPARbeta/delta', agonist, bezafibrate]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, 'up-regulation', of, 'I-BABP', mRNA, levels, in, the, human, 'intestine-derived', 'Caco-2', cells])].

[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, previously, that, 'MDR3', expression, is, modulated, by, 'hormones,', cellular, 'stress,', and, xenobiotics])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, the, 'MDR3', gene, is, 'trans-activated', by, the, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', via, a, direct]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'FXR/retinoid', 'X', receptor, alpha, heterodimers, to, a, highly, conserved, inverted, repeat, element, '(', a, 'FXR', response, 'element)', at, the, distal, promoter, '(', -, 1970, to, -, 1958, ')'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'FXR', 'trans-activation', 'assays,', both, the, endogenous, 'FXR', agonist, chenodeoxycholate, and, the, synthetic, agonist, 'GW4064']), verbo([activated]), complemento([the, 'MDR3', promoter])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, these, 'data,', 'MDR3', mRNA, was, significantly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, both, chenodeoxycholate, and, 'GW4064', in, primary, human, hepatocytes, in, 'time-', and, 'dose-dependent', fashions])].
[sujeto(['These', 'results,', together, with, the, previous]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, the, bile, salt, export, pump, is, a, direct, 'FXR', 'target,', suggest, that, 'FXR', coordinately, controls, secretion, of, bile, salts, and, phospholipids])].
[sujeto(['Phenobarbital', '(', 'PB)']), verbo([increases]), complemento([hepatic, 'drug/steroid-metabolic', capability, by, coordinately, activating, transcription, of, the, genes, encoding, various, metabolizing, enzymes])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, 'CAR', was, first, implicated, as, a, transcription, factor, that, activates, the, cytochrome, 'P450', 'Cyp2b10', gene])].
[sujeto(['In', response, to, 'PB,', 'CAR', forms, a, heterodimer, with, the, retinoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'RXR),']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, a, 'PB', response, element, '(', typified, by, 'DR-4', 'motif),', and, activates, transcription, of, the, gene])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'CAR-null', 'mouse,', 'PB', does, not, only]), verbo([induce]), complemento([the, 'Cyp2b10', 'gene,', but, also, induces, genes, encoding, various, metabolizing, enzymes])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'CAR', is, a, general]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, is, essential, for, 'PB', induction, of, 'drug/steroid', metabolizing, enzymes])].
[sujeto(['PB', also]), verbo([induces]), complemento([amino, levulinate, synthase, 1, '(', 'ALAS-1),', the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, heme, 'biosynthesis,', to, increase, heme, supply])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'PB', induction, of, the, synthase, occurs, in, 'CAR-null', 'mice,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'CAR', does, not, coordinate, the, heme, synthesis, for, the, induction, of, 'drug/steroid', metabolism])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, 'hypothesised,', mainly, from, studies, with, animal, models, of, liver, 'disease,', that, the, transport, of, substrates, for, metabolic, enzymes, and, their, subsequent, metabolism, and, elimination, in, hepatic, bile, or, blood, is, 'co-ordinated,', but, there, is, little, information, on, this, process, in, diseased, human, liver])].

[sujeto(['This', study, demonstrated, that, 'Cyp7a1', plays, a, critical, role, in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([cholesterol, homeostasis, and, underscores, the, importance, of, bile, acid, signaling, in, regulating, overall, cholesterol, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['Small', 'Heterodimer', 'Partner', '(', 'SHP)']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([numerous, transcription, factors, that, are, involved, in, diverse, biological, 'processes,', including, lipid, and, glucose, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['In', response, to]), verbo([increased]), complemento([hepatic, bile, 'acids,', 'SHP', gene, expression, is, induced, and, the, 'SHP', protein, is, stabilized])].
[sujeto(['We', now, show, that, the, activity, of, 'SHP', is, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, posttranslational, methylation, at, 'Arg-57', by, protein, arginine, methyltransferase, 5, '(', 'PRMT5)'])].
[sujeto(['Adenovirus-mediated', hepatic, depletion, of, 'PRMT5']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['SHP', methylation, and, reversed, the, suppression, of, metabolic, genes, by, 'SHP'])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of, 'Arg-57']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['SHP', interaction, with, its, known, 'cofactors,', 'Brm,', 'mSin3A,', and, histone, deacetylase, 1, '(', 'HDAC1),', but, not, with, 'G9a,', and, decreased, their, recruitment, to, 'SHP', target, genes, in, mice])].
[sujeto(['Hepatic', overexpression, of, 'SHP']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([metabolic, target, 'genes,', decreased, bile, acid, and, hepatic, triglyceride, 'levels,', and, increased, glucose, tolerance])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', mutation, of, 'Arg-57', selectively, reversed, the, inhibition, of, 'SHP']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, and, metabolic, outcomes])].
[sujeto(['The', importance, of, 'Arg-57', methylation, for, the, repression, activity, of, 'SHP']), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, molecular, basis, for, the, observation, that, a, natural, mutation, of, 'Arg-57', in, humans, is, associated, with, the, metabolic, syndrome])].
[sujeto(['Bile', acid, homeostasis, is, tightly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([via, a, feedback, loop, operated, by, the, nuclear, receptors, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', and, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)'])].
[sujeto(['Contrary', to, current, 'models,', which, place, 'FXR', upstream, of, 'SHP', in, a, linear, regulatory, 'pathway,', here, we, show, that, the, phenotypic, consequences, in, mice, of, the, combined]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, both, receptors, are, much, more, severe, than, the, relatively, modest, impact, of, the, loss, of, either, 'Fxr', or, 'Shp', alone])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'WT', mice, with, 17, -, 'OHP', was, sufficient, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([liver, injury, that, reproduced, many, of, the, histopathological, features, observed, in, the, 'double-knockout', mice])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', our, data, indicate, a, pathologic, role, for]), verbo([increased]), complemento([production, of, 17, -, hydroxy, steroid, metabolites, in, liver, injury, and, suggest, that, 'Fxr-/-Shp-/-', mice, could, provide, a, model, for, juvenile, onset, cholestasis])].
[sujeto(['The', effects, of, the, secondary, bile, 'acid,', lithocholic, acid, '(', 'LCA),', a, 'VDR,', 'FXR', and, 'PXR', 'ligand,', on, the, regulation, of, bile, acid, metabolism, '(', 'CYP3A', 'isozymes),', synthesis, '(', 'CYP7A1),', and, transporter, proteins, '(', 'MRP3,', 'MRP2,', 'BSEP,', 'NTCP)', as, well, as]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, '(', 'FXR,', 'PXR,', 'LXRα,', 'HNF1α,', 'HNF4α', and, 'SHP)', were, studied, in, rat, and, human, 'precision-cut', intestine, and, liver, slices, at, the, mRNA, level])].
[sujeto(['LCA']), verbo([induced]), complemento([rCYP3A1, and, rCYP3A9, in, the, rat, 'jejunum,', ileum, and, 'colon,', rCYP3A2, only, in, the, 'ileum,', rCYP3A9, expression, in, the, 'liver,', and, 'CYP3A4', in, the, human, ileum, but, not, in, liver])].
[sujeto(['LCA']), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, expression, of, rMRP2, in, the, colon, but, not, in, the, jejunum, and, ileum, but, did, not, affect, rMRP3, expression, along, the, length, of, the, rat, intestine])].
[sujeto(['In', human, ileum, 'slices,', 'LCA']), verbo([induced]), complemento([hMRP3, and, hMRP2, expression])].
[sujeto(['In', rat, liver, 'slices,', 'LCA']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['rCYP7A1,', rLXRα, and, rHNF4α, 'expression,', induced, rSHP, 'expression,', but, did, not, affect, rBSEP, or, rNTCP, 'expression;', whereas, in, the, human, 'liver,', a, small, but, significant, decrease, was, found, for, hHNF1α, expression])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([profound, species, differences, in, the, effects, of, 'LCA', on, bile, acid, 'transport,', synthesis, and, detoxification])].
[sujeto(['However,', hepatic, 'CYP7A1', mRNA, expression]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([significantly, '(', by, 70, '%', ')', in, the, patients, with, 'end-stage', 'PBC', as, compared, to, the, controls, and, the, patients, with, 'non-end-stage', 'PBC', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')'])].
[sujeto(['The', hepatic, expression, of, transporters]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([bile, acid, influx, and, efflux, showed, sustained, 'elevation,', whereas, that, of, the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, for, bile, acid, biosynthesis, was, attenuated, in, the, 'end-stage', 'PBC', patients])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', mechanisms, may, be, present]), verbo([preventing]), complemento([the, accumulation, of, toxic, bile, acids, in, the, hepatocytes, of, 'end-stage', 'PBC', patients])].
[sujeto(['The', objective, of, this, study, was, to, investigate, whether, common, variation, in, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, lipid, and, statin, metabolism, modify, the, effect, of, statins, on, serum, total, cholesterol, '(', 'TC),', 'low-density', 'lipoprotein-cholesterol', '(', 'LDL-C),', and, 'high-density', 'lipoprotein-cholesterol', concentration, in, coronary, artery, disease, '(', 'CAD)', patients])].
[sujeto(['Variant', alleles, of, 'ABCB1', '(', -, 41, 'A/G),', 'HMGCR', 'SNP29', 'G/T,', 'rs5908A/G,', 'rs12916C/T,', and, 'CYP7A1-204A/C', polymorphisms, were, significantly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, attenuated, 'LDL-C', reduction, and, variant, alleles, of, 'CETP', 'TaqI,', -, 629, 'C/A,', and, 'APOAI', 'PstI', polymorphisms, were, associated, with, higher, increase, in, 'high-density', 'lipoprotein-cholesterol'])].

[sujeto(['Orphan']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, 'Small', 'Heterodimer', 'Partner', '(', 'SHP;', 'NR0B2)', is, a, transcriptional, corepressor, of, a, wide, variety, of, nuclear, receptors, '(', 'NRs)'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'SHP', recruits, 'SIRT1,', a, class, 'III', histone, 'deacetylase,', in, an, 'NR-specific', manner, to, inhibit, transcriptional, activity])].

[sujeto(['ChIP', assays, revealed, that, 'SHP']), verbo([recruits]), complemento(['SIRT1', on, 'LRH1', target, gene, promoters, and, 'SIRT1', deacetylated, 'template-dependent', histone, 'H3', and, 'H4', to, inhibit, transcription, of, 'LRH1', target, genes])].

[sujeto(['Bile', acid, sequestrants]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, lower, glucose, levels, in, patients, with, type, 2, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['The', rats, were, fed, 'HE;', 'HE', +, 2, '%', 'CL;', 'HE', +, 0.02, '%', 'SC-435', '(', 'SC),', an, apical, 'sodium-dependent', bile, acid, transporter, 'inhibitor;', and]), verbo([regular]), complemento([chow, '(', 'controls)'])].

[sujeto(['Cholesterol', 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp7a1)', and, the, bile, acid, pool, size, are]), verbo([increased]), complemento([2, to, 3, -, fold, in, lactating, postpartum, rats])].

[sujeto(['Expression', of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', 'LXRalpha,', liver, receptor, homolog, '(', 'LRH-1),', hepatocyte, nuclear, factor, 4, alpha, '(', 'HNF4alpha),', and, short, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', messenger, 'RNA', '(', 'mRNA)', and, coactivator, peroxisome, 'proliferators-activated', receptor, gamma, 'coactivator-1alpha', '(', 'PGC-1alpha)', mRNA, was, unchanged, in, 'PPd10', versus, controls, at, 16, 'hours,', whereas, chicken, ovalbumin, upstream, transcription, factor, 'II', '(', 'COUP-TFII)', was, decreased, 40, '%', at, 16, hours])].

[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increased]), complemento([recruitment, of, 'LXRalpha,', a, 'Cyp7a1', stimulatory, 'pathway,', and, decreased, expression, of, 'FGF15', and, phosphorylated, 'Erk1/2,', a, 'Cyp7a1', repressive, 'pathway,', combined, to, increase, 'Cyp7a1', expression, during, lactation])].
[sujeto(['BAs', are]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([in, the, 'hepatocytes,', secreted, into, bile, and, delivered, to, the, lumen, of, the, small, intestine, where, they, act, as, detergents, to, facilitate, absorption, of, fats, and, 'fat-soluble', vitamins])].
[sujeto(['Five', percent, are, lost, and, replaced, by, newly]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento(['BAs,', which, amounts, to, approximately, 500, 'mg/day', in, adult, humans])].
[sujeto(['Bile', acid, homeostasis, is, critical, in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([health, and, is, primarily, regulated, by, the, nuclear, receptors, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', and, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)'])].
[sujeto(['Bile', 'acid-activated', 'FXR', indirectly]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([expression, of, cholesterol, 7, alpha, hydroxylase, '(', 'CYP7A1),', a, key, enzyme, in, conversion, of, cholesterol, to, bile, 'acids,', by, induction, of, 'SHP'])].
[sujeto(['We', recently, demonstrated, that, 'SHP']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['CYP7A1', transcription, by, recruiting, 'chromatin-modifying', 'cofactors,', including, 'Brm-Swi/Snf'])].
[sujeto(['Swi/Snf', complexes, contain, either, 'Brm', or, 'Brg-1', 'ATPases,', and, whether, these, subunits]), verbo([have]), complemento([distinct, functions, remains, unclear])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, the, role, of, these, subunits, in, regulation, of, bile, acid, metabolism, under, physiological, conditions, by, 'FXR', and, 'SHP'])].
[sujeto(['Brg-1']), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, 'FXR', and, enhanced, 'FXR-mediated', transactivation, of, 'SHP,', whereas, 'Brm', interacted, with, 'SHP', and, enhanced, 'SHP-mediated', repression, of, 'CYP7A1', 'and,', 'interestingly,', 'auto-repression', of, 'SHP'])].

[sujeto(['Our', studies, demonstrate, that, 'Brm', and, 'Brg-1']), verbo([have]), complemento([distinct, functions, in, the, regulation, of, two, key, 'genes,', 'CYP7A1', and, 'SHP,', within, a, single, physiological, 'pathway,', feedback, inhibition, of, bile, acid, 'biosynthesis,', by, differentially, targeting, 'SHP', and, 'FXR'])].
[sujeto(['To']), verbo([gain]), complemento([insight, into, clock, output, functions, of, 'REV-ERBalpha,', we, carried, out, 'genome-wide', transcriptome, profiling, experiments, with, liver, 'RNA', from, 'wild-type', 'mice,', 'Rev-erbalpha', 'knock-out', 'mice,', or, 'REV-ERBalpha', overexpressing, mice])].
[sujeto(['On', the, basis, of, these, genetic, 'loss-', and, 'gain-of-function', 'experiments,', we, concluded, that, 'REV-ERBalpha']), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, the, circadian, modulation, of, sterol, regulatory, 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'SREBP)', 'activity,', and, thereby, in, the, daily, expression, of, 'SREBP', target, genes, involved, in, cholesterol, and, lipid, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['REV-ERBalpha', also]), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, the, cyclic, expression, of, 'cholesterol-7alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1),', the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, converting, cholesterol, to, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, this, control, acts, via, the, stimulation, of, 'LXR', nuclear, receptors, by, cyclically, produced, oxysterols])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', our, study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, rhythmic, cholesterol, and, bile, acid, metabolism, is, not, just, driven, by, alternating, 'feeding-fasting', 'cycles,', but, also, by, 'REV-ERBalpha,', a, component, of, the, circadian, clockwork, circuitry])].
[sujeto(['A', proatherogenic, genotype, score, was, formulated, based, on, number, of, alleles]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'LDL-C', and, was, evaluated, for, association, with, risk, of, 'CAD'])].
[sujeto(['We', observed, 12, 'SNPs', from, 'CETP,', 'APOAI,', 'ABCB1,', 'CYP7A1,', and, 'HMGCR', genes, to, be]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, baseline, 'LDL-C', and, 'high-density', lipoprotein, cholesterol, levels, and, increased, risk, of, 'CAD', '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Co-occurrence', of, three, or, more, risk, alleles, '(', proartherogenic, genotype, score, &, 'gt;or=3)', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, increased, risk, of, 'CAD', and, myocardial, infarction])].
[sujeto(['Our', study, highlights, synergistic, association, of, multiple, 'SNPs', of, lipid, pathway, with, 'LDL-C', levels, and, risk, of, 'CAD,', and, indicates, that, 'co-occurrence', of, proatherogenic, risk, alleles, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([incremental, information, about, 'CAD', risk, beyond, lipid, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['Intraluminal', concentrations, of, bile, acids, are, low, in, newborn, infants, and]), verbo([increase]), complemento([rapidly, after, 'birth,', at, least, partly, owing, to, increased, bile, acid, synthesis, rates])].
[sujeto(['The', expansion, of, the, bile, acid, pool, is, critical, since, bile, acids, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, stimulate, bile, flow, and, absorb, 'lipids,', a, major, component, of, newborn, diets])].
[sujeto(['The', purpose, of, the, present, studies, was, to, determine, the, mechanism, responsible, for, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, bile, acid, synthesis, rates, and, the, subsequent, enlargement, of, bile, acid, pool, sizes, '(', 'BAPS)', during, the, neonatal, 'period,', and, how, changes, in, circulating, hormone, levels, might, affect, 'BAPS'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'hamster,', pool, size, was, low, just, after, birth, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([modestly, until, 10.5, days, postpartum, '(', 'dpp)'])].
[sujeto(['BAPS']), verbo([increased]), complemento([more, significantly, '(', approximately, 3, -, 'fold)', between, 10.5, and, 15.5, dpp])].
[sujeto(['An']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, mRNA, and, protein, levels, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp7a1),', the, 'rate-limiting', step, in, classical, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', immediately, preceded, an, increase, in, 'BAPS'])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', although, simultaneous]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, circulating, cortisol, and, 'Cyp7a1', levels, 'occurred,', precocious, expression, of, 'Cyp7a1', could, not, be, induced, in, neonatal, hamsters, with, dexamethasone])].
[sujeto(['Thus', the, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'Cyp7a1', levels, in, neonatal, hamsters, is, due, to, mechanisms, independent, of, the, 'FXR', and, 'SHP', pathway, and, cortisol])].
[sujeto(['Peroxisome', 'proliferators,', such, as, the, 'lipid-lowering', fibrates, that, function, as, agonists, for, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, alpha, '(', 'PPARalpha),']), verbo([induce]), complemento([liver, tumors, in, rodents, and, may, produce, cholestasis, in, humans])].
[sujeto(['Considerable', attention]), verbo([has]), complemento([focused, on, peroxisome, 'proliferator-induced', hepatocellular, 'carcinoma,', a, phenomenon, not, noted, in, 'man,', whereas, limited, studies, examine, fibrates, and, other, therapeutic, drugs, that, induce, 'cholestasis,', a, common, finding, in, humans])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, mechanisms, by, which, fibrates]), verbo([induce]), complemento([hepatocyte, proliferation, and, cholestasis, are, still, not, fully, understood])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, the, role, of, hepatocyte, retinoid, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'RXRalpha),', an, essential, partner, of, 'PPARalpha,', in, modulating, 'WY-14,643-induced', hepatocyte, proliferation, and, cholestasis])].
[sujeto(['WY-14,643', treatment]), verbo([induced]), complemento([hepatomegaly, in, wild, type, '(', 'WT)', mice, that, was, also, accompanied, by, induction, of, the, expression, of, cyclins, 'D1,', 'D3,', 'A2,', and, 'B1', and, 'Cdc2', as, well, as, inhibition, of, 'Wee', 1])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', neither, 'WY-14,643', treatment, nor, 'RXRalpha', deficiency, affected, 'apoptosis,', indicating, the, importance, of, 'PPARalpha/RXRalpha', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['Wee', 1, -, mediated, 'Cdc2/cyclin', 'B1', expression, for, cells, to, enter, into, mitosis])].
[sujeto(['WY-14,643', treatment, also]), verbo([induced]), complemento([cholestasis, and, liver, 'injury,', which, is, evidenced, by, induction, of, alanine, 'aminotransferase,', alkaline, 'phosphatase,', and, hepatic, bile, acid, levels, in, 'WT', mice])].
[sujeto(['WY-14,643-mediated', induction, of, the, small, heterodimer, 'partner,', 'Mrp3,', and, 'Cyp3a11', levels, was, greater, in, hepatocyte, 'RXRalpha-null', than, in, 'WT', mouse, livers]), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([enhanced, repression, of, bile, acid, synthesis, and, increased, efflux, of, bile, acids, into, blood, for, renal, excretion, as, well, as, hydroxylation, of, bile, acids, because, of, hepatocyte, 'RXRalpha', deficiency])].
[sujeto(['These', data, establish, a, crucial, role, of, hepatocyte, 'RXRalpha', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['WY-14,643-mediated', cell, cycle, progression, as, well, as, bile, acid, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['Mouse', fibroblast, growth, factor, 15, '(', 'FGF15)', and, human, ortholog, 'FGF19']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, as, the, bile, 'acid-induced', intestinal, factors, that, mediate, bile, acid, feedback, inhibition, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', gene, '(', 'C', 'YP7A1)', transcription, in, mouse, liver])].
[sujeto(['Chenodeoxycholic', acid, '(', 'CDCA)', and, the, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)-specific', agonist, 'GW4064', strongly]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['FGF19', but, inhibited, 'CYP7A1', messenger, 'RNA', '(', 'mRNA)', levels, in, primary, human, hepatocytes])].
[sujeto(['FGF19', strongly, and, rapidly]), verbo([repressed]), complemento(['CYP7A1', but, not, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', mRNA, levels])].
[sujeto(['Kinase', inhibition, and, phosphorylation, assays, revealed, that, the, 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinase/extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, 1, /, 2, '(', 'MAPK/Erk1/2)', pathway, played, a, major, role, in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento(['FGF19', inhibition, of, 'CYP7A1'])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'CDCA']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([tyrosine, phosphorylation, of, the, 'FGF', receptor, 4, '(', 'FGFR4)', in, hepatocytes])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, bile, 'acid-activated', 'FXR', is, able, to, induce, 'FGF19', in, hepatocytes, to, inhibit, 'CYP7A1', by, an, 'autocrine/paracrine', mechanism])].
[sujeto(['The', hepatic, 'FGF19/FGFR4/Erk1/2', pathway, may]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['CYP7A1', independent, of, 'SHP'])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, to]), verbo([inducing]), complemento(['FGF19', in, the, 'intestine,', bile, acids, in, hepatocytes, may, activate, the, liver, 'FGF19/FGFR4', signaling, pathway, to, inhibit, bile, acid, synthesis, and, prevent, accumulation, of, toxic, bile, acid, in, human, livers])].
[sujeto(['Hyperlipidaemia', was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, oral, administration, of, high, cholesterol, and, fat])].
[sujeto(['After', 4, weeks, of, 'treatment,', the, lipid, levels, in, the, 'serum,', liver, and, faeces, were, measured, and, the, liver, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, lipid, metabolism, were, analysed, to, explore, the, molecular, mechanisms, of, lowering, lipids])].
[sujeto(['CM108']), verbo([modulated]), complemento([lipid, 'profiles,', including, elevating, the, level, of, 'high-density', lipoprotein, cholesterol, '(', 'HDL-C;', 40, '%', ')', and, reducing, serum, levels, of, triglyceride, '(', 10, '%', ')', ',', total, cholesterol, '(', 10, '%', ')', and, 'low-density', lipoprotein, cholesterol, '(', 26, '%', ')'])].

[sujeto(['Glycochenodeoxycholic', acid, '(', 'GCDCA;', 100, 'micromol/L)', significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([formation, of, cholic, acid, '(', 'CA)', to, 44, '%', +, /, -, 4, '%', of, controls, and, glycodeoxycholic, acid, '(', 'GDCA)', decreased, formation, of, 'CA', to, 67, '%', +, /, -, 11, '%', of, controls])].

[sujeto(['The', aromatase, knockout, '(', 'ArKO)', mouse, cannot]), verbo([synthesize]), complemento([endogenous, estrogens, due, to, disruption, of, the, 'Cyp19', gene])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, 'previously,', that, 'ArKO', mice, present, with, 'age-progressive', obesity, and, hepatic, 'steatosis,', and, by, 1, yr, of, age, both, male, and, female, 'ArKO', mice, develop, hypercholesterolemia])].

[sujeto(['The', 'ATP-binding', cassette, 'G5', and, 'ATP-binding', cassette, 'G8', transporters, do, not, appear, to, be]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, estrogen])].
