[sujeto(['These', 'Nuclear-Receptors', represent, candidates, for, the, development, of, therapeutic, strategies, aimed, at]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([their, expression, or, activating, them, in, tumor, cells])].
[sujeto(['These', oncogenic, 'Nuclear-Receptors', should, be]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([with, selective, 'antagonists,', 'reverse-agonists', or, 'agents/strategies', capable, of, reducing, their, expression, in, 'breast-cancer', cells])].
[sujeto(['The', orphan, receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP,', 'NR0B2)']), verbo([modulates]), complemento([the, transcription, activity, of, the, 'MODY1', gene, 'HNF4a'])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', in, 'SHP', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 7, '%', of, 'Japanese', obese, 'young-onset', type, 2, diabetic, patients, and, were, associated, with, moderate, obesity, and, increased, birth, weight])].
[sujeto(['The', polymorphism, was, not]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, diabetes, in, case, control, or, familial, association, studies])].
[sujeto(['The', 'A', allele, '(', frequency, 0.07, ')', was, not]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, obesity, in, type, 2, diabetic, subjects, '(', n, =, 348, ')', ',', their, parents, '(', n, =, 272, ')', ',', or, young, nondiabetic, adults, '(', n, =, 925, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, genetic, variation, in, 'SHP', is, unlikely, to, be, common, in, the, predisposition, to, 'diabetes,', 'obesity,', or, increased, birth, weight, in, 'U'])].
[sujeto(['The', small, heterodimer, partner, 'SHP', '(', 'NR0B2)', is, an, unusual]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, lacks, the, typical, 'DNA', binding, domain, common, to, most, nuclear, receptors])].
[sujeto(['SHP']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, act, as, a, corepressor, for, several, nuclear, 'receptors,', but, its, exact, mechanism, of, action, is, still, elusive])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'SHP', can]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, liver, 'X', receptors, 'LXRalpha', '(', 'NR1H3)', and, 'LXRbeta', '(', 'NR1H2),', as, demonstrated, by, 'glutathione-S-transferase', 'pull-down', 'assays,', mammalian, 'two-hybrid,', and, coimmunoprecipitation, experiments])].
[sujeto(['In', transfection, 'assays,', 'SHP']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, expression, of, an, artificial, reporter, driven, by, an, 'LXR-response', element, and, represses, the, transcriptional, activation, by, 'LXR', of, the, human, 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, 1, '(', 'ABCA1)', promoter])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'Caco-2', cells, with, bile, 'acids,', which]), verbo([activate]), complemento([farnesoid, 'X', receptor, and, subsequently, induce, 'SHP,', leads, to, the, repression, of, the, human, 'ABCG1', 'gene,', an, established, 'LXR', target, gene])].
[sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, that, 'SHP', is, able, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'LXR', and, to, modulate, its, transcriptional, activity])].
[sujeto(['The', orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP;', 'NR0B2)', interacts, with, a, wide, array, of, nuclear, receptors, and, represses, their, transcriptional, activity])].
[sujeto(['SHP', expression, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, several, other, members, of, the, nuclear, receptor, 'superfamily,', including, the, orphan, receptors, 'SF-1', and, 'LRH-1,', and, the, bile, acid, receptor, 'FXR'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([found, that, the, 'SHP', promoter, is, also, activated, by, the, estrogen, 'receptor-related', receptor, gamma, '(', 'ERRgamma)', but, not, the, related, 'ERRalpha', and, 'ERRbeta', isoforms])].
[sujeto(['ERRgamma', transactivation, is, dependent, on, only, one, of, five, previously, characterized, 'DNA-binding', sites, for, 'SF-1,', and, this, element, differs, from, previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento(['ERR', response, elements])].
[sujeto(['However,', treatment, with, the, histone, deacetylase, inhibitor, trichostatin, 'A', significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['ERRalpha', and, 'ERRbeta', activity, on, this, element, indicating, that, the, lack, of, activity, of, 'ERRalpha', and, -, beta, may, depend, on, their, association, with, 'co-repressor', in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', using, protease, sensitivity, assays, on, 'DNA']), verbo([bound]), complemento([receptors, it, was, demonstrated, that, 'DNA', sequence, of, different, response, elements, may, cause, allosteric, modulation, of, 'ERR', 'proteins,', which, in, turn, may, be, responsible, for, the, differential, activities, of, these, receptors, on, different, response, elements])].
[sujeto(['SHP']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['ERRgamma', transactivation, and, physically, interacts, with, all, three, members, of, 'ERR', 'subfamily,', as, demonstrated, by, both, yeast, 'two-hybrid', and, biochemical, assays])].
[sujeto(['Several', recently, described, 'SHP', mutations]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, moderate, obesity, in, humans, block, the, inhibition, of, 'ERRgamma', activity])].
[sujeto(['Small', heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP,', 'NR0B2)', is, an, atypical, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, inhibits, transcriptional, activation, by, several, other, nuclear, receptors])].
[sujeto(['We', recently]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, mutations, in, the, 'SHP', gene, are, associated, with, insulin, resistance])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, demonstrated, that, the, 'SHP', gene, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, adipose, tissues])].
[sujeto(['A', reporter, gene, assay, showed, that, a, gene, product, of, 'SHP']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, transcriptional, activation, of, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, '(', 'PPAR)', gamma])].
[sujeto(['Immunoprecipitation', and, glutathione, 'S-transferase', 'pull-down', assay, showed, that, 'SHP', directly]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'PPARgamma', and, competed, with, nuclear, receptor, corepressor, for, binding, to, 'PPARgamma'])].
[sujeto(['Mutant', 'SHP', 'proteins,', which, are]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, naturally, occurring, 'mutation,', showed, less, enhancing, activity, for, 'PPARgamma', than, 'wild-type', 'SHP'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SHP', may, act, as, an, endogenous, enhancer, of, 'PPARgamma'])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', in, several, genes, encoding, transcription, factors, of, the, hepatocyte]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, '(', 'HNF)', cascade, are, associated, with, 'maturity-onset', diabetes, of, the, young, '(', 'MODY),', a, monogenic, form, of, 'early-onset', diabetes, mellitus])].
[sujeto(['The', ability, of, the, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP,', 'NR0B2)', to, modulate, the, transcriptional, activity, of, 'MODY1', 'protein,', the, nuclear, receptor, 'HNF-4alpha,', suggested, 'SHP', as, a, candidate, 'MODY', gene])].

[sujeto(['Podocyte']), verbo([loss]), complemento([is, one, of, the, determining, factors, for, the, progression, toward, glomerulosclerosis])].
[sujeto(['However,', recent, evidence]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, during, renal, 'injury,', podocyte, could, 're-enter', the, cell, 'cycle,', sensitizing, the, cells, to, injury, and, 'death,', but, the, molecular, mechanisms, underlying, 'it,', as, well, as, the, cell, fate, determination, still, remained, unclear])].
[sujeto(['Here,', using, 'NPHS2', 'Cre;', 'mT/mG', transgenic, mice, and, primary, podocytes, isolated, from, the, 'mice,', we, investigated, the, effect, of, mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, complex, 1, '(', 'mTORC1)/4E-binding', protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1)', signaling, pathway, on, cell, cycle, 're-entry', and, apoptosis, of, podocyte, induced, by, adriamycin])].

[sujeto(['Importantly,']), verbo([targeting]), complemento(['4E-BP1', activation, by, the, 'RNA', interference, of, '4E-BP1', or, pharmacologic, rapamycin, '(', inhibitor, of, 'mTORC1,', blocking, 'mTORC1-dependent', phosphorylation, of, its, substrate, '4E-BP1)', treatment, was, able, to, inhibit, the, increases, of, 'PCNA,', 'Ki67,', and, the, 'S-phase', fraction, of, cell, cycle, in, primary, podocyte, during, 2, -, 6, h, of, adriamycin, 'treatment,', and, also, attenuated, the, following, apoptotic, cell, death, of, podocyte, detected, from, the, 4, th, 'hour,', suggesting, that, '4E-BP1', could, be, a, regulator, to, manipulate, the, amount, of, cell, cycle, 're-entry', provided, by, differentiated, 'podocyte,', and, thus, regulate, the, degree, of, podocyte, 'apoptosis,', bringing, us, a, new, potential, 'podocyte-protective', substance, that, can, be, used, for, therapy])].
[sujeto(['Cyclin-dependent', protein, kinase, 6, '(', 'CDK6)', plays, a, pivotal, role, in, the, regulation, of, the, cell, cycle, and, cell, proliferation, in, 'mammals,', and, disruption, of, its, expression, by, various, microRNAs]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, pathogenesis, of, multiple, human, cancers])].
[sujeto(['In', 'mammals,', 'miR-34a']), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, downstream, effector, of, 'p53,', and, thus, indirectly, targets, 'Cdk6,', abrogating, its, effects])].

[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, cDNA, sequence, of, whitefish, cdk6, has, a, 3, '\'', 'UTR', region, that, contains, a, binding, site, for, 'miR-34a'])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, luciferase, reporter, 'assay,', we, demonstrated, that, whitefish, cdk6, is, a, direct]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'miR-34a', in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', our, findings]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, cell, regulatory, 'elements,', partnering, with, either, 'miR-34a', or, 'cdk6,', are, worthy, of, further, screening, to, better, understand, the, molecular, mechanisms, that, underlie, the, physiological, response, of, fish, challenged, with, hepatotoxic, environmental, pollutants, like, microcystins])].
[sujeto(['These', circRNAs]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([gene, expression, by, acting, as, sponges, for, 'micro-RNAs', or, 'RNA-binding', proteins])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, the, 'NR5A1', '(', previously, called, 'Ad4BP', or, 'SF-1)', gene, which, is, exclusively]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, adrenal, cortex, and, steroidogenic, tissue, can, form, atypical, circRNAs, by, unconventional, splicing])].

[sujeto(['Excessive', or, inappropriate, inflammatory, responses, can]), verbo([cause]), complemento([serious, and, even, fatal, diseases])].

[sujeto(['The', 'lethal-7', '(', 'let-7)', family, members, and, their]), verbo([targets]), complemento([are, involved, in, the, development, and, progression, of, tumors])].

[sujeto(['Ten', single, nucleotide, polymorphisms, '(', 'SNPs)', in, the, 'let-7', gene, region, or, their]), verbo([target]), complemento([mRNAs, were, genotyped, using, the, 'MassARRAY', system, and, their, associations, with, the, risk, for, or, overall, survival, of, gastric, cancer, were, analyzed])].

[sujeto(['The', rs10889677, in, the, 3, '\'', -, 'UTR', of, 'IL23R', was, corresponded, to, the, prognosis, of, gastric, cancer, in, a, 'dose-response', 'manner,', in, which, the, death, risk]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, 25, '%', '[', hazard, ratio, '(', 'HR)', =, 1.25, ',', 95, '%', 'CI:', 1.04, -, 1.45, ',', 'P', =, 0.011, ']', with, each, increase, in, the, number, of, 'C', alleles, after, controlling, for, other, potential, clinicopathological, parameters])].

[sujeto(['Protein', structural, vibrations, impact, biology, by, steering, the, structure, to, functional, intermediate, 'states;']), verbo([enhancing]), complemento([tunneling, 'events;', and, optimizing, energy, transfer])].
[sujeto(['Strong', water, absorption, and, a, broad, continuous, vibrational, density, of, states]), verbo([have]), complemento([prevented, optical, identification, of, these, vibrations])].
[sujeto(['The', technique, however]), verbo([has]), complemento([complex, sample, positioning, requirements, and, long, measurement, 'times,', limiting, access, for, the, biomolecular, community])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, a, simplified, system]), verbo([increases]), complemento([spectroscopic, structure, to, dynamically, fingerprint, biomacromolecules, with, a, factor, of, 6, reduction, in, data, acquisition, time])].
[sujeto(['Using', this, 'technique,', polarization, varying, anisotropy, terahertz, 'microscopy,', we, show, sensitivity, to, inhibitor]), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, unique, vibrational, spectra, for, several, proteins, and, an, 'RNA', 'G-quadruplex'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'technique\'s', sensitivity, to, anisotropic, absorbance, and, birefringence]), verbo([provides]), complemento([rapid, assessment, of, macromolecular, dynamics, that, impact, biology])].
[sujeto(['Aromatic', antiepileptic, drugs, '(', 'AEDs)', are, frequently, implicated, in, cutaneous, adverse, drug, reactions, '(', 'cADRs),', a, few, of, which, are]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, certain, human, leukocyte, antigen, '(', 'HLA)', alleles, in, some, populations])].
[sujeto(['We', aimed, to]), verbo([find]), complemento(['HLA-associations', with, 'AED-related', cADRs, among, 'North', 'Indians'])].
[sujeto(['North', 'Indian', subjects, with, cADR, due, to, an, 'AED,', and, those, who, were, 'AED-tolerant', were]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([as, cases, and, 'controls,', respectively])].

[sujeto(['Among', the, severe, 'cADRs,', 'HLA-B*57:01(OR', =, 11.0, 95, '%', 'CI:', 1.41, -, 85.81, ')', and, 'HLA-DRB1*07:01', '(', 'OR', =, 7.25, ;, 95, '%', 'CI:', 1.09, -, 48.18, ')', were, noted, to, be, significantly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'CBZ-induced', 'Stevens', 'Johnson', 'Syndrome', '(', 'SJS)/Toxic', 'Epidermal', 'Necrolysis', '(', 'TEN);', 'HLA-B', *, 51, :, 1, was, associated, with, drug, reaction, eosinophilia, and, systemic, symptoms, '(', 'DRESS)', caused, by, 'PHT', '(', 'OR', =, 6.9, ;, 95, '%', 'CI:', 1.38, -, 34.29, ')'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([significant, associations, of, some, 'HLA', alleles, with, specific, cADRs, to, 'CBZ', and, 'PHT', in, 'North', 'Indians,', which, may, need, to, be, tested, before, 'AED-initiation;', only, screening, for, 'HLA-B*15:02', may, not, help, in, this, population])].
[sujeto(['The', aged, kidney, is, susceptible, to, acute, injury, due, presumably, to, its]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([ability, to, handle, additional, 'challenges,', such, as, endoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'ER)', stress])].
[sujeto(['Injection', of, high, dose]), verbo([caused]), complemento([renal, failure, in, old, 'mice,', not, in, young, mice])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', injection, of, low, dose, resulted, in, severe, renal, damage, in, old, 'mice,', confirming, the]), verbo([increased]), complemento([susceptibility, of, aged, kidney, to, 'ER', stress])].
[sujeto(['There', existed, an, abnormality, in, 'ER', stress, response, kinetics, in, aged, 'kidney,', characterized, by, a]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'XBP-1', splicing, and, decreased, 'PERK-eIF2α', phosphorylation, at, late, time, point])].
[sujeto(['The', presence, of, excessive, oxidative, stress, in, aged, kidney, may, play, a, role, since, high, levels, of, oxidation]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['ER', 'stress-induced', cell, death, and, decreased, 'IRE1', levels, and, 'XBP-1', splicing])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', the]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([ability, to, handle, 'ER', 'stress,', partly, due, to, the, presence, of, excessive, oxidative, 'stress,', may, contribute, to, increased, susceptibility, of, the, aging, kidney, to, acute, injury])].
[sujeto(['Heterozygous', 'loss-of-function', point, mutations, of, miRNA, genes, are]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, several, human, congenital, 'disorders1-5,', but, neomorphic, '(', 'gain-of-new-function)', mutations, in, miRNAs, due, to, nucleotide, substitutions, have, not, been, reported])].
[sujeto(['In', 'chondrocytes,', the, mutation]), verbo([causes]), complemento([widespread, derepression, of, 'wild-type', 'miR-140-5p', targets, and, repression, of, mutant, 'miR-140-5p', 'targets,', indicating, that, the, mutation, produces, both, 'loss-of-function', and, 'gain-of-function', effects])].

[sujeto(['The', structural, protein, 'Gag,']), verbo([found]), complemento([in, all, 'retroviruses,', is, a, polyprotein, comprising, three, major, functional, 'domains:', matrix, '(', 'MA),', capsid, '(', 'CA),', and, nucleocapsid, '(', 'NC)'])].

[sujeto([cruzi, trypomastigotes, '(', 'Ty),', the, classical, infective, 'stage,']), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, extracellular, matrix, '(', 'ECM),', an, obligatory, step, before, invasion, of, almost, all, mammalian, cells, in, different, tissues])].

[sujeto(['Putative', kinases]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, protein, phosphorylation, altered, upon, parasite, incubation, with, 'ECM', were, suggested, by, in, silico, analysis])].

[sujeto(['Local', translation, in, neurites, is, a, phenomenon, that]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([the, spatial, segregation, of, proteins, and, their, functions, away, from, the, cell, 'body,', yet, it, is, unclear, how, local, translation, varies, across, neuronal, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['Most', of, the, mRNAs, discovered, as, being, locally]), verbo([translated]), complemento([have, been, identified, from, hippocampal, neurons, because, their, laminar, organization, facilitates, 'neurite-specific', dissection, and, microscopy, methods])].

[sujeto(['An', oncolytic, herpes, simplex, virus, '(', 'oHSV)']), verbo([has]), complemento([proven, amenable, in, oncolytic, virotherapy, and, was, approved, to, treat, melanoma])].

[sujeto(['UV', crosslinking, and, immunoprecipitation, '(', 'CLIP)', coupled, with, 'high-throughput', sequencing, is, the, most, 'state-of-the-art', technology, to, characterize, 'protein-RNA', 'interactions,', yet, only, a, small, portion, of, 'RNA-binding', proteins, '(', 'RBPs)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, studied, by, 'CLIP', due, to, its, complex, procedures, and, high, level, of, 'false-positive', signals])].

[sujeto(['Viperin']), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, shown, to, catalyze, the, 'SAM-dependent', formation, of, 3, '\'', -, 'deoxy-3\',4\'-didehydro-CTP', '(', 'ddhCTP),', which, inhibits, some, viral, 'RNA', polymerases])].
[sujeto(['Viperin', is, also, implicated, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['Lys-63-linked', polyubiquitination, of, 'interleukin-1', 'receptor-associated', 'kinase-1', '(', 'IRAK1)', by, the, 'E3', ubiquitin, ligase, tumor, necrosis, factor, 'receptor-associated', factor, 6, '(', 'TRAF6)', as, part, of, the, 'Toll-like', 'receptor-7', and, -, 9, '(', 'TLR7/9)', innate, immune, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['In', these, 'pathways,', the, 'poly-ubiquitination', of, 'IRAK1', by, 'TRAF6', is, necessary, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['IRAK1,', which, then, phosphorylates, downstream, targets, and, ultimately, leads, to, the, production, of, type, 'I', interferons])].
[sujeto(['That', viperin, is, a, component, of, these, pathways]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, its, enzymatic, activity, might, be, regulated, by, interactions, with, partner, proteins])].
[sujeto(['To', test, this, 'idea,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([reconstituted, the, interactions, between, 'viperin,', 'IRAK1,', and, 'TRAF6', by, transiently, expressing, these, enzymes, in, 'HEK', 293, 'T', cells])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'IRAK1', and, 'TRAF6']), verbo([increase]), complemento([viperin, activity, '∼10-fold', to, efficiently, catalyze, the, 'radical-mediated', dehydration, of, 'CTP', to, ddhCTP])].

[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, the, synergistic, activation, of, viperin, and, 'IRAK1']), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, mechanism, that, couples, innate, immune, signaling, with, the, production, of, the, antiviral, nucleotide, ddhCTP])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, m6A, modifications, are]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'H/R-treated', cardiomyocytes, and, 'ischemia/reperfusion', '(', 'I/R)-treated', mice, heart])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'METTL3', '(', methyltransferase, like, 3, ')', is, the, primary, factor, involved, in, aberrant, m6A, modification])].
[sujeto(['Silencing', 'METTL3']), verbo([enhances]), complemento([autophagic, flux, and, inhibits, apoptosis, in, 'H/R-treated', cardiomyocytes])].
[sujeto(['However,', overexpression, of, 'METTL3', or, inhibition, of, the, 'RNA', demethylase, 'ALKBH5']), verbo([has]), complemento([an, opposite, 'effect,', suggesting, that, 'METTL3', is, a, negative, regulator, of, autophagy])].
[sujeto(['Mechanistically,', 'METTL3', methylates, 'TFEB,', a, master, regulator, of, lysosomal, biogenesis, and, autophagy, 'genes,', at, two, m6A, residues, in, the, 3, '\'', -, 'UTR,', which]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([the, association, of, the, 'RNA-binding', protein, 'HNRNPD', with, 'TFEB', 'pre-mRNA', and, subsequently, decreases, the, expression, levels, of, 'TFEB'])].
[sujeto(['Further', experiments, show, that, autophagic, flux]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, 'METTL3', deficiency, is, 'TFEB', dependent])].
[sujeto(['In', 'turn,', 'TFEB']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, levels, of, 'METTL3', and, 'ALKBH5', in, opposite, 'directions:', it, induces, 'ALKBH5', and, inhibits, 'METTL3'])].
[sujeto(['TFEB']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'ALKBH5', promoter, and, activates, its, transcription])].

[sujeto(['None', of, the, prediction, programmes, was, able, to, identify, all, of, the, variants, tested, correctly, as, either, '\'', 'damaging\'', '(', 'MH-causative', 'variants,', variants, that, had, been, shown, to, alter, calcium]), verbo([release]), complemento([in, 'cells)', or, as, '\'', 'benign\'', '(', common, sequence, 'variants)'])].

[sujeto(['The', skeletal, muscle, dihydropyridine, receptor, α1S, subunit, plays, a, key, role, in, skeletal, muscle, 'excitation-contraction', coupling, by, sensing, membrane, voltage, changes, and, then]), verbo([triggering]), complemento([intracellular, calcium, release])].
[sujeto(['The', cytoplasmic, loops, connecting, four, homologous, α1S, structural, domains]), verbo([have]), complemento([diverse, 'functions,', but, their, structural, arrangement, is, poorly, understood])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, used, a, novel, 'FRET-based', method, to, characterize, the, relative, proximity, of, these, intracellular, loops, in, α1S, subunits]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, intact, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', dysgenic, 'myotubes,', energy, transfer, was, observed, from, an, 'N-terminal-fused', 'YFP', to, a, 'FRET', 'acceptor,', 'ReAsH', '(', resorufin, arsenical, hairpin, 'binder),']), verbo([targeted]), complemento([to, each, α1S, intracellular, 'loop,', with, the, highest, 'FRET', efficiencies, measured, to, the, α1S, 'II-III', loop, and, 'C-terminal', tail])].
[sujeto(['However,', in, 'HEK-293T', 'cells,', 'FRET', efficiencies, from, the, α1S, 'N', terminus, to, the, 'II-III', and, 'III-IV', loops, and, the, 'C-terminal', tail, were, significantly, 'lower,', thus]), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, these, loop, structures, are, influenced, by, the, cellular, microenvironment])].
[sujeto(['The', addition, of, the, β1a, dihydropyridine, receptor, subunit]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['FRET', to, the, 'II-III', 'loop,', thus, indicating, that, β1a, binding, directly, affects, 'II-III', loop, conformation])].
[sujeto(['This', specific, structural, change]), verbo([required]), complemento([the, 'C-terminal', 36, amino, acids, of, 'β1a,', which, are, essential, to, support, 'EC', coupling])].
[sujeto(['Direct', 'FRET', measurements, between, α1S, and, β1a, confirmed, that, both, wild, type, and, truncated, β1a]), verbo([bind]), complemento([similarly, to, α1S, 'These', results, provide, new, insights, into, the, role, of, 'muscle-specific', proteins, on, the, structural, arrangement, of, α1S, intracellular, loops, and, point, to, a, new, conformational, effect, of, the, β1a, subunit, in, supporting, skeletal, muscle, 'excitation-contraction', coupling])].
[sujeto(['Electrical', activity]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, skeletal, muscle, genes, by, a, process, known, as, '"', 'excitation-transcription"', '(', 'E-T)', coupling])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, release, of, adenosine, 5, '\'', -, triphosphate, '(', 'ATP)', during, depolarization, activates, membrane, 'P2X/P2Y', 'receptors,', being, the, fundamental, mediators, between, electrical, 'stimulation,', slow, intracellular, calcium, 'transients,', and, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, this, signaling, pathway, would]), verbo([require]), complemento([the, proper, coordination, between, the, voltage, sensor, '(', dihydropyridine, 'receptor,', 'DHPR),', pannexin, 1, channels, '(', 'Panx1,', 'ATP', release, 'conduit),', nucleotide, 'receptors,', and, other, signaling, molecules])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([a, very, restricted, location, of, 'Panx1', and, 'Cav3', in, a, putative, 'T-tubule', zone, near, the, 'sarcolemma,', while, 'DHPR', was, highly, expressed, all, along, the, transverse, '(', 'T)-tubule'])].
[sujeto(['By', 'Panx1', 'overexpression,', extracellular, 'ATP', levels, were]), verbo([increased]), complemento([both, at, rest, and, after, electrical, stimulation])].
[sujeto(['Basal', mRNA, levels, of, the, early, gene, cfos, and, the, oxidative, metabolism, markers, citrate, synthase, and, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, gamma, coactivator, 1, -, alpha, '(', 'PGC1α)', were, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, 'Panx1', overexpression])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, the, existence, of, a, relevant, multiprotein, complex, that, coordinates, events]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'E-T', coupling])].
[sujeto(['Unveiling', the, molecular, actors]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, gene, expression, will, contribute, to, the, understanding, and, treatment, of, skeletal, muscle, disorders, due, to, 'wrong-expressed', 'proteins,', as, well, as, to, improve, skeletal, muscle, performance])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', in, 'CAPN3']), verbo([cause]), complemento([limb, girdle, muscular, dystrophy, type, 2, 'A', '(', 'LGMD2A),', a, progressive, muscle, wasting, disease])].
[sujeto(['Ablation', of, 'CAPN3', '(', 'calpain-3', knockout, '(', 'C3KO)', 'mice)']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, reduced, ryanodine, receptor, '(', 'RyR1)', expression, and, abnormal, 'Ca2+/calmodulin-dependent', protein, kinase, 'II', '(', 'Ca-CaMKII)-mediated', signaling])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, 'Ca(2+)', release, measured, by, 'fura2-FF', imaging, in, response, to, single, action, potential, stimulation, was, reduced, in, old, 'C3KO', 'mice;', 'however,', the, use, of, field, stimulation, prevented, investigation, of, the, mechanisms, underlying, this, impairment])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', our, prior, studies, were, conducted, on, older, 'animals,', whose, muscles, showed, advanced, muscular, 'dystrophy,', which]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([us, from, establishing, whether, impaired, 'Ca(2+)', handling, is, an, early, feature, of, disease])].
[sujeto(['Standard', and, confocal, fluorescence, microscopy, was, used, to, study, 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([release]), complemento([in, single, fibers, enzymatically, isolated, from, hind, limb, muscles, of, 'wild-type', and, 'C3KO', mice])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, peak, value, of, 'Ca(2+)', fluxes, elicited, by, single, action, potentials, was, significantly, reduced, by, 15, -, 20, '\240\%', in, 'C3KO', 'fibers,', but, the, kinetics, was, unaltered])].
[sujeto(['Ca(2+)']), verbo([release]), complemento([elicited, by, tetanic, stimulation, was, also, impaired, in, 'C3KO', fibers])].
[sujeto(['Confocal', studies, confirmed, that, 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([release]), complemento([was, similarly, reduced, in, all, triads, of, 'C3KO', mice])].
[sujeto(['Voltage', clamp, experiments, revealed, a, normal, voltage, dependence, of, 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([release]), complemento([in, 'C3KO', mice, but, reduced, peak, 'Ca(2+)', fluxes, as, with, action, potential, stimulation])].
[sujeto(['Confocal', studies, revealed, a, similar]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'Ca(2+)', release, at, all, triads, consistent, with, a, homogenous, reduction, of, functional, voltage, activated, 'Ca(2+)', release, sites])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, decreased, 'Ca(2+)', release, is, an, early, defect, in, calpainopathy, and, may, contribute, to, the, observed, reduction, of, 'CaMKII', activation, in, 'C3KO', mice])].
[sujeto(['Excitation', contraction, 'coupling,', the, rapid, and, massive, 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([release]), complemento([under, control, of, an, action, potential, that, triggers, muscle, 'contraction,', takes, places, at, specialized, regions, of, the, cell, called, triad, junctions])].
[sujeto(['There,', a, highly, ordered, supramolecular, complex, between, the, dihydropyridine, receptor, '(', 'DHPR)', and, the, ryanodine, receptor, '(', 'RyR1)']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([the, 'quasi-instantaneous', conversion, from, 'T-tubule', depolarization, into, 'Ca(2+)', release, from, the, sarcoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'SR)'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'DHPR']), verbo([has]), complemento([several, key, modules, required, for, 'EC', 'coupling:', the, voltage, sensors, and, 'II-III', loop, in, the, alpha1s, 'subunit,', and, the, beta, subunit])].
[sujeto(['To']), verbo([gain]), complemento([insight, into, their, molecular, 'organization,', this, review, examines, the, most, updated, 3, 'D', structure, of, the, 'DHPR', as, obtained, by, transmission, electron, microscopy, and, image, reconstruction])].
[sujeto([1, and, 'RyR1', as, voltage, sensor, and, 'SR', 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([release]), complemento(['channel,', 'respectively,', have, been, established, for, nearly, 25, 'years,', the, mechanism, underlying, communication, between, these, two, channels, remains, undefined])].
[sujeto(['Schwann', cells, are, integral, components, of, vertebrate, neuromuscular, 'synapses;', in, their, 'absence,', 'pre-synaptic', nerve, terminals, withdraw, from, 'post-synaptic', 'muscles,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, muscle, denervation, and, synapse, loss, at, the, developing, neuromuscular, junction, '(', 'NMJ)'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, rescue, of, muscle, denervation, and, neuromuscular, synapses, loss, in, type, 'III', 'Neuregulin', 1, mutant, mice, '(', 'CRD-Nrg1-/-),', which, lack, 'Schwann', cells])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, muscle, denervation, and, neuromuscular, synapse, loss, were, prevented, in, 'CRD-Nrg1-/-mice', when, presynaptic, activity, was, blocked, by, ablating, a, specific, 'gene,', such, as, 'Snap25', '(', 'synaptosomal-associated', 25, kDa, 'protein)', or, 'Chat', '(', choline, 'acetyltransferase)'])].
[sujeto(['Further,', these, effects, were]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, a, pathway, that, requires, postsynaptic, acetylcholine, receptors, '(', 'AChRs),', because, ablating, 'Chrna1', '(', acetylcholine, receptor, α1, 'subunit),', which, encodes, 'muscle-specific', 'AChRs', in, 'CRD-Nrg1-/-mice', also, rescued, muscle, denervation])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', genetically, ablating, muscle, dihydropyridine, receptor, '(', 'DHPR)', β1, subunit, '(', 'Cacnb1)', or, ryanodine, receptor, 1, '(', 'Ryr1)', also, rescued, muscle, denervation, and, neuromuscular, synapse]), verbo([loss]), complemento([in, 'CRD-Nrg1-/-mice'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', these, genetic, manipulations, follow, a, 'pathway-from', presynaptic, to, 'postsynaptic,', 'and,', ultimately, to, muscle, activity]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'DHPRs', and, 'Ryr1'])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', electrophysiological, analyses]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([robust, synaptic, activity, in, the, 'rescued,', 'Schwann-cell', deficient, 'NMJs', in, 'CRD-Nrg1-/-Cacnb1-/-or', 'CRD-Nrg1-/-Ryr1-/-mutant', mice])].
[sujeto(['Instead,', a, blockade, of, muscle, activity]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'DHRPs', and, 'Ryr1', is, both, necessary, and, sufficient, for, preserving, 'NMJs', that, lack, 'Schwann', cells])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, muscle, activity, mediated, by, 'DHPRs/Ryr1', may, destabilize, developing, 'NMJs', and, that, 'Schwann', cells, play, crucial, roles, in, counteracting, such, a, destabilizing, activity, to, preserve, neuromuscular, synapses, during, development])].
[sujeto(['This', study, investigated, the, 'in-season', effect, of, intensified, training, comparing, the, efficacy, of, 'duration-matched', intense, intermittent, exercise, training, with, sprint, interval, training, in]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([intermittent, running, 'performance,', sprint, 'ability,', and, muscle, content, of, proteins, related, to, ion, handling, and, metabolism, in, football, players])].

[sujeto(['AF', inducibility, was, markedly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([after, 'QL', treatment])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'AERP', and, 'DHPR', were, reduced, significantly, in, pacing, rabbits, compared, with, sham, 'rabbits;', treatment, with, 'QL', increased, 'DHPR', and, 'AERP', compared, to, the, pacing, group])].

[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'QL']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([interventricular, septum, thickness, '(', 'IVSd)', and, left, ventricular, 'end-diastolic', diameter, '(', 'LVEDD)'])].

[sujeto(['High', 17, 'β-Estradiol', '(', 'E2)', concentrations, in, isolated, ventricular, myocytes, as, well, as, a, lack, of, ovarian, hormones, in, cardiac, muscle, of, ovariectomized, '(', 'OVX)', rodents]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, lead, to, arrhythmogenic, effects, by, inducing, 'post-translational', 'modifications,', including, phosphorylation, of, the, sarcoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'SR)', 'Ca2+', release, channel, ryanodine, 'receptor-2', '(', 'RyR2)'])].

[sujeto(['Our', results, demonstrate, that, sweroside, may, protect, cardiomyocytes, from, aconitine, toxicity, by]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([intracellular, 'Ca2+', 'homeostasis,', restabilizing, mitochondrial, membrane, potential, '(', 'ΔΨ)', and, avoiding, cell, 'autophagy/apoptosis'])].
[sujeto(['Excitation-contraction', '(', 'EC)', coupling, in, skeletal, muscles, operates, through, a, physical, interaction, between, the, dihydropyridine, receptor, '(', 'DHPR),']), verbo([acting]), complemento([as, a, voltage, 'sensor,', and, the, ryanodine, receptor, '(', 'RyR1),', acting, as, a, calcium, release, channel])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', the, adaptor, protein, 'SH3', and, 'cysteine-rich', containing, protein, 3, '(', 'STAC3)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, a, myopathy, disease, gene, and, as, an, additional, essential, 'EC', coupling, component])].
[sujeto(['STAC3']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'DHPR', sequences, including, the, critical, 'EC', coupling, domain, and, has, been, proposed, to, function, in, linking, the, 'DHPR', and, 'RyR1'])].
[sujeto(['On', the, 'contrary,', 'here,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, endogenous, 'STAC3', incorporates, into, triads, in, the, absence, of, the, 'DHPR', in, myotubes, and, muscle, fibers, of, dysgenic, mice])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([finding]), complemento([demonstrates, that, 'STAC3', interacts, with, additional, triad, proteins, and, is, consistent, with, its, proposed, role, in, directly, or, indirectly, linking, the, 'DHPR', with, the, 'RyR1'])].
[sujeto(['Our', understanding, of, 'ECC']), verbo([has]), complemento([increased, enormously, since, the, early, scientific, descriptions, of, the, phenomenon, of, electrical, activation, of, muscle, contraction, by, 'Galvani', that, date, back, to, the, end, of, the, eighteenth, century])].
[sujeto(['Major', advances, in, electrical, and, optical, 'measurements,', including, muscle, fiber, voltage, clamp, to]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([membrane, electrical, 'properties,', in, conjunction, with, the, development, of, electron, microscopy, to, unveil, structural, details, provided, an, elegant, view, of, 'ECC', in, skeletal, muscle, during, the, last, century])].
[sujeto([1, ')', for, 'ECC', and, of, the, muscle, ryanodine, 'receptor/sarcoplasmic', reticulum, 'Ca2+']), verbo([release]), complemento([channel, '(', 'RyR1),', two, essential, players, of, 'ECC', in, skeletal, muscle])].
[sujeto(['The', present, review, throws, light, upon, the, calcium, flux]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([signaling, channels, like, ryanodine, receptor, complex, '(', 'RyR1),', 'SERCA', '(', 'Sarco-endoplasmic', 'Reticulum', 'Calcium', 'ATPase),', 'DHPR', '(', 'Dihydropyridine', 'Receptor)', or, 'Cav1'])].
[sujeto(['Understanding', these, pathways, will, further]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, insight, for, establishing, new, therapeutic, approaches, for, the, prevention, and, treatment, of, muscle, atrophy, under, stress, 'conditions,', targeting, calcium, ion, channels, and, associated, regulatory, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Patients', suffering, from, type, 1, hypokalaemic, periodic, paralysis, '(', 'HypoPP1)', experience, attacks, of, muscle, paralysis]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, hypokalaemia])].
[sujeto(['The', disease, arises, from, missense, mutations, in, the, gene, encoding, the, 'α1\240\subunit', of, the, dihydropyridine, receptor, '(', 'DHPR),', a, protein, complex, anchored, in, the, tubular, membrane, of, skeletal, muscle, fibres, which, controls, the]), verbo([release]), complemento([of, 'Ca2+', from, sarcoplasmic, reticulum, and, also, functions, as, a, 'Ca2+', channel])].
[sujeto(['Early', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, muscle, fibres, from, 'HypoPP1', patients, are, abnormally, depolarized, at, rest, in, low, 'K+', to, the, point, of, inducing, muscle, inexcitability])].
[sujeto(['The', relationship, between, 'HypoPP1', mutations, and, depolarization]), verbo([has]), complemento([long, remained, unknown])].
[sujeto(['More', recent, investigations, conducted, in, the, closely, structurally, related, 'voltage-gated', 'Na+', and, 'K+', channels]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, comparable, 'S4', arginine, substitutions, gave, rise, to, elevated, inward, currents, at, negative, potentials, called, gating, pore, currents])].
[sujeto(['In', mouse, fibres, transfected, with, 'HypoPP1', mutated, 'channels,', the, elevated, resting, current, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, carry, 'H+', for, the, 'R1239H', 'arginine-to-histidine', mutation, in, a, 'S4', segment, and, 'Na+', for, the, 'V876E', 'HypoPP1', 'mutation,', which, has, the, peculiarity, of, not, being, located, in, 'S4', segments])].
[sujeto(['Muscle', paralysis, probably, results, from, the, presence, of, a, gating, pore, current]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, hypokalaemia, for, both, 'mutations,', possibly, aggravated, by, external, acidosis, for, the, 'R1239H', mutation])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, that, calpains, are, involved, in, the, proteolysis, of, muscle, proteins, that, occurs, with, eccentric, contraction, '(', 'ECC)', and, that, exogenously, applied, nitric, oxide, decreases, the, 'calpain-mediated', proteolysis])].
[sujeto(['Whole', muscle, analyses, '(', the, first, 'experiment)', revealed, that, 'ARG', attenuated, 'ECC-induced', force, deficit, and, autolysis, of, 'calpain-1,', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, amounts, of, 'S-nitrosylated', 'calpain-1'])].
[sujeto(['Regarding', ryanodine, receptor, '(', 'RyR)', and, dihydropyridine, receptor, '(', 'DHPR),', 'ECC-induced', proteolysis, was, completely]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'ARG,', whereas, the, inhibition, was, partial, for, 'junctophilin-1', '(', 'JP1)'])].

[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', treatment, with, high, '[', 'Ca2+', ']', and, 'GSNO']), verbo([caused]), complemento([complete, inhibition, of, 'RyR', and, 'DHPR', proteolysis, and, partial, inhibition, of, 'JP1', proteolysis])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, 'ARG', ingestion, can, attenuate, 'ECC-induced', proteolysis, of, 'Ca2+', regulatory, proteins, and, force, deficit, by]), verbo([decreasing]), complemento([calpain, activation, via, 'S-nitrosylation'])].
[sujeto(['The', type, 1, ryanodine, receptor, '(', 'RyR1)', in, skeletal, muscle, is, a, homotetrameric, protein, that]), verbo([releases]), complemento(['Ca2+', from, the, sarcoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'SR)', in, response, to, an, '"', 'orthograde"', signal, from, the, dihydropyridine, receptor, '(', 'DHPR)', in, the, plasma, membrane, '(', 'PM)'])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', a, '"', 'retrograde"', signal, from, 'RyR1']), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, amplitude, of, the, 'Ca2+', current, produced, by, 'CaV1'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, investigate, whether, the, isolated, cytoplasmic, domain, of, 'RyR1', can]), verbo([interact]), complemento([structurally, or, functionally, with, 'CaV1'])].
[sujeto(['Fluorescence', recovery, after, photobleaching, indicates, that, diffuse, 'RyR11:4300', is, 'mobile,', whereas, resistance, to, being, washed, out, with, a, 'large-bore', micropipette, indicates, that, the, punctate, 'RyR11:4300', stably]), verbo([associates]), complemento([with, 'PM-SR', junctions])].
[sujeto(['Strikingly,', expression, of, 'RyR11:4300', in, dyspedic, myotubes]), verbo([causes]), complemento([an, increased, 'amplitude,', and, slowed, 'activation,', of, 'Ca2+', current, through, 'CaV1'])].
[sujeto(['A', large, fraction, of, these, oligomers, may, be, homotetramers, because, 'freeze-fracture', electron, micrographs]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, the, frequency, of, particles, arranged, like, 'DHPR', tetrads, is, substantially, increased, by, transfecting, 'RyR-null', myotubes, with, 'RyR11:4300', 'In', 'summary,', the, 'RyR1', cytoplasmic, 'domain,', separated, from, its, 'SR', membrane, 'anchor,', retains, a, tendency, toward, 'oligomerization/tetramerization,', binds, to, 'SR-PM', junctions, in, myotubes, only, if, 'CaV1'])].
[sujeto(['Malignant', hyperthermia, '(', 'MH)', susceptibility]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, recently, linked, to, a, novel, variant, of, β1a, subunit, of, the, dihydropyridine, receptor, '(', 'DHPR),', a, channel, essential, for, 'Ca2+', regulation, in, skeletal, muscle])].

[sujeto(['Expression', of, the, variant, subunit, in, 'β1-null', mouse, myotubes, resulted, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([sensitivity, to, caffeine, stimulation])].

[sujeto(['A', permanent, exchange, between, stably, clustered, and, laterally, diffusive, 'extra-clustered', channels]), verbo([maintains]), complemento(['steady-state', levels, of, 'CaV1'])].

[sujeto(['These', comprised, cytokines]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, innate, immunity, and, growth, factors, regulating, liver, regeneration])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([performed, a, screening, for, medicinal, foods, that, inhibit, hepatocytic, lipid, accumulation, through, activation, of, 'AMP-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'AMPK),', which, is, a, critical, regulator, of, the, hepatic, lipid, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, clove, '(', 'Syzygium', 'aromaticum),', which, is, commonly, used, as, a, 'spice,', markedly, inhibits, 'palmitate-inducible', lipid, accumulation, in, human, 'HepG2', hepatocytes])].
[sujeto(['Analyses', of, the, clove, extracts]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'β-caryophyllene,', an, 'orally-active', 'cannabinoid,', is, the, principal, suppressor, of, the, lipid, 'accumulation,', and, stimulates, the, phosphorylation, of, 'AMPK', and, 'acetyl-CoA', carboxylase, 1, '(', 'ACC1)'])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, also, showed, that, 'β-caryophyllene']), verbo([prevents]), complemento([the, translocation, of, sterol, regulatory, 'element-binding', 'protein-1c', '(', 'SREBP-1c)', into, the, nucleus, and, forkhead, box, protein, 'O1', '(', 'FoxO1)', into, the, cytoplasm, through, 'AMPK', 'signaling,', and, 'consequently,', induces, a, significant, downregulation, of, fatty, acid, synthase, '(', 'FAS)', and, upregulation, of, adipose, triglyceride, 'lipase,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we, demonstrated, that, the, 'β-caryophyllene-induced', activation, of, 'AMPK', could, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, cannabinoid, type, 2, 'receptor-dependent', 'Ca2+', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'β-caryophyllene', has, the, potential, efficacy, in, preventing, and, ameliorating, nonalcoholic, fatty, liver, disease, and, its, associated, metabolic, disorders])].
[sujeto(['Histopathology', showed, progressive, tissue, 'damage,', necrosis, '(', 5, 'weeks),', hepatocytic, injury, '(', 10, 'weeks),', anisonucleosis, with, presence, of, prominent, 'nucleoli,', sinusidal, 'dilations,', and, lymphomono]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([inflammation, '(', 18, 'weeks)'])].
[sujeto(['Hep3B', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, a, reliable, and, more, sensitive, towards, 'DEN', toxicity, compared, to, 'HepG2', and, 'HuH7', cells])].
[sujeto(['ACT']), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['DEN-induced', cytotoxicity, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')', ',', 'DNA', 'damage,', and, genotoxicity, '(', micronuclei, 'test,', 'DNA', ladder, 'test,', 'Hoechst', 'staining,', cell, cycle, 'analysis)'])].
[sujeto(['ACT', significantly, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')', scavenged, 'DEN-induced', reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', levels, and]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([mitochondrial, membrane, potential, '(', 'MMP)', loss])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, chemoprotective, effect, of, 'ACT', is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'STAT-3', dependent, regulation, of, oxidative, stress, and, apoptosis, and, 'ACT', has, potential, to, be, developed, as, a, chemopreventive, agent])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increasing]), complemento([demand, and, hampered, use, of, primary, human, hepatocytes, for, research, purposes, have, urged, scientists, to, search, for, alternative, cell, 'sources,', such, as, immortalized, hepatic, cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['Following', transduction, of, adult, human, primary, hepatocytes, with, the, selected, immortalization, 'genes,', cell, growth, was]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([and, a, cell, line, was, established])].

[sujeto(['Long', noncoding, 'RNAs', '(', 'lncRNAs)']), verbo([have]), complemento([emerged, as, critical, players, in, cellular, cholesterol, 'metabolism,', but, their, functions, are, not, systematically, clarified])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, a, novel, lncRNA, named, 'lnc-HC', negatively, regulating, cholesterol, metabolism, within, hepatocytes, through, physical, interaction, with, hnRNPA2B1])].

[sujeto(['The', death, rate, from, hepatocellular, carcinoma, '(', 'HCC)', is, 'increasing,', and, liver, cancer, is, the, second]), verbo([leading]), complemento([cause, of, 'cancer-related', mortality, worldwide])].

[sujeto(['However,', no, correlation, between, 'HNF-1B', expression, and, survival, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 'ICC', patients])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', mature, hepatocytes]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, low, proliferative, potency, and, high, metabolic, functions])].
[sujeto(['Cell', proliferation, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, cell, 'cycle-related', molecules])].

[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, hepatoblasts, in, 'p57(Kip2)-/-', mice, were, highly, proliferative, and, had, deficient, maturation, compared, with, those, in, 'wild-type', '(', 'WT)', mice])].

[sujeto(['Disruption', of, myeloid, 'PTEN-activated', 'b-catenin']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, gamma, '(', 'PPARγ)-mediated', 'Jagged-1/Notch', signaling, and, induced, forkhead, box, 'P3', '(', 'FOXP3)1', 'Tregs', while, inhibiting, 'T', helper, 17, cells])].
[sujeto(['However,', blocking, of, 'Notch', signaling, by]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento(['γ-secretase', reversed, myeloid, 'PTEN', 'deficiency-mediated', protection, in, 'ischemia/reperfusion-triggered', liver, inflammation, with, reduced, 'FOXP3+', and, increased, retinoid, 'A', 'receptor-related', orphan, receptor, gamma, 't-mediated', interleukin, 17, 'A', expression, in, ischemic, livers])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', knockdown, of, 'β-catenin', or, 'PPARγ', in, 'PTEN-deficient', macrophages]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['Jagged-1/Notch', activation, and, reduced, 'FOXP3+', 'Treg', 'induction,', leading, to, increased, proinflammatory, mediators, in, 'macrophage/T', cell, cocultures])].

[sujeto(['Thus,', use, of, 'small-molecule', activators, of, 'Sirt1', presents, a, novel, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, cholestatic, liver, injury])].
[sujeto(['Increasing', evidence, indicates, that, 'AhR', signaling, contributes, to, wound, 'healing,', which]), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, coordinated, deposition, and, remodeling, of, the, extracellular, matrix])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'liver,', wound, healing, is, attributed, to, the, activation, of, hepatic, stellate, cells, '(', 'HSCs),', which]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([fibrogenesis, through, the, production, of, soluble, mediators, and, collagen, type, 'I'])].
[sujeto(['We', recently]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, 'TCDD', treatment, increases, the, activation, of, human, 'HSCs', in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['Results', indicate, that, 'TCDD']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['liver-body-weight', 'ratios,', serum, alanine, aminotransferase, 'activity,', and, hepatic, necroinflammation, in, 'CCl4-treated', mice])].
[sujeto(['Likewise,', 'TCDD', treatment]), verbo([increased]), complemento([mRNA, expression, of, 'HSC', activation, and, fibrogenesis, 'genes,', namely, 'α-smooth', muscle, 'actin,', 'desmin,', 'delta-like', 'homolog-1,', 'TGF-β1,', and, collagen, type, 'I'])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'TCDD', treatment, did, not, exacerbate, 'fibrosis,', nor, did, it]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, collagen, content, of, the, liver])].
[sujeto(['Instead,', 'TCDD']), verbo([increased]), complemento([hepatic, collagenase, activity, and, increased, expression, of, matrix, metalloproteinase, '(', 'MMP)-13', and, the, matrix, regulatory, 'proteins,', 'TIMP-1', and, 'PAI-1'])].
[sujeto(['These', results, support, the, conclusion, that, 'TCDD']), verbo([increases]), complemento(['CCl4-induced', liver, damage, and, exacerbates, 'HSC', 'activation,', yet, collagen, deposition, and, the, development, of, fibrosis, may, be, limited, by, 'TCDD-mediated', changes, in, extracellular, matrix, remodeling])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Hippo', pathway]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, 'down-stream', target, 'Yes-associated', protein, '(', 'YAP)', to, maintain, organ, 'homeostasis,', which, is, commonly, inactivated, in, many, types, of, cancers])].
[sujeto(['However,', how, cell, adhesion, dysregulates, the, 'Hippo', pathway]), verbo([activating]), complemento(['YAP', oncogene, in, hepatocellular, carcinoma, '(', 'HCC)', remains, unclear])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, demonstrate, that, α2β1, integrin, '(', but, not, other, β1, 'integrins)']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'HCC', 'cells,', after, binding, to, collagen, extracellular, 'matrix,', could, inhibit, 'MST1', kinase, phosphorylation, and, activate, 'YAP', 'pro-oncogenic', activities])].
[sujeto(['Knockdown', of, integrin, α2, gene, '(', 'ITGA2)']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['YAP', targeted, gene, expression, in, vitro])].
[sujeto([α2β1, and, collagen]), verbo([binding]), complemento([resulted, in, suppressing, 'Hippo', signaling, of, mammalian, sterile, 20, -, like, kinase, 1, '(', 'MST1)', and, 'Large', tumor, suppressor, homolog, 1, '(', 'LATS1)', with, concomitant, activation, of, 'YAP-mediated', connective, tissue, growth, factor, '(', 'CTGF)', gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro, kinase, assay, showed, that, 'MST1', is, an, immediate, downstream]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, integrin, α2, with, 'S1180', residue, as, the, critical, phosphorylation, site])].
[sujeto(['Clinical', correlational, analysis, using, a, gene, expression, dataset, of, 228, 'HCC', tumors, revealed, that, 'ITGA2', expression, was, significantly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, tumor, 'progression,', and, 'co-expression', with, 'YAP', targeted, genes, '(', 'AXL', receptor, tyrosine, 'kinase,', 'CTGF,', cyclin, 'D1,', glypican, 3, ',', insulin, like, growth, factor, 1, 'receptor,', and, 'SRY-box', 4, ')', correlated, with, survivals, of, 'HCC', patients])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', α2β1, integrin, activation, through, cellular, adhesion, impacts, the, 'Hippo', pathway, in, solid, tumors, and]), verbo([modulates]), complemento(['MST1-YAP', signaling, cascade])].
[sujeto(['Receptor', tyrosine, kinases, 'MET', and, epidermal, growth, factor, receptor, '(', 'EGFR)', are, critically]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, initiation, of, liver, regeneration])].
[sujeto(['Other', cytokines, and, signaling, molecules, also]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, the, early, part, of, the, process])].
[sujeto(['Our', present, 'study,', 'however,', shows, that, combined, systemic, elimination, of, 'MET', and, 'EGFR', signaling, '(', 'MET', knockout, +, 'EGFR-inhibited', 'mice)', abolishes, liver, 'regeneration,']), verbo([prevents]), complemento([restoration, of, liver, 'mass,', and, leads, to, liver, decompensation])].

[sujeto(['There', 'was,', 'however,']), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, genes, of, plasma, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Hepatocyte', average, volume]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([to, 35, '%', of, 'control,', with, a, proportional, decrease, in, the, dimensions, of, the, hepatic, lobules])].
[sujeto(['Mice', died, at, 15, -, 18, days, after, hepatectomy, with, 'ascites,']), verbo([increased]), complemento([plasma, 'ammonia,', and, very, small, livers])].
[sujeto(['MET', and, 'EGFR', separately, control, many, nonoverlapping, signaling, 'endpoints,', allowing, for, compensation, when, only, one, of, the, signals, is, 'blocked,', though, the, combined, elimination, of, the, signals, is, not, 'tolerated;', the, results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([critical, new, information, on, interactive, 'MET', and, 'EGFR', signaling, and, the, contribution, of, their, combined, absence, to, regeneration, arrest, and, liver, decompensation])].
[sujeto(['Liver', receptor, homolog, 1, '(', 'NR5A2,', 'LRH-1)', is, an, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptor, that, regulates, diverse, biological, 'processes,', including, 'metabolism,', 'proliferation,', and, the, resolution, of, endoplasmic, reticulum, stress])].
[sujeto(['Although', preclinical, and, cellular, studies, demonstrate, that, 'LRH-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([great, potential, as, a, therapeutic, target, for, metabolic, diseases, and, 'cancer,', development, of, 'LRH-1', modulators, has, been, difficult])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', systematic, modifications, to, one, of, the, few, known, chemical, scaffolds, capable, of]), verbo([activating]), complemento(['LRH-1', failed, to, improve, efficacy, substantially])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', mechanisms, through, which, 'LRH-1', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, synthetic, ligands, are, entirely, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, use, 'x-ray', crystallography, and, other, structural, methods, to, explore, conformational, changes, and, 'receptor-ligand', interactions]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'LRH-1', activation, by, a, set, of, related, agonists])].
[sujeto(['Unlike', phospholipid, 'LRH-1', 'ligands,', these, agonists]), verbo([bind]), complemento([deep, in, the, pocket, and, do, not, interact, with, residues, near, the, mouth, nor, do, they, expand, the, pocket, like, phospholipids])].
[sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', two, closely, related, agonists, with, similar, efficacies, '(', 'GSK8470', and, 'RJW100)', exhibit, completely, different]), verbo([binding]), complemento([modes])].
[sujeto(['The', dramatic, repositioning, is, influenced, by, a, differential, ability, to, establish, stable, 'face-to-face', 'π-π-stacking', with, the, 'LRH-1', residue, 'His-390,', as, well, as, by, a, novel, polar, interaction]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, 'RJW100', hydroxyl, group])].
[sujeto(['The', differing]), verbo([binding]), complemento([modes, result, in, distinct, mechanisms, of, action, for, the, two, agonists])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we, identify, a, network, of]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([water, molecules, near, the, 'ligand-binding', site, that, are, important, for, activation, by, both, agonists])].
[sujeto(['This', work]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, previously, unappreciated, complexity, associated, with, 'LRH-1', agonist, development, and, offers, insights, into, rational, design, strategies])].
[sujeto(['Among', multiple, factors, influencing, macrophage, infiltration, to, 'allografts,', the, fractalkine, chemokine, '(', 'C-X3-C', 'motif)', ligand, 1, '(', 'CX3CL1)/chemokine', '(', 'C-X3-C', 'motif)', receptor, 1, '(', 'CX3CR1)', signaling, pathway, and, actin, 'cytoskeleton,', which, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, a, small, 'guanosine-5׳-triphosphatase', 'Ras', homolog, gene, family, member, 'A', '(', 'RhoA),', are, of, the, utmost, importance])].
[sujeto(['Hearts', from, 'BALB/c', '(', 'H-2d)', donors, were, transplanted, into, 'RhoAflox/flox', '(', no, 'Cre)', and, heterozygous, 'Lyz2Cre+/-RhoAflox/flox', recipients, treated, with, cytotoxic, 'T-lymphocyte-associated', protein, 4, immunoglobulin, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([early, 'T-cell', response])].

[sujeto(['The', 'RhoA', deletion, downregulated, 'G', 'protein-coupled', fractalkine, receptor, 'CX3CR1,', which]), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'RhoA', pathway, and, controls, 'monocyte/macrophage', trafficking, into, the, vascular, endothelium])].

[sujeto(['In', addition, to, 'HRT,', tissue, regeneration, using, stem, cells, is, predicted, to]), verbo([provide]), complemento([novel, therapy])].
[sujeto(['Among', various, stem, cell, 'types,', mesenchymal, stem, cells, can, be, differentiated, into, steroidogenic, cells, following, ectopic, expression, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, '(', 'NR)', 5, 'A', subfamily, 'proteins,', steroidogenic, 'factor-1', '(', also, known, as, adrenal, 4, binding, 'protein)', and, liver, receptor, 'homolog-1,', with, the, aid, of, cAMP, signaling])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', these, approaches, cannot, be, applied, to, pluripotent, stem, 'cells,', such, as, embryonic, stem, cells, and]), verbo([induced]), complemento([pluripotent, stem, 'cells,', because, of, poor, survival, following, cytotoxic, expression, of, 'NR5A', subfamily, proteins])].
[sujeto(['This', approach, offers, a, potential, suitable, cells, for, future, regenerative, medicine, and, gene, therapy, for, diseases]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, steroidogenesis, deficiencies])].
[sujeto(['It', represents, a, powerful, tool, to, investigate, the, molecular, mechanisms]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, steroidogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Controversy', exists, which, 'S1P', 'receptors,', 'S1P1', and, 'S1P3', vs, 'S1P2,', would, be, importantly]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, its, mechanism])].
[sujeto([mRNA, levels, of, sphingosine, kinase, 1, '(', 'SK1)', but, not, 'SK2', were]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, livers, with, fibrosis, stages, 3, -, 4, compared, to, those, with, 0, -, 2, and, to, normal, liver])].

[sujeto(['The', stepwise, progression, of, common, endoderm, progenitors, into, differentiated, liver, and, pancreas, organs, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, a, dynamic, array, of, signals, that, are, not, well, understood])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, subfamily, 5, ',', group, 'A,', member, 2, gene, 'nr5a2,', also, known, as, 'Liver', receptor, 'homolog-1', '(', 'Lrh-1)', is, expressed, in, several, tissues, including, the, developing, liver, and, pancreas])].
[sujeto(['Zygotic']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, nr5a2, in, a, targeted, genetic, null, mutant, disrupted, the, development, of, the, exocrine, pancreas, and, 'liver,', while, leaving, the, endocrine, pancreas, intact])].

[sujeto(['Conventional', efforts, relying, on, 'high-throughput', physical, and, virtual, screening, of, large, compound, libraries]), verbo([have]), complemento([failed, to, yield, 'high-efficiency', chemical, probes, for, many, of, the, 48, human, nuclear, receptors])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, investigated, whether, 'disulfide-trapping,', an, approach, new, to]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['receptors,', would, provide, effective, lead, compounds, targeting, human, liver, receptor, homolog, 1, '(', 'hLRH-1,', 'NR5A2)'])].
[sujeto(['Despite', the, fact, that, 'hLRH-1', contains, a, large, ligand]), verbo([binding]), complemento([pocket, and, binds, phospholipids, with, high, 'affinity,', existing, synthetic, 'hLRH-1', ligands, are, of, limited, utility, due, to, poor, 'solubility,', low, efficacy, or, significant, 'off-target', effects])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'disulfide-trapping,', we, identified, a]), verbo([lead]), complemento([compound, that, conjugates, with, remarkably, 'high-efficiency', to, a, native, cysteine, residue, '(', 'Cys346)', lining, the, hydrophobic, cavity, in, the, ligand, binding, domain, of, 'hLRH-1'])].
[sujeto(['Guided', by, computational, modeling, and, cellular, 'assays,', the]), verbo([lead]), complemento([compound, was, elaborated, into, ligands, 'PME8', and, 'PME9', that, bind, 'hLRH-1', reversibly, '(', no, cysteine, 'reactivity)', and, increase, 'hLRH-1', activity, in, cells])].
[sujeto(['When', compared, with, the, existing, 'hLRH-1', synthetic, agonist, 'RJW100,', both, 'PME8', and, 'PME9', showed, comparable, induction, of, the, 'LRH-1', dependent]), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, 'CYP24A1', in, human, 'HepG2', 'cells,', beginning, as, early, as, 3, h, after, drug, treatment])].
[sujeto(['These', data, show, that, 'PME8', and, 'PME9', are, potent, activators, of, 'hLRH-1', and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, with, further, development, this, lead, series, may, yield, useful, chemical, probes, for, manipulating, 'LRH-1', activity, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['On', 'average,', more, than, 700, differentially]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([genes, '(', 'DEGs)', were, identified, of, which, 146, are, mechanistically, linked, to, 'LD', formation])].
[sujeto(['We', identified, 51, 'LD-associated', 'DEGs', frequently]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, patient, samples, '(', range, '≥5', to, '≤102)', with, the, 'liver-receptor', 'homolog-1(NR5A2),', that, 'is,', a, key, regulator, of, cholesterol, metabolism, being, commonly, repressed, among, 100, patients, examined])].
[sujeto(['With', bland, 'steatosis,', notable, regulations]), verbo([involved]), complemento(['hypoxia-inducible', lipid, 'droplet-associated-protein', and, 'diacylglycerol-O-acyltransferase-2', renowned, for, their, role, in, 'LD-growth'])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', nonalcoholic, 'steatohepatitis-associated', 'DEGs', coded, for, epidermal, growth, factor, receptor, and, 'TLR4', signaling, with]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([expression, of, the, 'GTPase', 'Rab5', and, the, lipid, phosphohydrolase, 'PPAP2B', thus, highlighting, adaptive, responses, to, 'inflammation,', 'LDL-mediated', endocytosis, and, 'lipogenesis,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Studies', with, steatotic, primary, human, hepatocyte, cultures, demonstrated, induction, of, 'LD-associated', 'PLIN2,', 'CIDEC,', 'DNAAF1,', whereas]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([expression, of, 'CPT1A,', 'ANGPTL4,', and, 'PKLR', informed, on, burdened, mitochondrial, metabolism])].

[sujeto(['Lastly,', 'STRING', network, analysis, highlighted, potential, '"', 'druggable"']), verbo([targets]), complemento([with, 'PLIN2,', 'CIDEC,', and, 'hypoxia-inducible', lipid, 'droplet-associated-protein', being, confirmed, by, immunofluorescence, microscopy])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', steatosis, and, steatohepatitis, specific, gene, regulations, informed, on, the, pathogenesis, of, 'NAFLD', to, broaden, the, perspective, of]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapies])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, identify, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, liver, receptor, homolog, 1, '(', 'LRH-1)', as, a, key, regulator, in, the, process, of, hepatic, tumorigenesis, through, the, coordination, of, a, noncanonical, glutamine, pathway, that, is, reliant, on, the, mitochondrial, and, cytosolic, transaminases, glutamate, pyruvate, transaminase, 2, '(', 'GPT2)', and, glutamate, oxaloacetate, transaminase, 1, '(', 'GOT1),', which, fuel, anabolic, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['In', 'particular,', we, show, that]), verbo([gain]), complemento([and, loss, of, function, of, hepatic, 'LRH-1', modulate, the, expression, and, activity, of, mitochondrial, glutaminase, 2, '(', 'GLS2),', the, first, and, 'rate-limiting', step, of, this, pathway])].
[sujeto(['The', robust, reduction, in, glutaminolysis, and, the, limiting, availability, of, 'α-ketoglutarate', in, turn]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([mTORC1, signaling, to, eventually, block, cell, growth, and, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', these, studies, highlight, the, importance, of, 'LRH-1', in, coordinating, 'glutamine-induced', metabolism, and, signaling, to]), verbo([promote]), complemento([hepatocellular, carcinogenesis])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, that, 'Methyl-CpG', binding, protein, 2, '(', 'MeCP2)', had, a, high, expression, in, liver, fibrosis, and, played, a, central, role, in, its, pathobiology])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, a, cryptolepine, derivative, '(', 'HZ-6h)', could, inhibit, liver, fibrosis, by, reducing, 'MeCP2', 'expression,', as, evidenced, by, the, dramatic, downregulation, of, 'α-smooth', muscle, actin, '(', 'α-SMA)', and, type, 'I', collagen, 'alpha-1', '(', 'Col1α1)', in, protein, levels, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['Meanwhile,', we, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'HZ-6h', could, reduce, the, cell, viability, and, promote, apoptosis, of, hepatic, stellate, cells, '(', 'HSCs)', treated, with, transforming, growth, factor, beta, 1, '(', 'TGF-β1)'])].
[sujeto(['Then,', we, investigated, the, potential, molecular, mechanisms, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'HZ-6h', blocked, 'Shh', signaling, in, 'HSC-T6', 'cells,', resulting, in, the, decreased, protein, expression, of, 'Patched-1', '(', 'PTCH-1),', 'Sonic', hedgehog, '(', 'Shh),', and, 'glioma-associated', oncogene, homolog, 1, '(', 'GLI1)'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'short,', these, results, indicate, that, 'HZ-6h']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([liver, fibrosis, by, downregulating, 'MeCP2', through, the, 'Shh', pathway, in, 'TGF-β1-induced', 'HSC-T6', cells])].
[sujeto(['The', asialoglycoprotein, receptor, '(', 'ASGR),', which, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([mainly, in, 'hepatocytes,', is, downregulated, in, poorly, differentiated, hepatocellular, carcinoma, '(', 'HCC)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'ASGR1', was, downregulated, in, 'HCC', tissue, compared, with, adjacent, 'non-tumorous', liver, tissue, and, that, lower, 'ASGR1', expression, was, associated, with, higher, 'TNM', stage, and, poorer, prognosis, in, 'HCC', patients])].
[sujeto(['ASGR1', overexpression]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([hepatoma, cell, migration, and, invasion, in, vitro, and, in, 'vivo,', while, 'ASGR1', knockdown, had, the, opposite, effects])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'ASGR1']), verbo([interacted]), complemento([directly, with, human, longevity, assurance, homolog, 2, of, yeast, 'LAG1', '(', 'LASS2)'])].
[sujeto(['ASGR1']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['V-ATPase', activity, in, hepatoma, 'cells,', and, this, was, reversed, by, 'LASS2', knockdown])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'ASGR1', may]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, potential, metastasis, suppressor, in, 'HCC,', and, the, combination, of, 'ASGR1', and, 'LASS2', may, help, predict, the, prognosis, of, 'HCC', patients])].
[sujeto(['Liver', receptor, 'homolog-1', '(', 'LRH1)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, promote, tumor, proliferation, and, development])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, functions, of, 'LRH1', in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([cancer, cells, chemoresistance, are, still, not, clear])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento(['LRH1', levels, were, significantly, elevated, in, primary, breast, cancer, tissues, in, patients, who, developed, early, recurrence])].
[sujeto(['Comet', and, 'BrdU', assays, showed, overexpression, of, 'LRH1', blocked, breast, cancer, cells, 'DNA', damage, by, chemotherapeutic, 'drug,', whereas, depletion, of, 'LRH1']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['DNA', damage])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', knockdown, of, 'LRH1']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, levels, and, foci, of, 'DNA', damage, marker, γH2AX, induced, by, 'ADR', and, 'DDP'])].

[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, 'LRH-1', transcriptional, program, is, highly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, a, signature, of, poor, outcome, and, 'high-grade', breast, cancer, tumors, in, vivo])].

[sujeto(['The', thyroid, hormone, '(', 3, ',', 5, ',', 3, '\'', -, 'triiodothyronine)', receptor, '(', 'T3R)', belongs, to, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, superfamily, of, 'ligand-inducible', transcription, factors])].

[sujeto(['This', analysis, showed, that, the, activity, of, the, human, 'LXRα', promoter, was, significantly, reduced, by, deleting, 'the\240\-111', 'to\240\-42', region]), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([the, presence, of, positive, regulatory, elements, in, this, short, proximal, fragment])].

[sujeto(['The', accumulation, of, the, major, sperm, calcium, efflux, pump, '(', 'PMCA4)', was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, 'Lxrα;β', -, /, -, males, fed, the, 'HCD', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, vs, 'Lxrα;β', -, /, -, and, 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, vs, 'wt)'])].
[sujeto(['It', may]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, the, identification, of, fertility, prognostic, markers, in, this, pathophysiological, 'situation,', which, could, help, clinicians, to, better, understand, male, infertilities, which, are, thus, far, classified, as, idiopathic])].
[sujeto(['Exposure', to, metabolic, stress]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, to, influence, the, susceptibility, to, metabolic, disorders, in, offspring, according, to, epidemiological, and, animal, studies])].
[sujeto(['All', offspring, were]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([on, 'CD'])].
[sujeto(['Male', founder, 'obesity,', instigated, by, 'HFD,']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, glucose, dysregulation, transmitted, down, to, 'F2'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'F2', males, to, 'HFD', founders, were, overweight, and, had, a, high, fasting, glucose, relative, to, 'F2', to, 'CD', founders])].
[sujeto(['The', 'sex-specific', difference, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, distinct, transcriptional, patterns, in, 'metabolism-related', 'organs,', showing, altered, hepatic, glycolysis, and, decreased, adipose, 'Glucose', transporter, 4, '(', 'Glut4)', in, males, and, increased, gluconeogenesis, and, lipid, synthesis, in, females])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, changes, in, females, were, linked, to, hepatic, 'ER', 'stress,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, suppressed, insulin, signaling, and, 'non-obese', hyperglycemic, phenotypes])].
[sujeto(['Accumulating', evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, macrophage, polarization, into, an, 'anti-inflammatory', 'M2', state, is, a, key, characteristic, of, atherosclerotic, plaques, undergoing, regression])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, the, transcription, factor, 'MafB', plays, pivotal, roles, in, promoting, macrophage, 'M2', polarization])].
[sujeto(['Further,', 'MafB']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([cholesterol, efflux, from, macrophage, foam, cells, by, directly, 'up-regulating', its, key, cellular, mediators])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', 'MafB', expression, is, significantly, 'up-regulated', in, response, to, various, metabolic, and, immunological, stimuli, that]), verbo([promote]), complemento([macrophage, 'M2', polarization, or, cholesterol, 'efflux,', and, thereby, 'MafB', mediates, their, beneficial, 'effects,', in, both, liver, x, receptor, '(', 'LXR)-dependent', and, independent, manners])].
[sujeto(['Using', an, integrative, systems, biology, 'approach,', we, also, revealed, that, 'M2', polarization, and, cholesterol, efflux, do, not, necessarily, represent, 'inter-dependent', 'events,', but, 'MafB', is, broadly]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, both, the, processes])].
[sujeto(['Inflammatory', factors]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'NF-κB', play, a, significant, role, in, 'PAH', and, myocardial, hypertrophy])].
[sujeto(['LXR', activation, may]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([myocardial, hypertrophy, via, suppressing, inflammatory, 'pathways;', it, is, unknown, whether, 'LXR', is, also, involved, in, 'PAH-induced', myocardial, hypertrophy, or, remodeling])].
[sujeto(['Through', 'RT-PCR,', 'Western', blot, and, 'ELISA', 'examination,', 'NF-κB,', 'IL-6,', 'TNF-α,', and, iNOS, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, significantly, reduced, in, 'PAH', rats, treated, with, 'T0901317', compared, to, 'PAH', rats, treated, with, 'DMSO'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'LXR', activation, may]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['PAH-induced', cardiac, hypertrophy, and, remodeling, by, inhibiting, 'NF-κB-mediated', inflammatory, pathways])].
[sujeto(['With', emerging, evidence, connecting, cholesterol, dysregulation, with, disturbed, pulmonary, 'homeostasis,', we, are, wondering, if, diet]), verbo([induced]), complemento([hypercholesterolemia, would, influence, the, susceptibility, to, chemical, induced, lung, tumorigenesis, in, mice])].
[sujeto(['Compared', to, the, urethane, treated, 'ND-fed', 'mice,', the, 'HCD-fed', mice, exhibited, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([lung, tumor, multiplicity, and, attenuated, pulmonary, 'inflammation,', which, including, reduced, influx, of, leukocytes, and, down, regulated, 'tumor-promoting', 'cyto-/chemokine', profile, in, bronchoalveolar, lavage, 'fluid,', decreased, 'TLR2/4', expression, and, 'NF-κB', activation, in, the, lung])].
[sujeto(['As', a, sensor]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([intracellular, cholesterol, 'homeostasis,', nuclear, receptor, 'LXR-α', was, 'up-regulated', significantly, in, the, urethane, treated, 'HCD-fed', mice, lungs, compared, to, the, 'ND-fed', mice, 'lungs,', accompanied, with, decreased, pulmonary, free, cholesterol, content, and, suppressed, tumor, cell, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, intrapulmonary, cholesterol, 'homeostasis,', other, than, systematic, cholesterol, 'level,', is, important, in, lung, 'tumorigenesis,', and, 'LXR', activation, might, partly, contribute, to, the, inhibitory, role, of, atherogenic, diet, on, lung, tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['LXRα/β', double, knockout, '(', 'LXRα-/-/β-/-)', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([reduced, 'feeding-induced', nuclear, 'O-linked', 'N-acetylglucosamine', '(', 'O-GlcNAc)', 'signaling,', 'ChREBPα', 'activity,', and, lipogenic, gene, expression, in, 'livers,', suggesting, important, roles, for, 'LXRs', in, linking, hepatic, glucose, utilization, to, lipid, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['This', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, lower, expression, of, liver, 'pyruvate-kinase', '(', 'L-pk)', and, 'Chrebpβ,', indicating, reduced, 'ChREBPα', activity, in, glucose, 'fed,', but, not, fructose, fed, mice])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'ChREBP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, 'L-pk', promoter, was, increased, in, fructose, fed, 'LXRα-/-', 'mice,', concomitant, with, increased, 'glucose-6-phosphatase', '(', 'G6pc)', expression, and, 'O-GlcNAc', modified, 'LXRβ,', suggesting, a, role, for, 'LXRβ', in, regulating, 'ChREBPα', activity, upon, fructose, feeding])].
[sujeto(['The', iodothyronine, deiodinases, are, selenoenzymes, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, activity, of, thyroid, hormone, via, specific, 'inner-', or, 'outer-ring', deiodination])].
[sujeto(['In', 'humans,', type, 1, deiodinase, '(', 'D1)', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, 'liver,', but, the, mechanism, by, which, its, gene, expression, is, regulated, remains, to, be, elucidated])].
[sujeto(['Liver', 'X', receptor, α, '(', 'LXRα),', a, transcription, factor, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, 'superfamily,', is, highly, expressed, in, the, 'liver,', where, it, functions, as, a, sensor, for, excess, intracellular, oxysterols])].
[sujeto(['LXRα']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, other, nuclear, receptors, on, promoters, of, genes, that, contain, a, binding, core, sequence, for, nuclear, receptors])].

[sujeto(['An']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, hDIO1, expression, was, observed, in, 'LXRα-stimulated', 'cells,', but, absent, in, 'cycloheximide-treated', 'cells,', indicating, that, new, protein, synthesis, is, required, for, 'LXRα-mediated', regulation, of, hDIO1])].
