[sujeto(['Oxidative', stress]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['macroautophagy/autophagy', and, contributes, to, atherogenesis, via, lipophagic, 'flux,', a, form, of, lipid, removal, by, autophagy])].
[sujeto(['However,', it, is, not, known, exactly, how, endogenous, antioxidant, enzymes, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, lipophagic, flux])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, the, antioxidant, 'PRDX1', '(', peroxiredoxin, 1, ')']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, crucial, role, in, the, maintenance, of, lipophagic, flux, in, macrophages])].
[sujeto(['PRDX1', is, more, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([than, other, antioxidant, enzymes, in, monocytes, and, macrophages])].
[sujeto(['We', determined, that, 'Prdx1', deficiency]), verbo([induced]), complemento([excessive, oxidative, stress, and, impaired, maintenance, of, autophagic, flux, in, macrophages])].
[sujeto(['This', perturbation, in, cholesterol, homeostasis, was, due, to, impaired, lipophagic, cholesterol, hydrolysis]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, excessive, oxidative, 'stress,', resulting, in, the, inhibition, of, free, cholesterol, formation, and, the, reduction, of, 'NR1H3', '(', nuclear, receptor, subfamily, 1, ',', group, 'H,', member, 3, ')', activity])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, this, 'observation,', apoe, -, /, -, mice, transplanted, with, bone, marrow, from, 'prdx1-/-apoe-/-', mice, had]), verbo([increased]), complemento([plaque, formation, compared, with, 'apoe-/-', 'BM-transplanted', recipients])].
[sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, 'PRDX1', is, crucial, to, regulating, lipophagic, flux, and, maintaining, macrophage, cholesterol, homeostasis, against, oxidative, stress])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'PRDX1-dependent', control, of, oxidative, stress, may, provide, a, strategy, for, treating, atherosclerosis, and, 'autophagy-related', human, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Diabesity', and, fatty, liver]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, associated, with, low, levels, of, 'high-density', lipoprotein, 'cholesterol,', and, thus, could, impair, 'macrophage-specific', reverse, cholesterol, transport, '(', 'm-RCT)'])].
[sujeto(['Abcg5/g8', sterol, 'transporters,', which, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cholesterol, trafficking, into, 'bile,', as, well, as, other, 'LXR', 'targets,', could, be, compromised, in, the, livers, of, obese, individuals])].
[sujeto(['This', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, a, significant, downregulation, of, the, hepatic, 'LXR', 'targets,', including, 'Abcg5/g8'])].
[sujeto(['Pharmacologic', induction, of, 'LXR']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([the, delivery, of, total, tracer, output, into, feces, in, 'db/db', 'mice,', partly, due, to, increased, liver, and, small, intestine, 'Abcg5/Abcg8', gene, expression])].

[sujeto(['Post-prandial', hyperlipidemia]), verbo([has]), complemento([emerged, as, a, cardiovascular, risk, factor, with, limited, therapeutic, options])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Liver', 'X', receptors, '(', 'Lxrs)', are]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptors, that, regulate, cholesterol, elimination])].
[sujeto(['Knowledge', of, their, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, absorption, and, handling, of, dietary, fats, is, incomplete])].
[sujeto(['We', also, conducted, a, 'long-term', 'high-cholesterol', dietary, challenge, in, adults, to, examine, the, chronic, effect, of]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([nr1h3, gene, dose, on, the, development, of, hypercholesterolemia, and, hepatic, lipid, accumulation])].
[sujeto(['Over-expression', of, 'Lxrα', in, the, intestine, delays, the, transport, of, ingested, lipids, in, 'larvae,', while, deletion, of, 'Lxrα']), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, rate, of, lipid, transport])].
[sujeto(['However,', whether, the, tumor, 'LXR', expression]), verbo([has]), complemento([prognostic, significance, in, hepatocellular, carcinoma, '(', 'HCC)', patient, has, not, been, addressed, yet])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'LXR', expression, status, in, tumor, samples, is, associated, with, the, clinical, 'characteristics,', such, as, tumor, stage, and, 'metastasis,', of, 'HCC', patients])].
[sujeto(['Patients', with, low, 'LXR', expression]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, significantly, lower, mean, 5, -, year, overall, survival, rate, and, mean, overall, survival, period, than, those, with, high, 'LXR', level])].
[sujeto(['Our', in, vitro, data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'HCC', cell, lines, had, increased, 'NF-κB,', 'MMP2,', 'MMP9', and, invasive, ability, than, normal, cell, 'line,', which, are, suppressed, by, 'LXR', activation, via, 'NFκB', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'LXR', could, be, used, as, a, biomarker, for, 'HCC', prognosis])].
[sujeto(['Further', study, is, warranted, to, explore, the, molecular, mechanism, under, which, 'LXR']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([tumor, behaves])].
[sujeto(['Allicin,', a, major, component, of, 'garlic,', is, regarded, as, a, cardioprotective, agent, and, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, increased, endothelial, function])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, demonstrated, that, allicin]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['HUVEC', 'proliferation,', which, was, suppressed, by, 'LPS', 'exposure,', and, 'LDH', release])].

[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, allicin, attenuated, the, 'LPS-induced', inflammatory, response, in, blood, vessels])].
[sujeto(['THP‑1', cells, were, exposed, to, 100, '\240\nM', phorbol, myristate, 'acetate\240\(PMA)', for, 24, '\240\h,', and, then, to, oxydized, 'low-density', 'lipoprotein\240\(ox-LDL;', 50, '\240\mg/ml)', to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([foam, cell, formation])].

[sujeto(['Overall,', our, data, demonstrate, that, the, 'allicin-induced', upregulation, of, 'ABCA1']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([cholesterol, efflux, and, reduces, lipid, accumulation, via, 'PPARγ/LXRα', signaling, in, 'THP‑1', 'macrophage-derived', foam, cells])].
[sujeto(['Nuclear', receptors, '(', 'NRs)', are, a, class, of, transcription, factors, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([many, cellular, functions, through, manipulation, of, gene, expression, and, also, play, important, roles, in, 'tumorigenesis,', 'proliferation,', progression, and, prognosis, in, various, kinds, of, cancers, according, to, recent, studies])].
[sujeto(['Genes', showed, clear, correlations, with, overall, survival, '(', 'OS)', and, recurrence, free, survival, '(', 'RFS)', were, further, validated, in, 123, 'MIBC', patients]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([consecutively, from, 2008, to, 2012, in, 'Fudan', 'University', 'Shanghai', 'Cancer', 'Center', '(', 'FUSCC)', cohort])].
[sujeto(['In', 'TCGA', 'cohort,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, high, 'NR1H3', '(', 'HR=0'])].
[sujeto(['Our', '"', 'TCGA', filtrating, and, local, database, 'validating"', model, can, help]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([more, prognostic, biomarkers, and, cast, a, new, light, in, understanding, certain, gene, function, in, 'MIBC'])].
[sujeto(['To', investigate, whether, activation, of, the, liver, 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs)']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([amyloid, 'β1-40', '(', 'Aβ1-40)', induced, inflammatory, and, senescent, responses, in, human, retinal, pigment, epithelial, '(', 'RPE)', cells])].
[sujeto(['Expressions', of, 'LXRs', and, one, of, their]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, 'A1', '(', 'ABCA1)', were, examined, by, 'real-time', 'PCR', and, western, blotting])].
[sujeto(['A', negative, linear, relationship, between, the, 'Aβ1-40', concentration, and, the, cell, viability, was, 'evident,', indicating, 'Aβ1-40']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['ARPE-19', cell, viability, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Aβ1-40']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'IL-6,', 'IL-8,', 'MCP-1', as, well, as, p16, in, both, 'RPE', cell, lines, at, both, mRNA, and, protein, 'levels,', whereas, 'TO90', counteracted, the, detrimental, effects])].
[sujeto(['TO90', upregulated, the, expression, of, 'LXRα', and, its]), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, 'ABCA1,', but, it, did, not, affect, the, expression, of, 'LXRβ'])].

[sujeto(['The', beneficial, effect, appears]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, inhibition, of, the, 'NF-κB', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Peri-conceptional', exposure, to, maternal, obesogenic, nutrition, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, in, utero, programming, of, 'later-life', overweight, and, metabolic, disease, in, the, offspring])].
[sujeto(['In', 'NMRI', 'mice,', 'peri-conceptional', and, gestational, obesity, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, feeding, a, 'HC', diet, '(', 'controls),', and, they, were, compared, with, dams, on, a, 'fat-modified', '(', 'Fat-mod)', 'HC', diet, of, the, same, energy, content, but, enriched, with, 'medium-chain', fatty, acids, '(', 'MCFAs)', and, adjusted, to, a, decreased, ratio, of, 'n-6', to, 'n-3', 'long-chain', polyunsaturated, fatty, acids, '(', 'LC-PUFAs)'])].
[sujeto(['Despite', comparable, energy, assimilation, between, the, two, groups, of, 'dams,', the, altered, fatty, acid, composition, of, the, 'Fat-mod', 'HC', diet]), verbo([induced]), complemento([lower, maternal, body, 'weight,', weights, of, fat, 'depots,', adipocyte, 'size,', and, hepatic, fat, accumulation, compared, to, the, unmodified, 'HC', diet, group])].
[sujeto(['Phenotypic', changes, were, accompanied, by, inhibition, of, transcript, and, protein, expression, of, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, hepatic, de, novo, lipogenesis, comprising, 'PPARG2', and, its, target, genes, 'Fasn,', 'Acaca,', and, 'Fabp4,', whereas, regulation, of, other, lipogenic, factors, '(', 'Srebf1,', 'Nr1h3,', 'Abca1)', appeared, to, be, more, complex])].
[sujeto(['The', modified, diet]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, a, 'sex-specific', placental, response, by, upregulating, 'PPARG-dependent', fatty, acid, transport, gene, expression, in, female, versus, male, placentae])].
[sujeto([16, -, 'Dehydropregnenolone', '(', 'DHP)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, developed, and, patented, as, a, promising, antihyperlipidemic, agent, by, 'CSIR-Central', 'Drug', 'Research', 'Institute', '(', 'CSIR-CDRI),', 'India'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, postulated, that, 'DHP', lowers, serum, lipids, through]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, key, hepatic, genes, accountable, for, cholesterol, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['The', results, revealed, that, the, 'DHP', profoundly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, levels, of, serum, 'TC,', 'TG,', 'LDL-C', and, atherogenic, index, '(', 'AI),', whilst, elevated, the, 'HDL-C/TC', ratio])].
[sujeto(['Besides,', 'DHP', exhibited, an, 'anti-hyperlipidemic', effect, in, the, 'HFD']), verbo([induced]), complemento([hyperlipidemic, hamsters, by, means, 'of:', '(', 1, ')', 'up-regulating', the, gene, expression, of, 'CYP7A1', encoded, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase,', that, promotes, the, catabolism, of, cholesterol, to, bile, 'acid;', '(', 2, ')', inducing, the, gene, expression, of, transcription, factors, 'LXRα', and, 'PPARα;', '(', 3, ')', increasing, the, 'TBA', excretion, through, feces])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', the, findings, presented]), verbo([confer]), complemento([the, hypolipidemic, activity, of, 'DHP', via, 'up-regulation', of, hepatic, 'CYP7A1', pathway, that, promotes, 'cholesterol-to-bile', acid, conversion, and, bile, acid, excretion])].
[sujeto(['Aging', is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, increased, levels, of, circulating, inflammatory, markers, and, reduced, muscle, mass, and, strength])].
[sujeto(['Significant', differences, in, the, mRNA, expression, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, 'subfamily,', group, 'H,', member, 3, '(', 'NR1H3,', encoding, the, 'LXRα', transcription, 'factor)', and, interferon, gamma, '(', 'INFG)', were, observed, between, groups])].
[sujeto(['The', serum, level, of, 'TNFα']), verbo([increased]), complemento([significantly, in, the, control, 'group,', while, sTNFRSF1A, increased, significantly, in, both, 'groups,', but, with, no, significant, differences, between, groups])].
[sujeto(['The', adipokine, adipocyte, fatty, 'acid-binding', protein, '(', 'A-FABP)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, 'obesity-related', 'cardio-metabolic', complications])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'A-FABP']), verbo([increases]), complemento([thermogenesis, by, promoting, the, conversion, of, 'T4', to, 'T3', in, brown, adipocytes])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'A-FABP', levels, are, increased, in, both, white, '(', 'WAT)', and, brown, '(', 'BAT)', adipose, tissues, and, the, bloodstream, in, response, to, thermogenic, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['A-FABP', knockout, mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([reduced, thermogenesis, and, 'whole-body', energy, expenditure, after, cold, stress, or, after, feeding, a, 'high-fat', 'diet,', which, can, be, reversed, by, infusion, of, recombinant, 'A-FABP'])].
[sujeto(['Mechanistically,', 'A-FABP']), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'type-II', iodothyronine, deiodinase, in, 'BAT', via, inhibition, of, the, nuclear, receptor, liver, 'X', receptor, 'α,', thereby, leading, to, the, conversion, of, thyroid, hormone, from, its, inactive, form, 'T4', to, active, 'T3'])].
[sujeto(['The', thermogenic, responses, to, 'T4', are, abrogated, in, 'A-FABP', 'KO', 'mice,', but]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, 'A-FABP'])].

[sujeto(['Maternal', undernutrition, programs, fetal, energy, homeostasis, and]), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, risk, of, metabolic, disorders, later, in, life])].

[sujeto(['As', 'examples,', these, xenosensors, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, homeostasis, of, 'cholesterol,', bile, 'acids,', 'bilirubin,', and, other, endogenous, hydrophobic, molecules, in, the, 'liver:', 'CAR', and, 'PXR', thus, form, an, intricate, regulatory, network, with, other, members, of, the, nuclear, receptor, 'superfamily,', foremost, the, 'cholesterol-sensing', liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR,', 'NR1H2/3)', and, the, 'bile-acid-activated', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR,', 'NR1H4)'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'review,', functional, interactions, between, these]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, as, well, as, the, consequences, on, physiology, and, pathophysiology, of, the, liver, are, discussed])].
[sujeto(['We', characterize, the, ability, of, the, liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXRalpha', '[', 'NR1H3]', and, 'LXRbeta', '[', 'NR1H2])', 'agonist,', 'T0901317,', to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR', '[', 'NR4H4])'])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'T0901317', is, a, much, more, potent, activator, of, 'LXR', than, 'FXR,', this, ligand, actually]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['FXR', more, potently, than, a, natural, bile, acid, 'FXR', 'ligand,', chenodeoxycholic, acid])].
[sujeto(['To', ascertain, whether, distinct, chromosomal, loci, existed, that, were, linked, to, severe, 'obesity,', as, well, as, to, utilize, the]), verbo([increased]), complemento([heritability, of, this, excessive, 'phenotype,', we, performed, a, 'genome-wide', scan, in, severely, obese, 'French', 'Caucasians'])].
[sujeto(['The', 109, selected, 'pedigrees,', totaling, 447, 'individuals,']), verbo([required]), complemento([both, the, proband, and, a, sibling, to, be, severely, obese, '(', 'BMI', &, 'gt;or=35', 'kg/m(2)),', and, 84.8, '%', of, the, nuclear, families, possessed, &, 'gt;or=1', morbidly, obese, sibling, '(', 'BMI', &, 'gt;or=40)'])].
[sujeto(['Six', regions, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, have, suggestive, linkage, on, 4, 'q,', 6, 'cen-q,', 17, 'q,', and, 19, q, for, a, 'BMI', &, 'gt;or=35', phenotypic, 'subset,', and, 5, q, and, 10, q, for, an, inclusive, 'BMI', &, 'gt;or=27', group])].

[sujeto(['Natural', products]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, as, ligands, for, a, number, of, members, of, the, nuclear, hormone, receptor, '(', 'NHR)', superfamily])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, identified, the, first, nonoxysterol, natural, product, that, functions, as, a, ligand, for, the, liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXRalpha', and, 'LXRbeta;', 'NR1H3,', 'NR1H2),', a, 'NHR', that]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, the, receptor, for, oxysterols, and, plays, a, key, role, in, regulation, of, cholesterol, metabolism, and, transport, as, well, as, glucose, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['Paxilline']), verbo([binds]), complemento([directly, to, both, receptors, and, is, an, activator, of, 'LXR-dependent', transcription, in, 'cell-based', reporter, assays])].
[sujeto(['We', also, demonstrate, that, paxilline]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, receptors, results, in, efficient, activation, of, transcription, of, two, physiological, 'LXR', target, 'genes,', 'ABCA1', and, 'SREBP'])].
[sujeto(['The', discovery, of, 'paxilline,', the, first]), verbo([reported]), complemento([nonoxysterol, natural, product, ligand, of, the, 'LXRs,', may, provide, insight, into, the, mechanism, of, ligand, recognition, by, these, receptors, and, reaffirms, the, utility, of, examining, natural, product, libraries, for, identifying, novel, 'NHR', ligands])].
[sujeto(['Defining', complete, sets, of, gene, family, members, from, diverse, species]), verbo([provides]), complemento([the, foundation, for, comparative, studies])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, bioinformatic, 'approach,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([defined, the, entire, nuclear, receptor, complement, within, the, first, available, complete, sequence, of, a, 'non-human', vertebrate, '(', the, teleost, fish, 'Fugu', 'rubripes)'])].

[sujeto(['T0901317', takes, advantage, of, this, by]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'His-435', close, to, 'H12', while, 'GW3965', orients, itself, with, its, charged, group, in, the, opposite, direction])].

[sujeto(['The', 'Liver', 'X', 'Receptors', '(', 'LXR', 'alpha,', 'NR1H3;', 'LXR', 'beta,', 'NR1H2)', encode, highly, homologous, transcription, factors, that, are, members, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, superfamily, of, proteins])].

[sujeto(['These', conclusions, are, based, on, studies, 'that:', '(', 'i)', identified, oxysterols, as, the, natural, ligands, for, both, 'LXR', alpha, and, 'LXR', 'beta;', '(', 'ii)', identified]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, that, are, activated, by, 'LXR/RXR;', '(', 'iii)', generated, mice, that, were, deficient, in, 'LXR', 'alpha,', 'LXR', beta, or, both, 'LXR', alpha, and, 'LXR', 'beta;', '(', 'iv)', identified, synthetic, 'LXR', ligands, that, were, extremely, potent, in, 'vivo;', and, '(', 'v)', demonstrated, significant, alterations, in, cholesterol, and, fatty, acid, homeostasis, in, animals, in, which, 'LXR', had, been, either, activated, or, deleted])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, synthetic, 'LXR', ligands, may, prove, useful, in, the, treatment, of, certain, dyslipidemias])].

[sujeto(['Liver', 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs)', are, considered, to, be, potential, drug]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, the, 'regulation,', 'treatment,', or, prevention, of, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['Sex', differences, in, 'CO', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([only, in, the, hypothalamus, for, 'LXRβ', expression, at, 35, 'D', and, 9, 'M', '(', 'P&lt;0'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, liver, 'X', receptor, '[', 'LXR]', is, activated, by, endogenous, oxidized, derivatives, of, cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['Both', isoforms, of, 'LXR,', 'LXRα', '[', 'NR1H3]', and, 'LXRβ', '[', 'NR1H2],', form, heterodimers, with, the, isoforms, of, the, retinoid, 'X', receptor, '[', 'RXR],', which, then]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, gene, expression, by, binding, to, 'DNA', sequences, associated, with, target, genes])].
[sujeto(['LXR']), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, cholesterol, sensor, in, response, to, an, increased, concentration, of, cholesterol, in, cells, and, induces, the, transcription, of, genes, that, protect, cells, from, cholesterol, overload])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', these, receptors, show, great, potential, as, pharmacological]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, 'anti-atherosclerotic', activities])].
[sujeto(['Recent', discoveries]), verbo([have]), complemento([also, emphasized, the, important, involvement, of, 'LXRs', in, the, pathogenesis, of, 'diabetes,', 'Alzheimer\'s', 'disease,', 'inflammation,', adrenal, steroid, 'synthesis,', skin, aging, and, male, fertility])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'LXR', activation]), verbo([has]), complemento([also, been, shown, to, stimulate, lipogenesis, via, sterol, regulatory, element, binding, 'protein-1c,', leading, to, liver, steatosis, and, hypertriglyceridemia])].
[sujeto(['Liver', 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs)', α, and, β, are]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptors, that, are, widely, expressed, in, the, kidney])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, hypothesised, '(', 1, ')', that, 'LXR', deficiency, would]), verbo([promote]), complemento([renal, decline, in, a, mouse, model, of, diabetes, by, accelerating, intraglomerular, cholesterol, accumulation, 'and,', 'conversely,', '(', 2, ')', that, 'LXR', agonism, would, attenuate, renal, decline, in, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['Diabetes', was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([with, streptozotocin, '(', 'STZ)', and, maintained, for, 14, '\240\weeks', in, 'Lxrα/β', '(', +, /, +, ')', '(', 'Lxrα,', also, known, as, 'Nr1h3;', 'Lxrβ,', also, known, as, 'Nr1h2)', and, 'Lxrα/β', '(', -, /, -, ')', mice])].

[sujeto(['These', data, support, the, idea, that, 'LXR', plays, an, important, role, in, the, normal, and, diabetic, 'kidney,', while, showing, that, 'LXR,', through, its, inhibitory, effect, on, inflammation, and, cholesterol, accumulation, in, 'glomeruli,', could, also, be, a, novel, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, 'DN'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, 'MetS', is, likely, to, be, due, to, a, complex, interaction, between, genetic, and, environmental, factors])].

[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', this, study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, 'above-named', variants, in, 'LXRα', and, 'LXRβ', genes, are, not, potential, contributors, to, the, risk, of, 'MetS', and, related, traits, in, an, 'Iranian', population])].
[sujeto(['For', 'instance,', the, accumulation, of, excess, cholesterol, by, macrophages, initiates, a, genetic, response]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, liver, 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs)-α', '(', 'NR1H3)', and, 'LXRβ', '(', 'NR1H2),', which, facilitates, the, transport, of, cholesterol, out, of, cells, to, 'high-density', lipoprotein, particles])].

[sujeto(['We', now, show, that, treatment, of, human, 'THP-1', macrophages, with, endogenous, or, synthetic, 'LXR', ligands]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([both, transcriptional, and, posttranscriptional, pathways, that, result, in, the, selective, recruitment, of, the, 'LXRα', subtype, to, 'LXR-regulated', promoters])].

[sujeto(['The', constitutive, androstane, receptor, '(', 'CAR,', 'NR1I3),', initially, identified, as, a, 'xenobiotic-sensing', 'receptor,', may, also]), verbo([have]), complemento([roles, in, lipid, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, liver, 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs,', 'NR1H2/3)', and, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptors, '(', 'PPARs,', 'NR1C)', have, been, known, for, their, roles, in, lipid, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['LXR', is, a, sterol, sensor, that]), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['lipogenesis,', whereas, 'PPARα', controls, a, variety, of, genes, in, several, pathways, of, lipid, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['Liver', 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR)', α, and, 'LXR', β, '(', 'NR1H3', and, 'NR1H2)', are, 'oxysterol-activated']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, involved, in, the, control, of, major, metabolic, pathways, such, as, cholesterol, 'homeostasis,', 'lipogenesis,', inflammation, and, innate, immunity])].

[sujeto(['Nuclear', receptors, '(', 'NRs)', rely, on, coregulator, proteins, to]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([transcription, of, target, genes])].
[sujeto(['The', prevailing, view, of, coregulator, action, holds, that, in, the, absence, of, agonist, the, receptor]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, a, corepressor, via, the, corepressor, nuclear, receptor, '(', 'CoRNR,', '"', 'corner")', box, motifs, within, the, corepressor])].

[sujeto(['Since', then, a, number, of, other, corepressors, of, 'agonist-bound', 'NRs']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, discovered])].

[sujeto(['ALY', is, a, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([nuclear, protein, which, interacts, with, proteins, such, as, 'TAP', that, are, involved, in, export, of, mRNA, from, the, nucleus, to, the, 'cytoplasm,', as, well, as, with, proteins, that, bind, the, 'T', cell, receptor, alpha, gene, enhancer])].

[sujeto(['ALY']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, conserved, 'RNA', binding, domain, '(', 'RBD)', flanked, by, 'Gly-Arg', rich, 'N-terminal', and, 'C-terminal', sequences])].
[sujeto(['We', determined, the, solution, structure, of, the, 'RBD', homology, region, in, 'ALY', by]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([magnetic, resonance, methods])].
[sujeto(['The', 'RBD', motif, in, 'ALY']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, characteristic, 'beta(1)alpha(1)beta(2)-beta(3)alpha(2)beta(4)', 'fold,', consisting, of, a, beta, sheet, composed, of, four, antiparallel, beta, strands, and, two, alpha, helices, that, pack, on, one, face, of, the, beta, sheet])].

[sujeto(['The', structure, of, the]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['RBD', of, 'ALY', provides, insight, into, the, nature, of, interactions, involving, this, multifunctional, protein])].

[sujeto(['Six', different, 'TFs', are, able, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, this, region])].
[sujeto(['Aromatic', hydrocarbon]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocator, '(', 'Arnt)', is, an, ubiquitously, expressed, protein, that, contains, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', '(', 'bHLH)', and, 'Per-AhR-Arnt-Sim', '(', 'PAS)', motifs])].

[sujeto(['A', major, question, remaining, in, glycobiology, is, how, a, glycosyltransferase, '(', 'GT)', that]), verbo([retains]), complemento([the, anomeric, linkage, of, a, sugar, catalyzes, the, reaction])].
[sujeto(['Xyloside', 'α-1,3-xylosyltransferase', '(', 'XXYLT1)', is, a]), verbo([retaining]), complemento(['GT', that, regulates, 'Notch', receptor, activation, by, adding, xylose, to, the, 'Notch', extracellular, domain])].
[sujeto(['Here,', using, natural, acceptor, and, donor, substrates, and, active, 'Mus', musculus, 'XXYLT1,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, series, of, crystallographic, snapshots, along, the, 'reaction,', including, an, unprecedented, natural, and, competent, 'Michaelis', reaction, complex, for, retaining, enzymes])].

[sujeto(['Our', improved, understanding, of, this]), verbo([retaining]), complemento([enzyme, will, accelerate, the, design, of, retaining, 'GT', inhibitors, that, can, modulate, 'Notch', activity, in, pathological, situations, in, which, 'Notch', dysregulation, is, known, to, cause, cancer, or, developmental, disorders])].
[sujeto(['Tuberculosis', '(', 'TB)']), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'Mycobacterium', tuberculosis, '(', 'Mtb)', represents, one, of, the, greatest, threats, to, human, health])].
[sujeto([',', 'Interferons', '(', 'IFNs)', in, combination, with, the, 'first-line', of, 'anti-TB', drugs]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, used, for, treating, 'TB', for, decades, in, the, 'clinic,', but, how, 'Mtb', infection, regulates, 'interferon-stimulated', genes, '(', 'ISGs)', in, human, macrophages, '(', 'Mϕs)', remains, unknown])].

[sujeto(['Additionally,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, cytosolic, cyclic, '(', 'GMP-AMP)', synthase, '(', 'cGAS),', 'toll-like', 'receptor-2', '(', 'TLR-2)', and, 'TLR-4', signaling, pathways, participated, in, 'ISG', induction])].
[sujeto(['Their', downstream, elements, of, 'TANK-binding', kinase, 1, '(', 'TBK1),']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['factor-kappa', 'B', '(', 'NF-κB),', 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK),', and, 'Janus', 'kinase-signal', transducer, and, activator, of, transcription, '(', 'JAK-STAT)', were, selectively, involved, in, 'Mtb-mediated', 'ISG', production])].
[sujeto(['Therapeutic', medications, for, the, treatment, of, depression]), verbo([have]), complemento([serious, 'limitations,', particularly, delayed, onset, and, low, rates, of, efficacy])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, discovery, that, a, single, subanesthetic, dose, of, 'ketamine,', a, glutamate, 'NMDA', receptor, channel, 'blocker,', can, produce, a, rapid, '(', within, 'hours)', antidepressant, response, that, is, sustained, '(', about, 1, 'week),', even, in, patients, considered, 'treatment-resistant,']), verbo([has]), complemento([invigorated, the, field])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, to, these, remarkable, 'actions,', ketamine]), verbo([has]), complemento([proven, effective, for, the, treatment, of, suicidal, ideation])].

[sujeto(['In', both, 'genes,', one, novel, insertion, was, in, the, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['DRY', motif, at, the, end, of, helix, 'TM3'])].
[sujeto(['Further,', the, 'proto-splice', site, 'MAG↑R', is]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([at, intron, insertion, sites, in, these, two, genes])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, these, fish, genomes, are, severely, compacted, after, the, separation, from, zebrafish])].

[sujeto(['Using', mouse, models, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([or, no, formation, of, 'Tau', protein, and, increased, production, of, 24, 'OHC,', we, have, also, tested, the, hypothesis, that, there, is, a, direct, association, between, neuronal, turnover, of, 24, 'OHC', and, 'Tau'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([significant, correlations, between, levels, of, 24, 'OHC', and, 'Tau', or, 'P-Thr181-Tau', in, 'CSF', from, patients, with, 'PD,', 'CBS', or, 'CBD'])].
[sujeto(['Vice', 'versa,', 'Tau', species, levels, were, not, changed, in, 'Cyp46', overexpressing, mice, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([neuronal, levels, of, 24, 'OHC'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, this, high, correlation, reflects, a, rapid, neurodegeneration, of, specific, neuronal, subtypes, with, simultaneous, release, of, 24, 'OHC', and, 'Tau', into, the, 'CSF'])].
[sujeto(['Although', 24, '(', 'S)-hydroxycholesterol', '(', 24, 'S-OHC)', plays, an, important, role, to]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([homeostasis, of, cholesterol, in, the, 'brain,', it, induces, neuronal, cell, death, at, high, concentrations])].
[sujeto([24, 'S-OHC-induced', cell, death, was]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([by, 'γ-tocopherol', '(', 'γ-Toc)', but, not, by, 'γ-tocotrienol', '(', 'γ-Toc3)', in, a, similar, way, to, 'α-tocopherol', '(', 'α-Toc)', and, 'α-tocotrienol', '(', 'α-Toc3)', in, human, neuroblastoma, 'SH-SY5Y', cells])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'γ-Toc', and, 'γ-Toc3', significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([cumene, 'hydroperoxide-induced', cell, 'death,', as, previously, shown, in, the, case, of, 'α-Toc', and, 'α-Toc3'])].
[sujeto(['Lipid', 'droplet-like', structure, formation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 24, 'S-OHC', was, suppressed, by, neither, 'γ-Toc', nor, 'γ-Toc3'])].
[sujeto(['The', phosphorylation, of, 'calcium/calmodulin-dependent', protein, kinase, 'II', '(', 'CaMKII)', was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 24, 'S-OHC,', which, was, suppressed, by, 'CaMKII', 'phosphorylation-site', inhibitor, mM3, but, not, by, 'calmodulin-binding-site', inhibitor, 'KN62'])].

[sujeto(['Gastric', cancer, '(', 'GC)', is, one, of, the, most, common, cancers, and, is, the, 'second-leading']), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, 'cancer-associated', morbidity, worldwide])].

[sujeto(['In', those, conditions, '(', with, 7, '\240\KC:', 50, '\240\μM)', 'morphological,', topographical, and, functional, peroxisome, alterations]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, modifications, of, the, cytoplasmic, distribution, of, 'mitochondria,', with, mitochondrial, dysfunction, '(', loss, of, transmembrane, mitochondrial, 'potential,', decreased, level, of, 'cardiolipins)', and, oxidative, stress, were, 'observed:', presence, of, peroxisomes, with, abnormal, sizes, and, shapes, similar, to, those, observed, in, 'Zellweger', 'fibroblasts,', lower, cellular, level, of, 'ABCD3,', used, as, a, marker, of, peroxisomal, 'mass,', measured, by, flow, 'cytometry,', lower, mRNA, and, protein, levels, '(', measured, by, 'RT-qPCR', and, western, 'blotting)', of, 'ABCD1', and, 'ABCD3', '(', two, 'ATP-dependent', peroxisomal, 'transporters),', and, of, 'ACOX1', and, 'MFP2', 'enzymes,', and, lower, mRNA, level, of, 'DHAPAT,', involved, in, peroxisomal, 'β-oxidation', and, plasmalogen, 'synthesis,', 'respectively,', and, increased, levels, of, very, long, chain, fatty, acids, '(', 'VLCFA:', 'C24:0,', 'C24:1,', 'C26:0', and, 'C26:1,', quantified, by, gas, chromatography, coupled, with, mass, 'spectrometry)', metabolized, by, peroxisomal, 'β-oxidation'])].

[sujeto(['Dyslipidaemia', and, hyperglycaemia, are]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, ovarian, failure, and, both, have, been, related, to, hypothyroidism])].

[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, link, between, sterol, metabolism, and, the, regulation, of, the, 'anti-inflammatory', response, in, human, 'CD4+', 'T', cells])].
[sujeto(['Circulating', cholesterol, levels]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, linked, to, 'PD,', but, not, directly, to, brain, physiology])].
[sujeto(['Sixty', 'PD', patients, and, 64, controls, were]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([from, an, academic, movement, disorder, clinic, '(', 2009, -, 2012, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Plasma', '(', 'S)24-OH-cholesterol', levels, were, inversely]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, odds, of, having, 'PD,', with, an, odds, ratio, of, 0.92, '(', 95, '%', confidence, 'interval:', 0.87, -, 0.97, ')', for, each, 1, -, 'ng/mL', increase, '(', 'P', =, 0.004, ')'])].

[sujeto(['Recently,', the, 'RA-metabolizing', enzyme, 'CYP26A1', '(', cytochrome, 'P450,', family, 26, ',', subfamily, 'A,', polypeptide, 1, ')']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, have, an, oncogenic, function, in, breast, carcinogenesis])].

[sujeto(['Similarly,', 'CYP26A1', was, not]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'non-neoplastic', tissues, of, the, head, and, 'neck,', but, strong, cytoplasmic, staining, of, 'CYP26A1', was, observed, in, 52, of, 128, '(', 41, '%', ')', 'HNC', cases])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'miR-17', not, only, promoted, 'epithelial-mesenchymal', 'transition\240\(EMT),', but, also, promoted, the, formation, of, a, stem, 'cell-like', population, in, colon, 'cancer\240\DLD1', cells])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, revealed, that, 'miR‑17', overexpression]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, degradation, of, 'CYP7B1', mRNA, expression, in, 'DLD1', cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, silencing, of, 'CYB7B1', promoted, 'EMT', and, the, formation, of, a, stem, 'cell-like', population, in, the, cells])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', our, findings, demonstrate, that, 'miR‑17']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['EMT', consistent, with, the, cancer, stem, cell, phenotype, by, regulating, 'CYP7B1', expression, in, colon, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Insulin']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([transcription, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp7a1),', a, key, gene, in, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', and, the, hepatic, nuclear, 'factor-4', '(', 'HNF-4)', site, in, the, promoter, was, identified, as, a, negative, insulin, response, sequence])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', 'HNF-4', interaction, with, 'SREBP-1c', was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([after, feeding])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro, studies]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'SREBP-1c', competed, with, 'PGC-1alpha', for, direct, interaction, with, the, 'AF2', domain, of, 'HNF-4'])].
[sujeto(['Reporter', assays, showed, that, 'SREBP-1c,', but, not, of, a, 'SREBP-1c', mutant, lacking, the, 'HNF-4']), verbo([interacting]), complemento(['domain,', inhibited, 'HNF-4/PGC-1alpha', transactivation, of, 'Cyp7a1'])].
[sujeto(['SREBP-1c', also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['PGC-1alpha-coactivation', of, estrogen, 'receptor,', constitutive, androstane, 'receptor,', pregnane, 'X', 'receptor,', and, farnesoid, 'X', 'receptor,', implying, inhibition, of, 'HNF-4', by, 'SREBP-1c', could, extend, to, other, nuclear, receptors])].
[sujeto(['In', chromatin, immunoprecipitation, 'studies,', 'HNF-4']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, promoter, was, not, 'altered,', but, 'PGC-1alpha', was, 'dissociated,', 'SREBP-1c', and, histone, 'deacetylase-2', '(', 'HDAC2)', were, 'recruited,', and, acetylation, of, histone, 'H3', was, decreased, upon, feeding])].
[sujeto(['This', mechanism, may, be, relevant, to, known, repression, of, many, other, 'HNF-4']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, upon, feeding])].
[sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)']), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, implicated, in, the, control, of, hepatic, triglyceride, production])].
[sujeto(['controls)', due, to]), verbo([increased]), complemento([hepatic, lipoprotein, production])].
[sujeto(['This', could, be, largely, attributed, to]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([hepatic, de, novo, 'lipogenesis,', as, indicated, by, increased, expression, of, sterol, regulatory, 'element-binding', 'protein-1,', fatty, acid, 'synthase,', and, 'steaoryl-CoA', 'desaturase-1'])].
[sujeto(['Lipoprotein', analysis, demonstrated, that, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, plasma, triglycerides, occurred, in, the, 'VLDL', density, 'range,', whereas, increases, in, 'VLDL,', 'IDL/LDL,', and, 'HDL', cholesterol, accounted, for, the, elevated, plasma, cholesterol, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['Addition', of, 0.1, '%', 'CDCA', to, the, 'high-fructose', diet]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([hepatic, de, novo, lipogenesis, and, consequently, triglyceride, production, and, prevented, the, increases, in, plasma, triglycerides, and, cholesterol, '(', -, 40, and, -, 18, '%', ',', 'P', =, 0.03, and, 0.03, vs])].

[sujeto(['Recent', advances, in, molecular, biology]), verbo([have]), complemento([greatly, accelerated, knowledge, relating, to, the, significance, of, the, enterohepatic, circulation, of, bile, salts])].

[sujeto(['HNF4alpha']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, 'HNF4-54', region, of, the, endogenous, 'SULT2A1', 'gene,', as, indicated, by, chromatin, immunoprecipitation])].

[sujeto(['Rifampicin', treatment, 'concentration-dependently']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['SULT2A1', reporter, expression, at, the, same, concentrations, that, progressively, induced, expression, from, a, 'PXR-responsive', 'CYP3A4', 'reporter,', whereas, higher, rifampicin, concentrations, reversed, the, 'SULT2A1', suppression])].
[sujeto(['The', suppressive, effect, of, rifampicin, was, 'diminished,', whereas, the]), verbo([activating]), complemento([effect, was, 'augmented,', in, 'HepG2', cells, with, 'RNA', 'interference-mediated', 'PXR', knockdown])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'HNF4alpha', plays, a, central, role, in, the, control, of, 'SULT2A1', transcription, and, that, 'rifampicin-liganded', 'PXR', suppresses, 'SULT2A1', expression, by, interfering, with, 'HNF4alpha', activity])].
[sujeto(['By', 'contrast,', the, 'rifampicin-inducible', 'SULT2A1', expression, that, occurs, in, many, human, hepatocyte, preparations, seems, to, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, a, 'PXR-independent', mechanism])].
[sujeto(['The', transcription, of, the, gene, '(', 'CYP7A1)', encoding, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', a, key, enzyme, in, cholesterol, 'homeostasis,', is]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([by, bile, acids, via, multiple, mechanisms, involving, members, of, the, nuclear, receptor, superfamily])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, describe, a, regulatory, mechanism, that, can, be, exploited, for]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([bile, acid, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['By', dissecting, the, mechanisms, of, 'CYP7A1', 'transcription,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, bile, acids, stimulate, the, sequential, recruitment, of, the, histone, deacetylases, '(', 'HDACs)', 7, ',', 3, ',', and, 1, ',', and, of, the, corepressor, 'SMRTalpha', '(', silencing, mediator, of, retinoid, and, thyroid, 'receptors-alpha)', and, the, nuclear, corepressor])].
[sujeto(['Bile', 'acids,', but, not, the, farnesoid, 'X', 'receptor-selective', agonist, 'GW4064,']), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, nuclear, concentration, of, 'HDAC7,', which, promotes, the, assembly, of, a, repressive, complex, that, ultimately, represses, 'CYP7A1', transcription])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', despite, its, high, basal, expression, 'level,', small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, 'CYP7A1', promoter, only, at, a, later, stage, of, bile, acid, repression])].
[sujeto(['Gene', silencing, with, small, interfering, 'RNA', confirms, that, 'HDAC7', is, the, key, factor]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, repression, of, 'CYP7A1', 'transcription,', whereas, knockdown, of, 'SHP', does, not, prevent, the, 'down-regulation', of, 'CYP7A1'])].
[sujeto(['Administration', of, the, 'HDAC', inhibitors, valproic, acid, or, trichostatin, 'A', to, genetically, hypercholesterolemic, mice]), verbo([increases]), complemento(['Cyp7a1', messenger, 'RNA', and, bile, acid, synthesis, and, consequently, markedly, reduces, total, plasma, and, 'low-density', lipoprotein, cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['By', using, a, combination, of, 'molecular,', 'cellular,', and, animal, 'models,', our, study, highlights, the, importance, of, 'HDACs', in, the, feedback, regulation, of, 'CYP7A1', transcription, and, identifies, these, enzymes, as, potential]), verbo([targets]), complemento([to, modulate, bile, acid, synthesis, and, for, the, treatment, of, hypercholesterolemia])].
[sujeto(['TALLYHO/Jng', '(', 'TH)', mice]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([hypercholesterolemia, at, an, early, age, before, their, plasma, glucose, levels, have, increased])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increased]), complemento([plasma, cholesterol, should, be, related, to, bile, acids, '(', 'BAs)', 'metabolism,', because, cholesterol, is, the, precursor, of, 'BAs', and, 'BAs', change, cholesterol, metabolism, in, a, feedback, manner])].
[sujeto(['We', analyzed, the, 'BAs', pool, 'size,', 'BAs', 'composition,', and, expression, levels, of, several, proteins, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([key, roles, in, 'BAs', 'synthesis,', 'excretion,', and, reabsorption, and, compared, them, to, those, of, 'C57BL/6', '(', 'B6)', mice, to, study, 'BAs', metabolism, in, 'TH', mice])].
[sujeto(['TH', mice, exhibited, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([total, 'BAs', pool, 'size,', increased, 'BAs', content, in, the, cecum, 'feces,', and, an, increased, ratio, of, muricholic, acid, '(', 'MCA)/cholic', acid, '(', 'CA)'])].

[sujeto(['Hypolipidemic', and, hypoglycemic, properties, of, ginger, in, animal, models]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported])].

[sujeto(['Catch-up', growth, in, 'adult,', is, increasingly]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([as, an, important, causative, factor, for, the, extremely, prevalent, insulin, 'resistance-related', diseases, especially, in, developing, 'countries/territories'])].
[sujeto(['We', aimed, to, investigate, the, alteration, of, bile, acids, 'level,', phosphorylation, and, sumoylation, of, its]), verbo([interacting]), complemento(['protein,', bile, acid, 'receptor/farnesoid', 'X', receptor, and, their, downstream, signaling, 'pathway,', as, well, as, insulin, sensitivity, and, lipid, profile, in, 'catch-up', growth, in, adult, rats])].

[sujeto(['Nonalcoholic', fatty, liver, disease, is, positively]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, obesity, and, cardiovascular, disease, risk])].
[sujeto(['Apo-10\'-lycopenoic', acid, '(', 'APO10LA),', a, potential, oxidation, product, of, 'apo-10\'-lycopenal', that, is, generated, endogenously, by, 'β-carotene-9\',10\'-oxygenase', '(', 'BCO2)', cleavage, of, 'lycopene,']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([hepatic, steatosis, in, 'BCO2-expressing', mice])].

[sujeto(['The', present, study, was, done, to, compare, the, 'plasma-cholesterol-lowering', potencies, of, four, common, 'SCFAs', with, 2, -, 5, carbons, and, to, investigate, their, interactions, with, gene, expressions, of, key, regulatory, factors]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cholesterol, metabolism])].

[sujeto(['Prenatal', ethanol, exposure, '(', 'PEE)', could]), verbo([induce]), complemento([intrauterine, programming, of, 'hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal', 'axis-associated', neuroendocrine, 'metabolism,', resulting, in, intrauterine, growth, retardation, and, susceptibility, to, adult, hypercholesterolemia, in, offspring])].
[sujeto(['PEE']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, serum, total, cholesterol, '(', 'TCH)', and, 'low-density', 'lipoprotein-cholesterol', '(', 'LDL-C)', levels, and, decreased, the, serum, 'high-density', 'lipoprotein-cholesterol', '(', 'HDL-C)', level, in, adult, offspring, 'rats;', the, changes, in, female, offspring, were, greater, than, those, in, males])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, 'post-weaning', 'HFD', could, aggravate, offspring, hypercholesterolemia, caused, by, 'PEE', and, that, this, mechanism, might, be, associated, with, hepatic, cholesterol, metabolic, disorders, that, are, aggravated, by, a, 'post-weaning', 'HFD;', hepatic, cholesterol, metabolism, was, more, sensitive, to, neuroendocrine, metabolic, alterations, by, 'PEE', and, a, 'post-weaning', 'HFD', in, the, female, offspring, than, in, the, male, offspring])].

[sujeto(['Results', indicate, that]), verbo([increased]), complemento([bile, acid, synthesis, rather, than, inhibition, of, cholesterol, absorption, or, synthesis, may, be, responsible, for, the, 'cholesterol-lowering', effect, of, barley, 'β-glucan'])].

[sujeto(['Both', chitosan, and, fish, oil, significantly, ameliorated, the, alterations, in, the, protein, expressions, of, hepatic, lipogenic, transcription, factors, '(', 'LXRα', and, 'PPARα),', and, could, also, significantly]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, downstream, hepatic, lipogenic, genes, '(', 'FAS,', 'HMGCR,', 'CYP7A1,', 'FATP,', 'FABP,', 'AOX,', and, 'ABCA)', expressions, in, 'high-fat', 'diet-fed', rats])].

[sujeto(['The', beneficial, effects, of, 'omega-3', polyunsaturated, fatty, acids, '(', 'n-3', 'PUFAs)', on, cardiovascular, disease]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, studied, extensively])].
[sujeto(['RCT', describes, a, mechanism, by, which, excess, cholesterol, from, peripheral, tissues, is, transported, to, the, liver, for, hepatobiliary, 'excretion,', thereby]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([foam, cell, formation, and, the, development, of, atherosclerosis])].
[sujeto(['The', aim, of, this, review, is, to, summarize, the, literature, and, to]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, updated, overview, of, the, effects, of, 'n-3', 'PUFAs', on, key, players, in, 'RCT,', including, apoliprotein, 'AI', '(', 'apoA-I),', 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, 'A1', '(', 'ABCA1),', 'ABCG1,', 'apoE,', scavenger, receptor, class, 'B', type, 'I', '(', 'SR-BI),', cholesteryl, ester, transfer, protein, '(', 'CETP),', 'low-density', lipoprotein, receptor, '(', 'LDLr),', cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', and, 'ABCG5/G8'])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, current, 'knowledge,', we, conclude, that, 'n-3', 'PUFAs', may, beneficially, affect, 'RCT,', mainly, by, influencing, 'high-density', lipoprotein, '(', 'HDL)', remodeling, and, by]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([hepatobiliary, sterol, excretion])].
[sujeto(['Populations', with, essential, hypertension]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, high, risk, of, nonalcoholic, steatohepatitis, '(', 'NASH)'])].
[sujeto(['The', diet]), verbo([induced]), complemento([severe, lobular, inflammation, and, fibrosis, in, the, livers, of, the, hypertensive, 'rats,', whereas, it, only, caused, mild, steatohepatitis, in, the, normotensive, rats])].
[sujeto(['An']), verbo([increased]), complemento([activation, of, proinflammatory, signaling, '(', transforming, growth, 'factor-β1/mitogen-activated', protein, kinases, 'pathway)', was, observed, in, the, hypertensive, strains, fed, with, the, 'HFC', diet])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', the, 'HFC', diet]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, nuclear, factor, erythroid, 2, -, related, factor, 2, pathway, in, the, hypertensive, rats, and, led, to, lower, increases, in, the, hepatic, expression, of, heme, 'oxygenase-1,', which, has, 'anti-oxidative', and, 'anti-inflammatory', activities])].
[sujeto(['Constitutive', androstane, receptor, '(', 'CAR),', a, member, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['family,', plays, an, important, role, in, cholesterol, and, bile, acid, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['To', examine, whether, activation, of, 'CAR', can]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([cholesterol, gallstone, 'formation,', we, treated, 'C57BL6/J', mice, maintained, on, a, lithogenic, diet, with, 'CAR', agonist, 1, ',', 4, -, 'bis-[2-(3,', 5, -, 'dichlorpyridyloxy)]', benzene, and, performed, bile, duct, cannulation, to, study, the, dynamics, of, biliary, lipids])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, activation, of, 'CAR', decreases, the, biliary, cholesterol, concentration, and, prevents, 'CGD', formation])].
[sujeto(['The', lower, biliary, cholesterol, level, was, largely, attributed, to]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['Abcg5', and, 'Abcg8', expression, in, 'CAR-activated', mice])].
[sujeto(['CAR', activation, also]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([cholesterol, conversion, into, bile, acids, by, increasing, the, expression, of, 'Cyp7a1,', a, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, bile, acid, biosynthesis])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'CAR']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([bile, acid, 're-absorption', via, increasing, the, expression, of, bile, acid, transporters, 'Asbt', and, 'Ostβ', in, the, ileum])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', activation, of, 'CAR', protected, the, mice, against, the, liver, 'X', receptor, 'α-sensitized', 'CGD', through]), verbo([suppressing]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'Abcg5/8'])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', 'CAR', plays, an, important, role, in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([the, homeostasis, of, 'cholesterol,', bile, 'acids,', and, triglycerides, 'levels,', and, it, might, be, a, promising, therapeutic, target, for, preventing, or, treating, 'CGD'])].
[sujeto(['Liver', 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXR)', are, deemed, as, potential, drug]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, 'atherosclerosis,', whereas, a, role, in, adipose, tissue, expansion, and, its, relation, to, insulin, sensitivity, remains, unclear])].
[sujeto(['Increased', adipocyte, apoptosis, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, epididymal, fat, of, 'T0901317-treated', 'HFD', mice])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'T0901317', treatment]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([basal, 'lipolysis,', but, blunted, the, 'anti-lipolytic', action, of, insulin])].

[sujeto(['As', for, 'DMM-binding', 'factors,', 'LXRB', '(', liver, 'X', receptor, 'β)']), verbo([binds]), complemento([the, 'DMM', in, a, 'DR2-dependent', 'fashion,', and, 'LXR', '(', liver, 'X', 'receptor)', agonists, induce, significant, hypermethylation, of, the, bulk, of, 'Alu', in, 'THP-1', cells])].

[sujeto(['The', 'Glucocorticoid', 'Receptor', '(', 'GR)', is, a, transcription, factor, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, brain])].
[sujeto(['Unfortunately', the, specific, cellular]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, 'GR-mediated', behavioral, effects, of, 'GC', are, still, largely, unknown])].
[sujeto(['DeltaGR', is, a, constitutively, transcriptionally, active, form, of, the, 'GR', that, is, localized, in, the, nuclei, and]), verbo([activates]), complemento([transcription, without, binding, to, glucocorticoids])].
[sujeto(['We', focused, our, study, on, a, mouse, line, that]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['DeltaGR', almost, selectively, in, the, glutamatergic, neurons, of, the, dentate, gyrus, '(', 'DG)', of, the, hippocampus])].
[sujeto(['This', restricted, expression, of, the, 'DeltaGR']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['anxiety-related', behaviors, without, affecting, other, behaviors, that, could, indirectly, influence, performance, in, 'anxiety-related', tests])].

[sujeto(['Prostate', apoptosis, response, 'factor-4', '(', 'Par-4)', is, an, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['pro-apoptotic', and, tumour, suppressive, protein, that, can, both, activate, 'cell-death', mechanisms, and, inhibit, 'pro-survival', factors])].
[sujeto(['Par-4', contains, a, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['coiled-coil', region, that, serves, as, the, primary, recognition, domain, for, a, large, number, of, binding, partners])].

[sujeto(['Bioinformatic', analysis, of, the, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['Par-4', reveals, low, sequence, complexity, and, enrichment, in, polar, and, charged, amino, acids])].
[sujeto(['The', high, proteolytic, susceptibility, and, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([hydrodynamic, radius, are, consistent, with, a, largely, extended, structure, in, solution])].
[sujeto(['Spectroscopic', measurements, using, 'CD', and, 'NMR', also]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([characteristic, features, of, intrinsic, disorder])].
[sujeto(['Interruption', of, 'self-association', by, urea, also, resulted, in]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, secondary, structure])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'YY1', is, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'growing,', 'differentiated,', and, 'growth-arrested', cells])].
[sujeto(['The', protein, is]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento([and, has, a, 'half-life', of, 3.5, h])].
[sujeto(['To', define, functional, 'domains,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([generated, a, large, panel, of, 'YY1', mutant, proteins])].

[sujeto(['The', ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['multi-PDZ', protein, 'MUPP1,', which, is, composed, of, 13, 'PDZ', 'domains,', has, been, shown, to, interact, with, multiple, viral, and, cellular, proteins, and, to, play, important, roles, in, receptor, targeting, and, trafficking])].

[sujeto(['Endogenous', 'IP(3)Rs']), verbo([provide]), complemento([very, appealing, tools, for, studying, the, 'ubiquitin-proteasome', pathway, in, intact, mammalian, cells, 'because,', upon, 'activation,', they, are, rapidly, ubiquitinated, and, degraded])].
[sujeto(['Using', mass, 'spectrometry,', we, previously, examined, the, ubiquitination, of, 'IP(3)R1', in, 'αT3-1', pituitary, gonadotrophs, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'IP(3)R1', ubiquitination, is, highly, 'complex,', with, receptors, being, modified, at, multiple, sites, by, monoubiquitin, and, polyubiquitin, chains, formed, through, both, 'Lys-48', and, 'Lys-63', linkages, '(', 'Sliter,', 'D'])].

[sujeto(['Using', mass, spectrometry, and, 'linkage-specific', ubiquitin, 'antibodies,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, all, 'IP(3)R', types, are, subject, to, ubiquitination, at, approximately, the, same, locations, and, 'that,', independent, of, cell, 'type,', 'IP(3)Rs', are, modified, by, monoubiquitin, and, 'Lys-48-', and, 'Lys-63-linked', ubiquitin, 'chains,', although, in, differing, proportions])].

[sujeto(['Some', 'Chinese', pig, 'breeds,', such, as, 'Tibetan', pig, '(', 'TBP)', that, is, well, adapted, to, the, high, altitude, and, 'Dahe', pig, '(', 'DHP)', that, dwells, at, the, moderate, 'altitude,']), verbo([provide]), complemento([ideal, materials, to, study, local, adaptation, to, altitudes])].

[sujeto(['Autophagy', is, a, tightly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([lysosomal, degradation, pathway, for, maintaining, cellular, homeostasis, and, responding, to, stresses])].
[sujeto(['Beclin', 1, and, its]), verbo([interacting]), complemento(['proteins,', including, the, class, 'III', 'phosphatidylinositol-3', kinase, 'Vps34,', play, crucial, roles, in, autophagy, regulation, in, mammals])].
[sujeto(['We', identified]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, binding, factor, 2, '(', 'Nrbf2)', as, a, 'Beclin', 1, -, interacting, protein, from, 'Becn1(-/-);Becn1-EGFP/+', mouse, liver, and, brain])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Nrbf2-Beclin', 1, interaction, required, the, 'N', terminus, of, 'Nrbf2'])].
[sujeto(['We', next, used, the, human, retinal, pigment, epithelial, cell, line, 'RPE-1', as, a, model, system, and, showed, that, transiently, knocking, down, 'Nrbf2', by, siRNA]), verbo([increased]), complemento([autophagic, flux, under, both, 'nutrient-rich', and, starvation, conditions])].
[sujeto(['To', investigate, the, mechanism, by, which, 'Nrbf2']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['autophagy,', we, demonstrated, that, 'Nrbf2', interacted, and, colocalized, with, 'Atg14L,', suggesting, that, 'Nrbf2', is, a, component, of, the, 'Atg14L-containing', 'Beclin', 1, -, 'Vps34', complex])].

[sujeto(['This', work]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, novel, aspect, of, the, intricate, mechanism, for, the, 'Beclin', 1, -, 'Vps34', 'protein-protein', interaction, network, to, achieve, precise, control, of, autophagy])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Beclin', 1, -, 'Vps34', 'complex,', the, core, component, of, the, class, 'III', 'phosphatidylinositol-3', kinase, '(', 'PI3K-III),']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['Atg14L', or, 'UVRAG', to, control, different, steps, of, autophagy])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, identification, of, 'NRBF2', as, a, component, in, the, specific, 'PI3K-III', complex, and, a, modulator, of, 'PI3K-III', activity])].
[sujeto(['Through', its, microtubule, interaction, and, trafficking, '(', 'MIT)', 'domain,', 'NRBF2']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['Atg14L', directly, and, enhances, 'Atg14L-linked', 'Vps34', kinase, activity, and, autophagy, induction])].

[sujeto(['The', n6, fatty, acids, linoleic, acid, '(', 'LA),', 'γ-linolenic', acid, '(', 'GLA),', 'dihomo-GLA,', arachidonic, 'acid,', and, adrenic, acid, were]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([as, percentage, of, total, fatty, acids])].

[sujeto(['NRBF-2', exhibited, a, gene, activation, 'function,', when, tethered, to, a, heterologous, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['domain,', in, both, mammalian, cells, and, yeast])].
[sujeto(['Macroautophagy', is, a, physiological, cellular, response, to, nutrient, 'stress,', which]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, engulfment, of, cytosolic, contents, by, a, 'double-walled', membrane, 'structure,', the, phagophore])].
[sujeto(['Macroautophagy', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, numerous, cellular, 'factors,', including, the, 'Class', 'III', 'PI3K', '(', phosphoinositide, 3, -, 'kinase)', 'Vps34', '(', vacuolar, protein, sorting, 34, ')'])].
[sujeto(['The', autophagic, functions, of, 'Vps34']), verbo([require]), complemento([its, recruitment, to, a, complex, that, includes, 'Vps15,', 'Beclin-1', and, 'Atg14L', '(', 'autophagy-related', 14, -, like, 'protein)', and, is, known, as, 'Vps34', 'Complex', 'I'])].

[sujeto(['In', 'vitro,', 'NRBP2', protein, levels]), verbo([increased]), complemento([as, neural, 'stem/progenitor', cells, 'differentiated,', and, its, down, regulation, by, siRNA, rendered, neural, progenitor, cells, more, vulnerable, to, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['NRBP2']), verbo([has]), complemento([no, previously, assigned, function, and, our, studies, suggest, a, role, for, 'NRBP2', in, neural, progenitor, cell, survival])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([the, 'V-shaped', architecture, of, the, 'four-subunit', version, of, 'PI3KC3-C1', consisting, of, 'VPS', '(', vacuolar, protein, 'sorting)', 34, ',', 'VPS15,', 'BECN1', '(', 'Beclin', 1, ')', ',', and, 'ATG', '(', 'autophagy-related)', 14])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, a, putative, fifth, 'subunit,']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, binding, factor, 2, '(', 'NRBF2),', is, a, tightly, bound, component, of, the, complex, that, profoundly, affects, its, activity, and, architecture])].
[sujeto(['NRBF2']), verbo([enhances]), complemento([the, lipid, kinase, activity, of, the, catalytic, 'subunit,', 'VPS34,', by, roughly, 10, -, fold])].
[sujeto(['NRBF2']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([primarily, with, the, 'N', termini, of, 'ATG14', and, 'BECN1'])].
[sujeto(['Epidemiological', studies]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, levels, of, 'n-3', and, 'n-6', 'long-chain', polyunsaturated, fatty, acids, are, associated, with, risk, of, 'cardio-metabolic', outcomes, across, different, ethnic, groups])].
[sujeto(['Recent', 'genome-wide', association, studies, in, populations, of, 'European', ancestry]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, several, loci, associated, with, plasma, 'and/or', erythrocyte, polyunsaturated, fatty, acids])].
[sujeto(['We', also, confirmed, previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([loci, including, 'FADS1,', 'NTAN1,', 'NRBF2,', 'ELOVL2', and, 'GCKR'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([novel, insight, into, the, genetic, background, of, polyunsaturated, fatty, acids, and, their, differences, between, 'Chinese', and, 'European', populations])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, summarize, recent, findings, on, the, core, components, and, structural, architecture, of, the, 'Beclin', 1, -, 'Vps34', 'complexes,', and, how, these, findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([valuable, insights, into, the, molecular, mechanisms, that, underlie, the, multiple, functions, of, these, complexes, and, for, devising, therapeutic, strategies])].
[sujeto(['Genome-wide', association, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, 'SNPs', near, 'ZNF365', at, 10, q21])].

[sujeto(['The', most, strongly, 'risk-associated', 'SNP,', rs10995201, in, 'iCHAV1,', showed, clear, evidence, of, association, with, both, estrogen, receptor, '(', 'ER)-positive', '(', 'OR', =, 0.85, '[', 0.82, -, 0.88, ']', ')', and, 'ER-negative', '(', 'OR', =, 0.87, '[', 0.82, -, 0.91, ']', ')', 'disease,', and, was, also, the, 'SNP', most, strongly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, percent, mammographic, density])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([12, ',', 17, ',', 18, ',', and, 2, candidate, causal, 'SNPs', for, breast, cancer, in, iCHAVs, 1, -, 4, ',', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Chromosome', conformation, capture, analysis, showed, that, iCHAV2]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, 'ZNF365', and, 'NRBF2', '(', more, than, 600, kb, 'away)', promoters, in, normal, and, cancerous, breast, epithelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['Luciferase', assays, did, not, identify, 'SNPs', that, affect, transactivation, of, 'ZNF365,', but, identified, a, protective, haplotype, in, 'iCHAV2,']), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, silencing, of, the, 'NRBF2', 'promoter,', implicating, this, gene, in, the, etiology, of, breast, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Metazoans', additionally, possess, 'VPS33B,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([considerable, sequence, similarity, to, 'VPS33A', but, does, not, integrate, into, 'CORVET', or, 'HOPS', complexes, and, instead, stably, interacts, with, 'VIPAR'])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, recently, suggested, that, 'VPS33B', and, 'VIPAR', comprise, two, subunits, of, a, novel, 'multi-subunit', tethering, complex, '(', named, '"', 'CHEVI"),', perhaps, analogous, in, configuration, to, 'CORVET', and, 'HOPS'])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', few, proteins, were, identified, as]), verbo([associating]), complemento([with, both, 'VPS33A', and, 'VPS33B,', suggesting, that, these, proteins, have, distinct, 'sub-cellular', localizations])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'VPS33A', clearly, 'co-localized', with, several, subunits, of, 'CORVET', and, 'HOPS', in, this, 'assay,', no, proteins, with, the, canonical, 'CORVET/HOPS', domain, architecture, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, 'co-localize', with, 'VPS33B'])].
[sujeto(['Instead,', we, identified, that, 'VPS33B']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([directly, with, 'CCDC22,', a, member, of, the, 'CCC', complex])].
[sujeto(['CCDC22', does, not, 'co-fractionate', with, 'VPS33B', and, 'VIPAR', in, gel, filtration, of, human, cell, 'lysates,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'CCDC22', interacts, transiently, with, 'VPS33B/VIPAR', rather, than, forming, a, stable, complex, with, these, proteins, in, cells])].
[sujeto(['We', also, observed, that, the, protein, complex, containing, 'VPS33B', and, 'VIPAR', is, considerably, smaller, than, 'CORVET/HOPS,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, 'CHEVI', complex, comprises, just, 'VPS33B', and, 'VIPAR'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'autophagy-associated', 'PIK3C3-containing', phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PtdIns3K)', complex]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, interfere, with, 'APP', metabolism, and, amyloid, beta, peptide, '(', 'Aβ)', homeostasis, via, poorly, understood, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'NRBF2', '(', nuclear, receptor, binding, factor, 2, ')', ',', a, key, component, and, regulator, of, the, 'PtdIns3K,', is, involved, in, 'APP-CTFs', homeostasis, in, 'AD', cell, models])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'NRBF2', interacts, with, 'APP', in, vivo, and, its, expression, levels, are, reduced, in, hippocampus, of, 5, 'XFAD', 'AD', 'mice;', we, further, demonstrated, that, 'NRBF2', overexpression, promotes, degradation, of, 'APP', 'C-terminal', fragments, '(', 'APP-CTFs),', and, reduces, 'Aβ1-40', and, 'Aβ1-42', levels, in, human, mutant, 'APP-overexpressing', cells])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', 'APP-CTFs,', 'Aβ1-40', and, 'Aβ1-42', levels, were]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'Nrbf2', knockdown, or, nrbf2, knockout, cells])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'NRBF2', positively]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([autophagy, in, neuronal, cells, and, 'NRBF2-mediated', reduction, of, 'APP-CTFs', levels, is, autophagy, dependent])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', our, results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, potential, connection, between, 'NRBF2', and, the, 'AD-associated', protein, 'APP', by, showing, that, 'NRBF2', plays, an, important, role, in, regulating, degradation, of, 'APP-CTFs', through, modulating, autophagy])].
[sujeto(['NRBF2/Atg38']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, the, fifth, subunit, of, the, 'macroautophagic/autophagic', class, 'III', phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PtdIns3K)', 'complex,', along, with, 'ATG14/Barkor,', 'BECN1/Vps30,', 'PIK3R4/p150/Vps15', and, 'PIK3C3/Vps34'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'NRBF2', is, a, fine, tuning, regulator, of, 'PtdIns3K', controlled, by, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Human', 'NRBF2', is]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento([by, 'MTORC1', at, 'S113', and, 'S120'])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylated', 'NRBF2', preferentially]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'PIK3C3/PIK3R4'])].
[sujeto(['\240\Suppression', of, 'NRBF2', phosphorylation, by, 'MTORC1', inhibition, alters, its]), verbo([binding]), complemento([preference, from, 'PIK3C3/PIK3R4', to, 'ATG14/BECN1,', leading, to, increased, autophagic, 'PtdIns3K', complex, 'assembly,', as, well, as, enhancement, of, 'ULK1', protein, complex, association])].
[sujeto(['Consequently,', 'NRBF2', in, its, unphosphorylated, form]), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['PtdIns3K', lipid, kinase, activity, and, autophagy, 'flux,', whereas, its, phosphorylated, form, blocks, them])].
[sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento(['NRBF2', as, a, critical, molecular, switch, of, 'PtdIns3K', and, autophagy, 'activation,', and, its, 'on/off', state, is, precisely, controlled, by, 'MTORC1', through, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['The', structural, organization, of, heterotetrameric, complexes, is, starting, to, 'emerge,', but, little, is, known, about, organization, of, additional, accessory, subunits, that]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, these, assemblies])].
[sujeto(['Combining', 'hydrogen-deuterium', exchange, mass, spectrometry, '(', 'HDX-MS),', 'X-ray', crystallography, and, electron, microscopy, '(', 'EM),', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([characterized, 'Atg38', and, its, human, ortholog, 'NRBF2,', accessory, components, of, complex, 'I', consisting, of, 'Vps15-Vps34-Vps30/Atg6-Atg14', '(', 'yeast)', and, 'PIK3R4/VPS15-PIK3C3/VPS34-BECN1/Beclin', 1, -, 'ATG14', '(', 'human)'])].
[sujeto(['HDX-MS', shows, that, 'Atg38']), verbo([binds]), complemento([the, 'Vps30-Atg14', subcomplex, of, complex, 'I,', using, mainly, its, 'N-terminal', 'MIT', domain, and, bridges, the, 'coiled-coil', 'I', regions, of, 'Atg14', and, 'Vps30', in, the, base, of, complex, 'I'])].
[sujeto(['Nuclear', receptors, are, 'ligand-activated', transcription, factors]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, all, major, physiological, functions, of, complex, organisms])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'respect,', they, are, often, described, as, drugable]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, a, number, of, pathological, states, including, hypercholesterolemia, and, atherosclerosis])].
[sujeto(['HNF4alpha', '(', 'NR2A1)', is, a, recently, '\'', 'deorphanized\'']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, which, is, bound, in, vivo, by, linoleic, 'acid,', although, this, natural, ligand, does, not, seem, to, promote, transcriptional, activation])].
[sujeto(['In', 'mouse,', 'HNF4alpha', is, a, major, regulator, of, liver, development, and, hepatic, lipid, metabolism, and, mutations, in, human]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, linked, to, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([used, a, yeast, 'one-hybrid', system, to, identify, small, molecule, activators, of, 'HNF4alpha', in, a, library, of, synthetic, compounds, and, found, one, hit, bearing, a, methoxy, group, branched, on, a, nitronaphthofuran, backbone])].
[sujeto(['It', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, both, the, nitro, group, and, a, complete, naphthofuran, backbone, were, required, for, full, activity, of, the, compounds])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', adding, a, hydroxy, group, at, position, 7, of, the, minimal, backbone]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, most, active, compound, of, the, collection])].

[sujeto(['Their', actions, are]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([via, binding, to, 'PRL', receptor, '(', 'PRLR),', highly, expressed, in, brown, adipose, tissue, '(', 'BAT),', yet, their, impact, on, adipocyte, function, and, metabolism, remains, unclear])].

[sujeto(['That', the, effects, of, the, lactogens, in, 'BAT', are, at, least, partly]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'Insulin-like', 'Growth', 'Factor-2', '(', 'IGF-2)', is, supported, 'by:', 'i)', a, striking, reduction, in, 'BAT', 'IGF-2', expression, in, 'PRLR', 'KO', mice, and, in, 'PRLR-deficient', 'preadipocytes;', 'ii)', induction, of, cellular, 'IGF-2', expression, by, 'PRL', through, 'JAK2/STAT5', pathway, 'activation;', and, 'iii)', reversal, of, defective, differentiation, in, 'PRLR', 'KO', cells, by, exogenous, 'IGF-2'])].

[sujeto(['QRT-PCR', was, used, to, measure, transcripts, of, 'CCAT/enhancer']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'C/EBP)beta,', 'PPARgamma,', and, lipoprotein, lipase, '(', 'LPL;', 'early,', 'intermediate,', and, late, markers, of, 'adipogenesis)', and, for, uncoupling, protein, '(', 'UCP)-1', '(', brown, adipose, tissue, '[', 'BAT])'])].

[sujeto(['All', tumors, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, express, mismatch, repair, proteins])].
[sujeto(['The', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR;', 'NR1H4)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([bile, acid, and, lipid, homeostasis, by, acting, as, an, intracellular, bile, 'acid-sensing', transcription, factor])].

[sujeto(['Here', we, used, 'Affymetrix', 'micro-array', and, 'Northern', analysis, to, demonstrate, that, two, enzymes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, conjugation, of, bile, acids, to, taurine, and, 'glycine,', namely, bile, 'acid-CoA', synthetase, '(', 'BACS)', and, bile, 'acid-CoA:', amino, acid, 'N-acetyltransferase', '(', 'BAT)', are, induced, by, 'FXR', in, rat, liver])].
[sujeto(['The', response, elements, resemble, the, consensus, 'FXR']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, consisting, of, two, nuclear, receptor, 'half-sites', organized, as, an, inverted, repeat, and, separated, by, a, single, nucleotide, '(', 'IR-1)'])].

[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'MSI+', phenotype, in, gastric, cancers, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, have, distinct, clinicopathologic, characteristics, and, to, be, predictive, of, a, favorable, outcome, in, advanced, carcinoma])].
[sujeto(['Thyroid', hormones, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, normal, functioning, of, 'BAT'])].

[sujeto(['Rat', 'BAT', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, contain, 'NT3R', with, a, maximum, binding, capacity, '(', 'MBC)', of, 0.28, ng, 'T3/mg', 'DNA', and, a, dissociation, constant, '(', 'Kd)', of, 3.2, 'X', 10, '(', -, 10, ')', 'M'])].
[sujeto(['A', major, alteration, of, 'BAT', 'NT3R', 'MBC', or, 'Kd', is, thus, not, a, causal, factor, in, the, changes, in, 'BAT', thermogenesis]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, the, above, experimental, conditions])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 3, -, wk, overfeeding]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['(', +, 48, '%', ')', and, fasting, decreased, '(', -, 29, '%', ')', the, 'MBC', of, hepatic, 'NT3R'])].
[sujeto(['Overfeeding']), verbo([increased]), complemento([serum, 'T3', '(', +, 110, '%', ')', ',', while, fasting, decreased, it, '(', -, 37, '%', ')'])].
[sujeto(['Brown', adipose, tissue, '(', 'BAT)', is, a, potential, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([to, reverse, obesity])].
[sujeto(['The', purpose, of, this, study, was, to, determine, whether, primary, precursor, cells, isolated, from, human, adult, subcutaneous, white, adipose, tissue, '(', 'WAT)', can, be]), verbo([induced]), complemento([to, differentiate, 'in-vitro', into, adipocytes, that, express, key, markers, of, brown, or, beige, 'adipose,', and, whether, the, expression, level, of, such, markers, differs, between, lean, and, obese, young, adult, males])].

[sujeto(['Brown', adipose, tissue, '(', 'BAT)', produces, heat, using, chemical, energy, of, lipids, and, 'glucose,', a, function]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, cold, exposure, or, diet])].

[sujeto(['One-bead-one-compound', '(', 'OBOC)', combinatorial, library, screening]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, broadly, utilized, for, the, last, two, decades, to, identify, small, 'molecules,', peptides, or, peptidomimetics, targeting, variable, screening, probes, such, as, cell, surface, 'receptors,', 'bacteria,', protein, 'kinases,', 'phosphatases,', proteases, etc])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, novel, bead, immobilization, method, such, that, a, bead, library, array, can, be, conveniently, prepared, and, screened, in, its, 'entirety,', sequentially, many, times, with, a, series, of, distinct, probes])].

[sujeto([with]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['efficiency,', 'capacity,', and, specificity])].
