[sujeto(['The', mRNA, levels, of, 'Cyp7a1', and, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, 'FXR', '(', farnesoid, 'X', 'receptor),', 'SHP', '(', small, heterodimer, 'partner)', and, 'FTF', '(', 'alpha-fetoprotein', transcription, 'factor)', were, not, 'modified,', whereas, those, of, 'Cyp8b1', were, enhanced, and, those, of, 'Cyp27', were, reduced])].
[sujeto(['The', 're-appearance', of, '\'', 'flat-BAs\'', '(', mainly, 'allo-BAs', at, 20, weeks, and, 'Delta(4)-unsaturated-BAs', at, 32, 'weeks)', probably, reflects, the, progressive]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([observed, in, the, expression, of, 3, -, 'oxo-Delta(4)-steroid', 5, 'beta-reductase,', together, with, the, maintenance, of, steroid, 5, 'alpha-reductase', type, 'I'])].
[sujeto(['These', modifications, result, in, the, 're-appearance', of, '\'', 'flat-BAs\',', together, with, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['CA/CDCA', ratio, in, bile])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, a, dramatic, induction, of, inflammatory, gene, expression, in, livers, from, mice, fed, a, 'high-fat,', 'high-cholesterol', diet, containing, cholate, after, 3, -, 5, wk])].
[sujeto(['To', determine, the, contribution, of, cholate, in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([these, 'inductions,', 'C57BL/6', mice, were, fed, a, chow, diet, supplemented, with, increasing, concentrations, of, cholic, acid, '(', 'CA)', for, 5, days])].
[sujeto(['As', positive, 'controls,', a, 'dose-dependent', repression, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', and, a, 'dose-dependent', induction, of, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', expression, were, also, 'observed,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', was, activated])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'ICAM-1', and, 'SHP', mRNA, levels, were, also]), verbo([induced]), complemento([in, primary, human, hepatocytes, when, treated, with, chenodeoxycholic, acid, or, 'GW4064,', a, 'FXR-selective', agonist])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'ICAM-1', and, 'SHP', expression, were]), verbo([induced]), complemento([in, a, 'dose-', and, 'time-dependent', manner, by, treatment, with, the, 'FXR-selective', agonist, 'GW4064'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, induction, of, 'ICAM-1', by, 'GW4064', was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, the, 'FXR', antagonist, guggulsterone, or, with, transfection, of, 'FXR', siRNA])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', the, activity, of, 'FXR', was, mapped, to, a, retinoic, acid, response, element, '(', 'RARE)', site, containing, an, imbedded, farnesoid, 'X', response, element, '(', 'FXRE)', on, the, human, 'ICAM-1', promoter, and, 'FXR', and, retinoid, 'X', receptor, were, demonstrated, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, this, site])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', 'FXR-mediated', activation, of, 'ICAM-1', could, be, further]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, 'TNF-alpha', cotreatment, in, 'hepatocytes,', suggesting, a, potential, cooperation, between, cytokine, and, bile, 'acid-signaling', pathways, during, hepatic, inflammatory, events])].
[sujeto(['Peroxisomal', 'beta-oxidation', is, an, essential, step, in, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', since, it, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, shortening, of, 'C27-bile', acid, intermediates, to, produce, mature, 'C24-bile', acids])].
[sujeto(['An', alternative, pathway, for, bile, acid, biosynthesis]), verbo([involving]), complemento([the, peroxisomal, 'L-bifunctional', protein, '(', 'LBP)', has, been, proposed])].
[sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', 'trihydroxycholestanoyl-CoA', oxidase, was, inactive, in, double, 'knock-out', mice, due, to, a, peroxisomal, import, 'defect,']), verbo([preventing]), complemento([us, from, drawing, any, firm, conclusion, about, the, potential, role, of, 'LBP', in, an, alternative, bile, acid, biosynthesis, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', the, immature, 'C27-bile', acids, in, 'DBP', and, double, 'knock-out', mice, remained, unconjugated, in, juvenile, 'mice,', whereas, they, occurred, as, taurine, conjugates, after, 'weaning,', probably, contributing, to, the, minimal, weight]), verbo([gain]), complemento([of, the, mice, during, the, lactation, period])].
[sujeto(['This', correlated, with, a, marked, induction, of, bile, 'acyl-CoA:amino', acid, 'N-acyltransferase', expression, and, enzyme, activity, between, postnatal, days, 10, and, 21, ',', whereas, the, bile, 'acyl-CoA', synthetases]), verbo([increased]), complemento([gradually, with, age])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, hepatocyte, nuclear, 'factor-4alpha,', farnesoid, 'X', 'receptor,', and, peroxisome, proliferator, receptor, alpha, did, not, appear, to, be, involved, in, the, 'up-regulation', of, the, transferase])].
[sujeto(['The', treatment, of, primary, cultured, human, hepatocytes, with, a, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, alpha, '(', 'PPARalpha)-activating', concentration, of, ciprofibrate, '(', 10, '(', -, ')', '(', 4, ')', 'M)']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['(', 'HUMAN)SULT2A1', 'mRNA,', immunoreactive, 'protein,', and, enzymatic, activity, levels, by, approximately, 2, -, fold])].
[sujeto(['By', 'contrast,', expression, of, '(', 'RAT)SULT2A3,', the, rat, counterpart, to, '(', 'HUMAN)SULT2A1,', was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, treatment, of, primary, hepatocyte, cultures, with, an, activator, of, the, pregnane, 'X', 'receptor,', but, not, 'PPARalpha'])].
[sujeto(['Site-directed', mutagenesis, and, electrophoretic, mobility, shift, assay, studies, confirmed, that, this, distal, 'PPRE', '(', 'dPPRE),', a, direct, repeat]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, motif, containing, one, intervening, 'nt,', represented, a, functional, 'PPRE'])].
[sujeto(['Results', also, indicate, that, important, species, differences, govern, the, transactivation, of, 'SULT2A', gene, transcription, by]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors])].
[sujeto(['In', 'DCA-fed', 'rabbits,', 'ASBT', expression, was, 'repressed,']), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, activated, 'FXR,', and, evidenced, by, increased, ileal, short, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', mRNA])].
[sujeto(['Feeding', 'SC-435', to, the, rabbits, blocked, bile, acid, 'absorption,']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['SHP', 'mRNA,', and, increased, 'ASBT', expression])].
[sujeto(['FTF']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([the, rabbit, 'ASBT', promoter, activity, fourfold, but, not, after, the, 'FTF', binding, site, was, deleted, from, the, promoter])].
[sujeto(['Increasing', the, 'SHP', protein, notably]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['FTF-dependent', 'trans-activation', of, rabbit, 'ASBT'])].
[sujeto(['Adding', hydrophobic, bile, acids, deoxycholic, 'acid,', chenodeoxycholic, 'acid,', and, cholic, 'acid,']), verbo([activating]), complemento([ligands, for, 'FXR,', inhibited, rabbit, 'ASBT', promoter, activity, in, 'Caco-2', 'cells,', but, this, inhibitory, effect, was, abolished, after, the, 'FTF', binding, site, was, deleted])].
[sujeto(['Ursodeoxycholic', acid, and, ursocholic, 'acid,', nonactivating, ligands, for, 'FXR,', did, not]), verbo([repress]), complemento(['ASBT', promoter, activity])].
[sujeto(['Thus', the, rabbit, 'ASBT', promoter, is, 'negative-feedback']), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, bile, acids, via, a, functional, 'FTF', binding, site])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, demonstrate, that, 'FXR']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, at, least, two, secreted, 'factors,', complement, component, 'C3', and, 'FGF15,', the, rat, ortholog, of, 'FGF19,', known, to, influence, lipid, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['The', analysis, of, the, human, complement, 'C3', gene]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([the, presence, of, functional, 'FXR', response, elements, in, the, proximal, promoter, of, 'C3'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', rats, given, a, single, dose, of, an, 'FXR', agonist, exhibit, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, plasma, concentration, of, complement, 'C3', protein])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, demonstrate, a, mechanism, by, which, 'FXR,', a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, with, a, limited, tissue, expression, 'pattern,', regulates, secretion, of, factors, that, ultimately, can, affect, lipid, metabolism, in, an, endocrine, or, paracrine, manner])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'WAY', remarkably]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([portal, endotoxin, 'level,', and, lowered, serum, 'TNFα', concentration])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'WAY']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['LPS-induced', expression, of, hepatic, lipid, droplet, protein, adipose, 'differentiation-related', protein, '(', 'ADRP),', 'down-regulation', of, it, in, mice, fed, 30, '%', fructose])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'WAY']), verbo([repressed]), complemento([lipid, accumulation, and, 'ADRP', expression, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner, in, palmitic, acid, '(', 'PA)-treated', 'HepG2', and, 'Huh7', cells])].
[sujeto(['WAY']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['TNFα-induced', 'ADRP', 'up-regulation', via, competing, with, 'AP-1', for, 'ADRP', promoter, binding, region])].
[sujeto(['Together,', our, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'WAY,', an, 'FXR', 'agonist,', attenuates, liver, steatosis, through, multiple, mechanisms, critically, involved, in, the, development, of, 'hepatosteatosis,', and, represents, a, candidate, for, 'NAFLD', treatment])].
[sujeto(['Sterol', regulatory, 'element-binding', 'protein-2', '(', 'SREBP-2)', is, a, basic, 'helix-loop-helix-leucine', zipper, transcription, factor, that, positively]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([transcription, of, target, genes, involved, in, cholesterol, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, a, possible, involvement, of, 'SREBP-2', in, human, intestinal, expression, of, fibroblast, growth, factor, '(', 'FGF)19,', which, is, an, endocrine, hormone, involved, in, the, regulation, of, lipid, and, glucose, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, constitutively, active, 'SREBP-2']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['FGF19', mRNA, levels, in, human, 'colon-derived', 'LS174T', cells])].
[sujeto(['In', reporter, 'assays,', active, 'SREBP-2', overexpression]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['GW4064/FXR-mediated', increase, in, reporter, activities, in, regions, containing, the, 'IR-1', motif, '(', +, 848, to, +, 5200, ')', in, the, 'FGF19', gene])].
[sujeto(['In', electrophoretic, mobility, shift, 'assays,']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, the, 'FXR/retinoid', 'X', receptor, α, heterodimer, to, the, 'IR-1', motif, was, attenuated, by, adding, active, 'SREBP-2,', but, 'SREBP-2', binding, to, the, 'IR-1', motif, was, not, observed])].
[sujeto(['In', chromatin, immunoprecipitation, 'assays,', specific]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'FXR', to, the, 'IR-1-containing', region, of, the, 'FGF19', gene, '(', +, 3214, to, +, 3404, ')', was, increased, in, 'LS174T', cells, by, treatment, with, cholesterol, and, 25, -, hydroxycholesterol])].
[sujeto(['Specific']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'SREBP-2', to, 'FXR', was, observed, in, 'glutathione-S-transferase', '(', 'GST)', 'pull-down', assays])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SREBP-2', negatively, regulates, the, 'FXR-mediated', transcriptional, activation, of, the, 'FGF19', gene, in, human, intestinal, cells])].
[sujeto(['The', aged, liver, is, more, sensitive, to, the, drug, treatments, and]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, high, probability, of, developing, liver, disorders, such, as, 'fibrosis,', 'cirrhosis,', and, cancer])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, liver, response, to, 'CCl4', treatments, using, old, 'WT', mice, and, young, 'C/EBPα-S193D', knockin, 'mice,', which, express, an, 'aged-like', isoform, of, 'C/EBPα'])].
[sujeto(['Both', animal, models]), verbo([have]), complemento([altered, chromatin, structure, as, well, as, increased, liver, injury, and, proliferation, after, acute, 'CCl4', treatments])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, these, 'age-related', changes, are, associated, with, the, repression, of, key, regulators, of, liver, 'biology:', 'C/EBPα,', 'Farnesoid', 'X', 'Receptor', '(', 'FXR)', and, telomere, reverse, transcriptase, '(', 'TERT)'])].
[sujeto(['In', quiescent, livers, of, old, 'WT', and, young, 'S193D', 'mice,', the, inhibition, of, 'TERT', is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'HDAC1-C/EBPα', complexes])].
[sujeto(['After', 'CCl4', 'treatments,', 'TERT,', 'C/EBPα', and, 'FXR', are]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([by, different, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['These', mechanisms, include, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([of, a, dominant, negative, 'isoform,', 'C/EBPβ-LIP,', and, subsequent, repression, of, 'C/EBPα,', 'FXR,', and, 'TERT', promoters])].
[sujeto(['To', examine, if, these, alterations, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'drug-mediated', liver, 'diseases,', we, performed, chronic, treatments, of, mice, with, 'CCl4'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'C/EBPα-S193D', mice, developed, fibrosis, much, more, rapidly, than, 'WT', mice])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', our, data, show, that, the, 'age-associated', alterations, of, 'C/EBP', proteins, create, favorable, conditions, for, the]), verbo([increased]), complemento([liver, proliferation, after, 'CCl4', treatments, and, for, development, of, 'drug-mediated', liver, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Type', 'I', diabetes, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([in, female, 'C57BL/6', mice, with, multiple, low, dose, intraperitoneal, injections, of, streptozotocin, '(', 'STZ)', at, least, 2, weeks, prior, to, mating, with, normoglycemic, male, mice])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, expression, of, the, transcription, factor, 'ARNT/HIF1beta', is, reduced, in, islets, of, humans, with, type, 2, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([now, found, that, 'ARNT', is, also, reduced, in, livers, of, diabetics])].
[sujeto(['L-ARNT', 'KO', mice, had, normal, blood, glucose, but]), verbo([increased]), complemento([fed, insulin, levels])].
[sujeto(['These', mice, also, exhibited, features, of, type, 2, diabetes, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([hepatic, 'gluconeogenesis,', increased, lipogenic, gene, 'expression,', and, low, serum, 'beta-hydroxybutyrate'])].
[sujeto(['These', effects, appear, to, be, secondary, to]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'CCAAT/enhancer-binding', protein, alpha, '(', 'C/EBPalpha),', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', and, sterol, response, 'element-binding', protein, 1, c, '(', 'SREBP-1c)', and, a, reduction, in, phosphorylation, of, 'AMPK', without, changes, in, the, expression, of, enzymes, in, 'ketogenesis,', fatty, acid, 'oxidation,', or, 'FGF21'])].
[sujeto(['The', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', a, member, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptor, 'superfamily,', plays, an, essential, role, in, the, regulation, of, enterohepatic, circulation, and, lipid, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, two, synthetic, 'FXR', 'agonists,', 'WAY-362450', and, 'GW4064,', suppressed, 'interleukin-6-induced', 'CRP', expression, in, human, 'Hep3B', hepatoma, cells])].
[sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'FXR', by, short, interfering, 'RNA', attenuated, the, inhibitory, effect, of, the, 'FXR', agonists, and, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, ability, of, 'interleukin-6', to, induce, 'CRP', production])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, evidence, for, direct, 'anti-inflammatory', properties, of, 'FXR'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, blind, 'experiment,', participants, were, requested, to, predict, the, structures, and]), verbo([binding]), complemento([affinities, of, complexes, between, the, 'Farnesoid', 'X', nuclear, receptor, and, 102, different, ligands])].
[sujeto(['Only', 6, /, 35]), verbo([targets]), complemento([were, within, 2.5, '\240\Å', 'RMSD', from, the, 'reference,', which, prompted, us, to, investigate, the, limiting, factors, and, revise, our, protocol, for, 'Stage2'])].
[sujeto(['The', choice, of, the, receptor, conformation, appeared, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, strongest, influence, on, the, results])].
[sujeto(['The', docking, protocol, was, applied, to, all, 102, ligands, to, generate, poses, for]), verbo([binding]), complemento([affinity, prediction])].
[sujeto(['We', developed, a, modified, version, of, our, 'contact-based']), verbo([binding]), complemento([affinity, predictor, 'PRODIGY,', using, the, number, of, interatomic, contacts, classified, by, their, type, and, the, intermolecular, electrostatic, energy])].
[sujeto(['This', simple, 'structure-based']), verbo([binding]), complemento([affinity, predictor, shows, a, 'Kendall\'s', 'Tau', correlation, of, 0.37, in, ranking, the, ligands, '(', 7, th, best, out, of, 77, 'methods,', 5, 'th/25', 'groups)'])].
[sujeto(['This', results, in, an, enrichment, factor, of, 2.5, compared, to, a, random, predictor, for, ranking, ligands, within, the, top, 25, '%', ',', making, it, a, promising, approach, to, identify]), verbo([lead]), complemento([compounds, in, virtual, screening])].
[sujeto(['The', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', is, an, important]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, drug, discovery])].
[sujeto(['Small', molecules]), verbo([induce]), complemento([a, conformational, change, in, 'FXR', that, modulates, its, binding, to, 'co-regulators,', thus, resulting, in, distinct, 'FXR', functional, profiles])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms, for, selectively]), verbo([recruiting]), complemento(['co-regulators', by, 'FXR', remain, 'elusive,', partly, because, of, the, lack, of, 'FXR-selective', modulators])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([the, identification, of, two, natural, 'terpenoids,', tschimgine, and, 'feroline,', as, novel, 'FXR', modulators])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', their, crystal, structures, uncovered, a, secondary]), verbo([binding]), complemento([pocket, important, for, ligand, binding])].
[sujeto(['Further,', tschimgine, or, feroline]), verbo([induced]), complemento([dynamic, conformational, changes, in, the, activation, function, 2, '(', 'AF-2)', 'surface,', thus, leading, to, differential, 'co-regulator', recruiting, 'profiles,', modulated, by, both, hydrophobic, and, selective, 'hydrogen-bond', interactions, unique, to, specific, 'co-regulators'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, thus]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, novel, structure, template, for, optimization, for, 'FXR-selective', modulators, of, clinical, value])].
[sujeto(['OCT1']), verbo([has]), complemento([unique, expression, pattern])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, highest, expression, among, drug, transporters, in, normal, human, hepatocytes, with, large, interindividual, 'variability,', but, it, has, negligible, expression, in, other, tissues, or, their, tumors])].
[sujeto(['Nowadays,', it, is, clear, that, the, regulation, of, 'SLC22A1', gene, encoding, 'OCT1', transporter, is, rather, complex, and, that, transactivation, with, hepatocyte]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, 4, α, '(', 'HNF4α)', and, 'CCAAT-enhancer-binding', protein, '(', 'C/EBPs)', transcription, factors, as, well, as, epigenetic, regulation, contribute, to, its, unique, 'hepatocyte-specific', expression, pattern])].
[sujeto(['We', also, propose, that, comprehensive, understanding, of, mechanisms, of, 'SLC22A1', gene, regulation, could, direct, research, for, other, drug, transporters, and, 'drug-metabolizing', enzymes, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, hepatocytes, and, controlled, by, 'HNF4α', or, other, 'liver-enriched', transcription, factors])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, lipid, accumulation]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, well, recognized, as, a, promising, strategy, for, 'ALD'])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies, showed, that, curcumin]), verbo([has]), complemento([potential, effect, on, 'ALD', by, regulating, oxidative, stress, and, ethanol, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['Recent', researches]), verbo([have]), complemento([indicated, that, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', and, nuclear, factor, '(', 'erythroid-derived', 2, ')', -, like, 2, '(', 'Nrf2)', have, excellent, effects, on, reducing, lipid, deposition])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', curcumin, alleviated, the, symptom, of, hyperlipidemia, and, hepatic, steatosis, via]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([the, expression, of, sterol, regulatory, 'element-binding', 'protein-1c,', fatty, acid, 'synthase,', and, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', 'receptor-alpha', as, well, as, the, activity, of, carnitine, palmitoyltransferase, 1])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', curcumin]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'Nrf2', and, 'FXR', in, 'liver,', strongly, implying, close, relationship, between, inhibitory, effect, of, curcumin, on, hepatic, steatosis, and, the, above, two, genes])].
[sujeto(['The', following, in, vitro, experiments, further, verified, the, protective, effects, of, curcumin, against, hepatotoxicity, and, lipid, accumulation, in, hepatocytes]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, ethanol])].
[sujeto(['Gain-', or, 'loss-of-function', analyses, revealed, 'Nrf2', and, 'FXR']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([the, effect, of, curcumin, on, lipid, deposition, in, 'hepatocytes,', and, curcumin, modulated, the, expression, of, 'FXR', mediated, by, 'Nrf2'])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', we, drew, a, conclusion, that, curcumin, attenuated, 'ALD', by]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([lipid, deposition, in, hepatocytes, via, a, 'Nrf2/FXR', 'activation-dependent', mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, an, important, role, for, 'celastrol,', a, proteasome, inhibitor, isolated, from, 'Tripterygium', wilfordii, 'Hook'])].
[sujeto(['Celastrol']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, terminal, differentiation, of, 3, 'T3-L1', adipocytes, and, decreased, the, levels, of, triglycerides, in, 'wild-type', mice])].
[sujeto(['Lipidomics', analysis, revealed, that, celastrol]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, metabolism, of, lysophosphatidylcholines, '(', 'LPCs),', phosphatidylcholines, '(', 'PCs),', sphingomyelins, '(', 'SMs),', and, phosphatidylethanolamines, '(', 'PEs)'])].
[sujeto(['Further,', celastrol, reversed, the, 'tyloxapol-induced', hyperlipidemia]), verbo([induced]), complemento([associated, with, increased, plasma, 'LPCs,', 'PCs,', 'SMs,', and, ceramides, '(', 'CMs)'])].
[sujeto(['Among', these, 'lipids,', 'LPC(16:0),', 'LPC(18:1),', 'PC(22:2/15:0),', and, 'SM(d18:1/22:0)', were, also]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([by, celastrol, in, cultured, 3, 'T3-L1', 'adipocytes,', 'mice,', and, 'tyloxapol-treated', mice])].
[sujeto(['The', mRNAs, encoded, by, hepatic, genes]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, lipid, synthesis, and, 'catabolism,', including, 'Lpcat1,', 'Pld1,', 'Smpd3,', and, 'Sptc2,', were, altered, in, 'tyloxapol-induced', 'hyperlipidemia,', and, significantly, recovered, by, celastrol, treatment])].
[sujeto(['The', effect, of, celastrol, on, lipid, metabolism, was, significantly, reduced, in, 'Fxr-null', 'mice,', resulting, in]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['Cers6', and, 'Acer2', mRNAs, compared, to, 'wild-type', mice])].
[sujeto(['Various', clinical, trials]), verbo([have]), complemento([indicated, that, several, pharmacological, 'agents,', including, angiotensin, 'II', receptor, blockers, '(', 'ARBs)', or, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', 'agonists,', are, effective, in, 'NASH', treatment])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', functional, foods, are, expected, to, be, important, alternatives, for, treating, or]), verbo([preventing]), complemento(['NASH'])].

[sujeto(['NMDA', 'receptor-dependent', 'long-term', potentiation, and, 'long-term', depression, '(', 'LTD)']), verbo([involve]), complemento([changes, in, 'AMPA', receptor, activity, and, postsynaptic, localization, that, are, in, part, controlled, by, glutamate, receptor, 1, '(', 'GluR1)', subunit, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['The', scaffolding, molecule, 'A-kinase', anchoring, protein, '(', 'AKAP)79/150']), verbo([targets]), complemento([both, the, 'cAMP-dependent', protein, kinase, '(', 'PKA)', and, protein, phosphatase, 2, 'B/calcineurin', '(', 'PP2B/CaN)', to, 'AMPA', receptors, to, regulate, 'GluR1', phosphorylation])].

[sujeto(['Since', sHSP, are, known, to, be]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, many, intracellular, signaling, molecules, in, other, cells, types, outside, the, 'brain,', we, investigated, whether, similar, regulation, may, serve, a, role, in, the, brain, by, measuring, protein, kinase, 'B', '(', 'PKB/Akt),', pGSK3, and, the, mitogen, activated, protein, '(', 'MAP)', 'kinases,', 'p38,', 'phospho-extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'pERK)', and, 'phospho-c-Jun', kinase, '(', 'pJNK)'])].
[sujeto(['Results', demonstrated, 'exercise-dependent']), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, 'HSP27', and, 'alpha-B-crystallin', levels])].

[sujeto(['Exercise', had, a, differential, impact, on, 'kinases,', significantly, reducing, pAkt, and, 'pERK,', while]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([p38, 'MAPK'])].

[sujeto(['In', barrelette, cells, of, normal, 'PND', 1, 'rats,', weak, stimulation, of, the, trigeminal, tract, '(', 'TrV)', that, was, subthreshold, for]), verbo([inducing]), complemento(['Na(+)', spikes, evoked, an, excitatory, postsynaptic, 'potential-inhibitory', postsynaptic, potential, '(', 'EPSP-IPSP)', sequence, that, was, similar, to, the, responses, seen, in, older, rats, '(', 'Lo', et, al])].
[sujeto(['These', observations]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, local, neuronal, circuits, are, already, established, in, 'PrV', at, birth, and, remain, intact, after, deafferentation])].
[sujeto(['Strong', stimulation, of, the, 'TrV']), verbo([induced]), complemento([a, sustained, depolarization, '(', plateau, 'potential)', in, denervated, but, not, in, normal, barrelette, neurons])].
[sujeto([1, 'mV/ms);', 3, ')', partially, or, totally]), verbo([inactivated]), complemento(['Na(+)', spikes, on, the, 'plateau;', and, 4, ')', a, termination, by, a, steep, decay, '(', &, 'gt;1', 'mV/ms)', to, a, hyperpolarizing, membrane, level])].
[sujeto(['The', plateau, potential, was]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'L-type', 'Ca(2+)', channels, and, triggered, by, a, 'N-methyl-D-aspartate', '(', 'NMDA)', 'receptor-mediated', 'EPSP'])].
[sujeto(['gamma-aminobutyric', 'acid-A', '(', 'GABA(A))', 'receptor-mediated', 'IPSP', dynamically]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([the, latency, and, duration, of, the, plateau, potential])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, after, neonatal, peripheral, 'damage,', central, trigeminal, inputs]), verbo([cause]), complemento([a, large, and, 'long-lasting', 'Ca(2+)', influx, through, 'L-type', 'Ca(2+)', channels, in, barrelette, neurons])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, recognized, for, some, years, that, a, prolonged, 'Ca(2+)', elevation, that, is, predictive, of, impending, cell, death, develops, in, cultured, neurons, following, excitotoxic, insult])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', neurons, exhibit]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([sensitivity, to, excitotoxic, insult, with, increasing, age, in, culture])].
[sujeto(['However,', little, is, known, about, the, processes, that, selectively]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, 'post-insult', 'Ca(2+)', elevation, and, 'therefore,', it, remains, unclear, whether, it, is, associated, specifically, with, 'age-dependent', toxicity])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, tested, the, hypothesis, that, a, group, 'I', metabotropic, glutamate, receptor, antagonist, selectively]), verbo([modulates]), complemento([the, prolonged, 'Ca(2+)', elevation, in, direct, association, with, its, protective, effects, against, excitotoxicity])].
[sujeto(['From', these, results, we]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'post-insult', 'Ca(2+)', elevation, is, regulated, differently, from, the, 'Ca(2+)', elevation, during, glutamate, insult, and, is, modulated, by, group, 'I', metabotropic, glutamate, receptors])].
[sujeto(['DARPP-32', '(', dopamine, and, cyclic, adenosine, 'monophosphate-regulated', phosphoprotein, of, approximate, molecular, weight, 32, 'kDa)', is, an, important, regulator, of, protein, 'phosphatase-1', that, in, turn]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([a, large, number, of, 'effectors,', including, the, 'NMDA', receptor])].
[sujeto(['SKF82958', alone, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['PKA-mediated', phosphorylation, of, both, 'DARPP-32', and, 'NR1'])].
[sujeto(['Subcellular', distributions, of, extracellular, 'signal-kinases', '(', 'ERK1/2),', including, their]), verbo([activated]), complemento([form, '(', 'p-ERK1/2),', were, investigated, in, 'glutamate-induced', 'apoptotic-like', death, in, cultured, rat, cortical, neurons, by, 'Western', immunoblot, and, immunocytochemistry])].
[sujeto(['During', 15, min, glutamate, 'exposure,', 'p-ERK1/2', was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, both, cytosol, and, nuclear, 'extracts,', but, prominently, so, in, nuclear, extracts])].
[sujeto(['Simultaneously,', 'ERK1/2', were, mildly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, cytosol, '(', to, 0.7, -, fold, vs, sham, 'control),', largely, increased, in, nuclear, extracts, '(', to, 6.2, -, fold, vs, sham, 'control),', but, not, changed, in, total, cell, extracts])].
[sujeto(['Immunocytochemistry', studies, also, showed, a, large]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, nuclear, and, a, mild, decrease, in, cytosol, extracts, of, 'ERK1/2', at, 15, min, of, exposure])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([increase, of, 'ERK1/2', was, largely, prevented, by, inhibition, of, 'ERK1/2', 'activation,', but, prolonged, by, elongation, of, 'ERK1/2', activation])].
[sujeto(['These', observations]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, stimulation, of, glutamate, receptors, in, cortical, neurons, may, incur, an, 'activation-dependent', transient, nuclear, translocation, of, 'ERK1/2,', which, might, be, involved, in, excitotoxicity, through, a, simultaneous, strong, elevation, of, 'p-ERK1/2', in, nucleus])].
[sujeto(['Glutamate', 'neurotoxicity,', particularly, when]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, 'N-methyl-D-aspartate', '(', 'NMDA)', subtype, of, glutamate, 'receptors,', has, been, hypothesized, to, underlie, several, types, of, acute, brain, 'injury,', including, stroke])].
[sujeto(['Several', neurological, insults, linked, to, excessive]), verbo([release]), complemento([of, glutamate, and, neuronal, death, result, in, tyrosine, kinase, 'activation,', including, 'p44/42', mitogen, activated, protein, '(', 'MAP)', kinase])].
[sujeto(['To', further, explore, a, role, for, 'MAP', kinase, activation, in, 'excitotoxicity,', we, used, a, novel, tissue, culture, model, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([neurotoxicity])].
[sujeto(['Removal', of, the, endogenous, blockade, by, 'Mg2+', of, the, 'NMDA', receptor, in, cultured, hippocampal, neurons]), verbo([triggers]), complemento([a, self, perpetuating, cycle, of, 'excitotoxicity,', which, has, relatively, slow, 'onset,', and, is, critically, dependent, on, 'NMDA', receptors, and, activation, of, voltage, gated, 'Na+', channels])].
[sujeto(['These', injury, conditions]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, a, rapid, phosphorylation, of, 'p44/42', that, was, blocked, by, 'MAP', kinase, kinase, '(', 'MEK)', inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['MEK', inhibition, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, protection, against, synaptically, mediated, excitotoxicity])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', hippocampal, neurons, preconditioned, by, a, sublethal, exposure, to, 'Mg(2+)-free', conditions, were, rendered, resistant, to, injury]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, a, subsequently, longer, exposure, to, this, 'insult;', the, preconditioning, effect, was, 'MAP', kinase, dependent])].
[sujeto(['The', 'MAP', kinase, signaling, pathway, can, also]), verbo([promote]), complemento([polypeptide, growth, factor, mediated, neuronal, survival])].
[sujeto(['MAP', kinase]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([pathways, may, act, to, promote, survival, or, 'death,', depending, upon, the, cellular, context, in, which, they, are, activated])].
[sujeto(['The', gaseous, radical, nitric, oxide, '(', 'NO)', is, catalyzed, by, conversion, of, 'L-arginine', to, 'L-citrulline', by, one, cytokine, inducible, form, '(', 'iNOS),', which, becomes, active, only, within, hours, after, the]), verbo([inducing]), complemento(['event,', and, by, two, constitutively, expressed, 'forms,', endothelial, '(', 'eNOS)', and, neuronal, '(', 'nNOS),', which, are, regulated, by, the, cytosolic, concentration, of, free, 'Ca2+'])].
[sujeto(['After', its, diffusion, into, the, extraneuronal, 'space,', 'NO', may]), verbo([activate]), complemento([in, 'neurons,', which, as, a, rule, do, not, stain, for, 'NOS,', soluble, guanylyl, cyclase, and, formation, of, cGMP, as, an, intracellular, messenger])].
[sujeto(['NO', as, a, nitrosylating, agent]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([disulfide, bonding, of, vicinal, sulfhydryl, '(', 'thiol)', groups, of, the, redox, modulatory, site, of, the, 'NMDA', receptor, complex, and, thereby, 'down-regulates', its, 'Ca2+', channel, activity])].
[sujeto(['Histochemical', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, the, presence, of, a, large, number, of, 'NOS', containing, neurons, in, the, magnocellular, and, parvocellular, subdivisions, of, hypothalamic, nuclei])].
[sujeto(['Numerous', studies, conform, to, the, view, that, 'NO']), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, the, control, of, many, different, neurosecretory, 'processes,', especially, of, the, 'corticotropin-releasing', hormone, '(', 'CRH)', neurosecretory, system])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', glucocorticoids, augment, neuronal, excitotoxicity, by]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([the, expression, of, glutamate, receptors, and, inhibition, of, glutamate, reuptake])].
[sujeto(['In', attempting, to, explain, the, many, conflicting, results, obtained, in, studies, with, 'NO,', it, may, be, worthwhile, to, consider, that, the, actual, 'redox-environment', of, distinct, loci, of, the, brain, may, determine, the, final, function, of, 'NO,']), verbo([acting]), complemento([either, as, a, transmitter, or, neuromodulator, 'or,', in, the, worst, 'case,', causing, neurodestruction])].
[sujeto(['The', 'beta(1)-adrenergic', receptor, '(', 'beta(1)AR)', is, the, most, abundant, subtype, of, 'beta-adrenergic', receptor, in, the, mammalian, brain, and, is, known, to, potently]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([synaptic, plasticity])].
[sujeto(['These', screens, identified, 'PSD-95,', a, multiple, 'PDZ', 'domain-containing', scaffolding, 'protein,', as, a, specific]), verbo([binding]), complemento([partner, of, the, 'beta(1)AR-CT'])].
[sujeto(['This', interaction, was, confirmed, by, in, vitro, fusion, protein, 'pull-down', and, blot, overlay, 'experiments,', which, demonstrated, that, the, 'beta(1)AR-CT']), verbo([binds]), complemento([specifically, to, the, third, 'PDZ', domain, of, 'PSD-95'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, 'full-length', 'beta(1)AR']), verbo([associates]), complemento([with, 'PSD-95', in, 'cells,', as, determined, by, 'co-immunoprecipitation', experiments, and, immunofluorescence, 'co-localization', studies])].
[sujeto(['The', interaction, between, 'beta(1)AR', and, 'PSD-95', is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, last, few, amino, acids, of, the, 'beta(1)AR,', and, mutation, of, the, 'beta(1)AR', carboxyl, terminus, eliminated, the, binding, and, disrupted, the, 'co-localization', of, the, 'beta(1)AR', and, 'PSD-95', in, cells])].
[sujeto(['Agonist-induced', internalization, of, the, 'beta(1)AR', in, 'HEK-293', cells, was, markedly, attenuated, by, 'PSD-95', 'co-expression,', whereas, 'co-expression', of, 'PSD-95']), verbo([has]), complemento([no, significant, effect, on, either, desensitization, of, the, 'beta(1)AR', or, 'beta(1)AR-induced', cAMP, accumulation])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'PSD-95', is, a, specific, 'beta(1)AR', binding, partner, that, modulates, 'beta(1)AR', function, and, facilitates, physical, association, of, the, 'beta(1)AR', with, synaptic, 'proteins,', such, as, the, 'N-methyl-d-aspartate', 'receptors,', which, are, known, to, be, regulated, by, 'beta(1)AR', stimulation])].
[sujeto(['The', 'NMDA', subtype, of, glutamate, receptor, is, physically]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, postsynaptic, density, protein, 'PSD-95', at, glutamatergic, synapses])].
[sujeto(['The', channel, activity, of, 'NMDA', receptors, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, different, signaling, 'molecules,', including, protein, tyrosine, kinases])].
[sujeto(['Because', previous, results]), verbo([have]), complemento([suggested, a, role, for, protein, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC)', in, insulin, potentiation, of, 'NMDA', currents, in, 'oocytes,', the, effects, of, coexpression, of, 'PSD-95', on, insulin, and, 'PKC', potentiation, of, 'NMDA', currents, from, these, receptors, were, compared])].
[sujeto(['Another', primary, objective, was, to, determine, if, 'PSD-95', could, enable, 'Src', to, potentiate, currents, from, 'NR2A/NR1', and, 'NR2B/NR1', receptors]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'Xenopus', oocytes])].
[sujeto(['Src', potentiation, of, mouse, 'NR2A/NR1', currents]), verbo([required]), complemento(['PSD-95', coexpression])].
[sujeto(['A', large, proportion, of, grafted, striatal, neurons, 'die,', and, mechanisms, by, which, they, succumb, may]), verbo([involve]), complemento([excitotoxicity, and, oxidative, stress])].
[sujeto(['Neither', compound]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, survival, of, 'grafts,', suggesting, that, 'NMDA-related', excitotoxicity, or, oxidative, stress, may, not, be, primary, mediators, of, cell, death, in, striatal, grafts])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', are, additionally, enriched, in, proteins, that]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, these, complexes, to, modulate, synaptic, 'strength,', namely, proteins, regulating, actin, filament, dynamics, and, those, whose, messenger, 'RNAs', are, targets, of, fragile, 'X', mental, retardation, protein, '(', 'FMRP)'])].
[sujeto(['Aligning', our, findings, with, a, parallel, 'case-control', 'study,', we, demonstrate, reproducible, insights, into, aetiological, mechanisms, for, schizophrenia, and]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([pathophysiology, shared, with, other, neurodevelopmental, disorders])].
[sujeto(['The', mammalian, striatin, family, consists, of, three, 'proteins,', 'striatin,', 'S/G2']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['autoantigen,', and, zinedin])].
[sujeto(['Striatin', family, members]), verbo([have]), complemento([no, intrinsic, catalytic, 'activity,', but, rather, function, as, scaffolding, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', they, organize, multiple, 'diverse,', large, signaling, complexes, that]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, a, variety, of, cellular, processes])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', striatin, family, members]), verbo([associate]), complemento([with, germinal, center, kinase, 'III', kinases, as, well, as, other, novel, 'components,', earning, these, assemblies, the, name, 'striatin-interacting', phosphatase, and, kinase, '(', 'STRIPAK)', complexes])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', there]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, a, great, increase, in, functional, and, mechanistic, studies, aimed, at, identifying, and, understanding, the, roles, of, 'STRIPAK', and, 'STRIPAK-like', complexes, in, cellular, processes, of, multiple, organisms])].
[sujeto(['These', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, novel, 'STRIPAK', and, 'STRIPAK-like', complexes, and, have, explored, their, roles, in, specific, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Together,', the, results, of, these, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([sparked, increased, interest, in, striatin, family, complexes, because, they, have, revealed, roles, in, 'signaling,', cell, cycle, 'control,', 'apoptosis,', vesicular, 'trafficking,', 'Golgi', 'assembly,', cell, 'polarity,', cell, 'migration,', neural, and, vascular, 'development,', and, cardiac, function])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'STRIPAK', complexes]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, connected, to, clinical, 'conditions,', including, cardiac, 'disease,', 'diabetes,', 'autism,', and, cerebral, cavernous, malformation])].
[sujeto(['A', large, number, of, experimental, and, clinical, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([confirmed, that, brief, remifentanil, exposure, can, enhance, pain, sensitivity, presenting, as, 'opioid-induced', hyperalgesia, '(', 'OIH)'])].
[sujeto(['N-methyl-D-aspartate', '(', 'NMDA)', receptor, antagonists]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, inhibit, morphine, analgesic, tolerance, in, many, studies])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, glycogen, synthase, 'kinase-3β', '(', 'GSK-3β)', modulated, 'NMDA', receptor, trafficking, in, a, rat, model, of, 'remifentanil-induced', postoperative, hyperalgesia])].
[sujeto(['In', the, current, 'study,', it, was, demonstrated, that, 'GSK-3β', inhibition]), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['remifentanil-induced', hyperalgesia, via, regulating, the, expression, and, function, of, spinal, 'NMDA', receptors, in, vivo, and, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, remifentanil, infusion, at, 1, 'μg·kg(-1)·min(-1)', and, 2, 'μg·kg(-1)·min(-1)', caused, mechanical, and, thermal, 'hyperalgesia,', 'up-regulated', 'NMDA', receptor, subunits, 'NR1', and, 'NR2B', expression, in, both, membrane, fraction, and, total, lysate, of, the, spinal, cord, dorsal, horn, and, increased, 'GSK-3β', activity, in, spinal, cord, dorsal, horn])].
[sujeto(['GSK-3β', inhibitor, 'TDZD-8', significantly, attenuated, 'remifentanil-induced', mechanical, and, thermal, hyperalgesia, from, 2, h, to, 48, h, after, 'infusion,', and, this, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, reversal, of, 'up-regulated', 'NR1', and, 'NR2B', subunits, in, both, membrane, fraction, and, total, lysate])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', remifentanil, incubation]), verbo([increased]), complemento([amplitude, and, frequency, of, 'NMDA', 'receptor-induced', current, in, dorsal, horn, 'neurons,', which, was, prevented, with, the, application, of, 'TDZD-8'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, inhibition, of, 'GSK-3β', can, significantly, ameliorate, 'remifentanil-induced', hyperalgesia, via, modulating, the, expression, and, function, of, 'NMDA', 'receptors,', which, present, useful, insights, into, the, mechanistic, action, of, 'GSK-3β', inhibitor, as, potential, 'anti-hyperalgesic', agents, for, treating, 'OIH'])].
[sujeto(['There', is, mounting, evidence, that, the, 'autophagosome-lysosomal', degradation, is, 'impaired,', which, could, disturb, the, processing, of, 'APP', and]), verbo([provoke]), complemento(['AD', pathology])].
[sujeto(['Beclin', 1, is, a, molecular, platform, assembling, an, interactome, with]), verbo([stimulating]), complemento([and, suppressive, components, which, regulate, the, initiation, of, the, autophagosome, formation])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([indicated, that, the, expression, 'Beclin', 1, is, reduced, in, 'AD', brain])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, deficiency, of, 'Beclin', 1, in, cultured, neurons, and, transgenic, mice]), verbo([provokes]), complemento([the, deposition, of, 'amyloid-β', peptides, whereas, its, overexpression, reduces, the, accumulation, of, 'amyloid-β'])].
[sujeto(['There', are, several, potential, 'mechanisms,', which, could]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, function, of, 'Beclin', 1, interactome, and, thus, impair, autophagy, and, promote, 'AD', pathology])].
[sujeto(['The', mechanisms, include, '(', 'i)', reduction, of, 'Beclin', 1, expression, or, its]), verbo([increased]), complemento([proteolytic, cleavage, by, 'caspases,', '(', 'ii)', sequestration, of, 'Beclin', 1, to, 'non-functional', 'locations,', such, as, tau, 'tangles,', '(', 'iii)', formation, of, inhibitory, complexes, between, 'Beclin', 1, and, antiapoptotic, 'Bcl-2', proteins, or, 'inflammasomes,', '(', 'iv)', interaction, of, 'Beclin', 1, with, inhibitory, neurovirulent, 'proteins,', e])].
[sujeto(['We', will, shortly, introduce, the, function, of, 'Beclin', 1, interactome, in, autophagy, and, 'phagocytosis,', review, the, recent, evidence, indicating, that, 'Beclin', 1]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([autophagy, and, 'APP', processing, in, 'AD,', and, finally, examine, the, potential, mechanisms, through, which, 'Beclin', 1, dysfunction, could, be, involved, in, the, pathogenesis, of, 'AD'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, search, for, new, drug, 'targets,', that, may, help, point, the, way, to, develop, 'fast-acting', treatments, for, mood, 'disorders,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([explored, molecular, pathways, regulated, by, 'ketamine,', an, 'NMDA', receptor, 'antagonist,', which, has, consistently, shown, antidepressant, response, within, a, few, hours, of, administration])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'Sprague-Dawley', rats, we, investigated, the, effects, of, ketamine, on, the, presynaptic]), verbo([release]), complemento([machinery, responsible, for, neurotransmitter, release, at, 1, ',', 2, and, 4, h, as, well, as, 7, days, after, administration, of, a, single, subanesthetic, dose, of, ketamine, '(', 15, 'mg/kg)'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'parallel,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([a, selective, reduction, in, the, expression, of, the, synaptic, vesicle, protein, synaptotagmin, 'I', and, an, increase, in, the, levels, of, synapsin, 'I', in, hippocampal, synaptosomes, suggesting, a, mechanism, by, which, ketamine, reduces, 'SNARE', complex, 'formation,', in, 'part,', by, regulating, the, number, of, synaptic, vesicles, in, the, nerve, terminals])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', ketamine, reduced, 'Thr(286)-phosphorylated', αCaMKII, and, its, interaction, with, syntaxin, 1, 'A,', which, identifies, 'CaMKII', as, a, potential]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, second, 'messenger-mediated', actions, of, ketamine])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', despite, previous]), verbo([reports]), complemento([of, 'ketamine-induced', inhibition, of, 'GSK-3,', we, were, unable, to, detect, regulation, of, its, activity, after, ketamine, administration])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, demonstrate, that, ketamine, rapidly]), verbo([induces]), complemento([changes, in, the, hippocampal, presynaptic, machinery, similar, to, those, that, are, obtained, only, with, chronic, treatments, with, traditional, antidepressants])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, reduction, of, neurotransmitter, release, in, the, hippocampus, has, possible, relevance, for, the, rapid, antidepressant, effect, of, ketamine])].
[sujeto(['In', open, field, 'test,', 'BPA', at, 0.4, ',', 4, ',', or, 40, 'mg/kg/day']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, frequency, of, rearing, and, time, in, the, central, area, of, the, 'males,', while, 'BPA', at, 0.4, 'mg/kg/day', reduced, the, frequency, of, rearing, in, the, females])].
[sujeto(['Exposure', to, 'BPA', '(', 0.4, or, 40, 'mg/kg/day)', extended, the, average, escape, pathlength, to, the, hidden, platform, in, 'Morris', water, maze, task, and, shortened, the, 'step-down', latency, 24, h, after, footshock, of, the, 'males,', but, no, changes, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, females, for, these, measures])].
[sujeto(['Meanwhile,', 'BPA']), verbo([induced]), complemento([a, reduced, numeric, synaptic, density, and, a, negative, effect, on, the, structural, parameters, of, synaptic, 'interface,', including, an, enlarged, synaptic, cleft, and, the, reduced, length, of, active, zone, and, 'PSD', 'thickness,', in, the, hippocampus, of, the, male, mice])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'long-term', exposure, to, low, levels, of, 'BPA', in, adulthood, 'sex-specifically', impaired, spatial, and, passive, avoidance, memory, of, mice])].
[sujeto(['These', effects, may, be]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, higher, susceptibility, of, the, hippocampal, synaptic, plasticity, 'processes,', such, as, remodeling, of, spinal, synapses, and, the, expressions, of, synaptic, proteins, '(', e])].
[sujeto(['Increasing', evidence]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, 'kalirin,', a, 'Rho-guanine', nucleotide, exchange, 'factor,', modulates, 'PSD-95-NR2B-dependent', neuroplasticity])].
[sujeto(['Our', laboratory, recently, demonstrated, that, 'serum-inducible', and, 'glucocorticoid-inducible', kinase, 1, '(', 'SGK1)']), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, 'inflammation-associated', pain, hypersensitivity, by, modulating, spinal, glutamatergic, neurotransmission])].
[sujeto(['Because', kalirin, is, one, of, the, proteins, in, 'PSD', that, is, highly]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento([by, various, 'kinases,', we, tested, whether, kalirin, could, be, a, downstream, target, of, spinal, 'SGK1', that, participates, in, neuropathic, pain, development, via, regulation, of, the, 'PSD-95-NR2B', 'coupling-dependent', phosphorylation, of, 'NR2B'])].
[sujeto(['We', observed, that, spinal, nerve, ligation, '(', 'SNL,', 'L5)', in, male, 'Sprague', 'Dawley', rats, resulted, in, behavioral, 'allodynia,', which, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, phosphorylated, 'SGK1', '(', 'pSGK1),', 'kalirin,', and, phosphorylated, 'NR2B', '(', 'pNR2B)', expression, and, an, increase, in, 'pSGK1-kalirin-PSD-95-pNR2B', coprecipitation, in, the, ipsilateral, dorsal, horn, '(', 'L4-L5)'])].
[sujeto(['Small-interfering', 'RNA', '(', 'siRNA)', that]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([spinal, kalirin, mRNA, expression, '(', 10, 'μg,', 10, 'μl;', i])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, nerve, injury, could, induce, spinal, 'SGK1', phosphorylation, that, subsequently, interacts, with, and, upregulates, kalirin, to, participate, in, neuropathic, pain, development, via, 'PSD-95-NR2B', 'coupling-dependent', 'NR2B', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Long-term', potentiation, '(', 'LTP)', of, synaptic, transmission, in, the, 'CA1', region, of, the, hippocampus, depends, on, the, activation, of, 'N-methyl-D-aspartate', receptors, '(', 'NMDARs),', which, can, be]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'Ca²⁺-dependent', release, of, 'D-serine', from, astrocytes])].
[sujeto(['The', detailed, mechanism, underlying, astrocytic, 'd-serine']), verbo([release]), complemento([is, still, unknown])].
[sujeto(['In', hippocampal, slices, prepared, from, 'Sprague-Dawley', 'rats,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, clamping, astrocytic, '[', 'Ca²⁺]', at, 100, -, 150, nM, or, puffing, artificial, cerebrospinal, fluid, '(', 'ACSF)', into, the, extracellular, space, '(', weak, mechanical, 'stimulation)', enhanced, the, synaptic, activation, of, 'NMDARs'])].
[sujeto(['The', enhancement, was, blocked, by, the, 'NMDAR', glycine, site, antagonist, 5, ',', 7, -, dichlorokynurenic, 'acid,', glycine, 'saturation,', and, infusion, of, astrocytes, with, 'D-amino', acid, oxidase, and, the, serine, racemase, inhibitor, 'L-erythro-3-hydroxyaspartate,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([the, involvement, of, astrocytic, 'D-serine', release])].
[sujeto(['Intracellular', 100, -, 150, nM, '[', 'Ca²⁺]', or, puffing, 'ACSF']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([astrocytes, to, generate, 'D-serine-containing', large, vesicles, '(', 1, -, 3, 'μm),', exocytotic, fusion, of, which, released, 'D-serine'])].
[sujeto(['The', formation, of, astrocytic, large, vesicles]), verbo([involved]), complemento([the, intracellular, fusion, of, small, vesicles, 'and/or', other, organelles])].
[sujeto(['Spontaneous', fusion, of, large, vesicles, occurred, occasionally, in, astrocytes, at, 'rest,', contributing, to, baseline, 'D-serine', 'levels,', which]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, rising, slope, of, 'NMDAR', 'post-burst', potentiation, '(', 'PBP)', without, altering, the, 'PBP', peak, amplitude])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', under, physiological, 'conditions,', astrocytic, 'D-serine']), verbo([release]), complemento([by, large, vesicles, facilitated, weak, 'theta-burst', '(', 'TBS', consisting, of, five, 'bursts),', but, not, strong, 'TBS', '(', 'TBS', consisting, of, 10, 'bursts)', 'stimulation-induced', 'LTP'])].
[sujeto(['Several', lines, of, evidence]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, common, polygenic, variation, influences, brain, function, in, humans])].
[sujeto(['Genetic', markers, moderately]), verbo([associated]), complemento(['(', 'p&lt;10(-4))', with, whole, brain, activation, phenotypes, constructed, by, applying, principal, components, to, contrast, 'maps,', were, tested, for, pathway, enrichment, using, permutation, based, methods])].
[sujeto(['The', most, significant, pathways, are, related, to, post, 'NMDA', receptor, activation, 'events,', driven, by, genetic, variants, in, 'calcium/calmodulin-dependent', protein, kinase, 'II', '(', 'CAMK2G,', 'CAMK2D)', and, a, 'calcium-regulated', nucleotide, exchange, factor, '(', 'RASGRF2)', in, which, all, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, intracellular, 'calcium/calmodulin'])].
[sujeto([3, ×, 10, '(', -, 9, ')', ')', ',', a, region, primarily]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, semantic, processing, but, also, involved, in, processing, negative, emotions])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, pathway, analysis, of, 'GWAS', results, derived, from, principal, component, analysis, of, fMRI, data, is, a, promising, 'method,', to, our, 'knowledge,', not, previously, described])].
[sujeto(['Understanding', how, brief, synaptic, events, can]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, sustained, changes, in, synaptic, structure, and, strength, is, a, necessary, step, in, solving, the, rules, governing, learning, and, memory])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'ERK1/2', '(', extracellular, signal]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([protein, kinase, 1, /, 2, ')', plays, a, key, role, in, the, control, of, functional, and, structural, synaptic, plasticity])].
[sujeto(['One', of, the]), verbo([triggering]), complemento([events, that, activates, 'ERK1/2', cascade, is, an, 'NMDA', receptor, '(', 'NMDAR)-dependent', rise, in, free, intracellular, 'Ca(2+)', concentration])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, although, synaptic, activation, in, mouse, cultured, cortical, neurons]), verbo([induces]), complemento([intracellular, 'Ca(2+)', elevation, via, both, 'GluN2A', and, 'GluN2B-containing', 'NMDARs,', only, 'GluN2B-containing', 'NMDAR', activation, leads, to, a, 'long-lasting', 'ERK1/2', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'αCaMKII,', but, not, 'βCaMKII,', is, critically]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, this, 'GluN2B-dependent', activation, of, 'ERK1/2', 'signaling,', through, a, direct, interaction, between, 'GluN2B', and, αCaMKII])].

[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, roles, that, these, major, molecular, elements, have, in, learning, and, memory, may, operate, through, a, common, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Synaptic', 'plasticity,', the, cellular, basis, of, learning, and, 'memory,']), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, dynamic, trafficking, of, 'AMPA', receptors, '(', 'AMPARs)', into, and, out, of, synapses])].
[sujeto(['In', 'particular,', the, identity, of, 'AMPAR', scaffolding, 'molecule(s)']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, maintenance, of, 'GluA2-containing', 'AMPARs', is, completely, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, the, synaptic, scaffolding, molecule, '(', 'S-SCAM;', also, called, 'membrane-associated', guanylate, kinase, 'inverted-2', and, atrophin, interacting, 'protein-1)', plays, the, critical, role, of, maintaining, synaptic, strength])].
[sujeto(['Increasing', 'S-SCAM', levels, in, rat, hippocampal, neurons]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, specific, increases, in, the, surface, 'AMPAR', 'levels,', enhanced, 'AMPAR-mediated', synaptic, 'transmission,', and, enlargement, of, dendritic, 'spines,', without, significantly, effecting, 'GluN', levels, or, 'NMDA', receptor, '(', 'NMDAR)', 'EPSC'])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,']), verbo([decreasing]), complemento(['S-SCAM', levels, by, 'RNA', 'interference-mediated', knockdown, caused, the, loss, of, synaptic, 'AMPARs,', which, was, followed, by, a, severe, reduction, in, the, dendritic, spine, density])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', 'S-SCAM']), verbo([regulated]), complemento([synaptic, 'AMPAR', levels, in, a, 'manner,', dependent, on, 'GluA2', not, 'GluA1,', sensitive, to, 'N-ethylmaleimide-sensitive', fusion, protein, 'interaction,', and, independent, of, activity])].
[sujeto(['Further,', 'S-SCAM']), verbo([increased]), complemento([surface, 'AMPAR', levels, in, the, absence, of, 'PSD-95,', while, 'PSD-95', was, dependent, on, 'S-SCAM', to, increase, surface, 'AMPAR', levels])].

[sujeto(['The', expression, levels, of, its, 'NR1', subunit, are, altered, dramatically, by, morphine, but, no, changes, in, its, alternative, splicing]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported])].

[sujeto(['Chronic', arsenic, exposure]), verbo([has]), complemento([an, adverse, effect, on, neurobehavioral, function])].
[sujeto(['The', 'NMDA', receptor, and, the, postsynaptic, signaling, proteins, 'CaMKII,', postsynaptic, density, protein, 95, '(', 'PSD-95),', synaptic, 'Ras', 'GTPase-activating', protein, '(', 'SynGAP)', and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([activated, 'extracellular-signal', regulated, kinase, '(', 'ERK1/2)', play, important, roles, in, synaptic, 'plasticity,', learning, and, memory])].

[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, altered, expression, of, 'NMDA', receptor, complex, and, postsynaptic, signaling, proteins, may, explain, 'arsenic-induced', neurotoxicity])].

[sujeto(['Results']), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, one, poeciliid, 'fish,', the, 'Northern', 'swordtail,', exhibits, robust, mate, preference, as, compared, to, the, 'Western', 'mosquitofish,', which, utilizes, a, coercive, mating, system])].

[sujeto(['CALHM1', '(', calcium, homoeostasis, modulator, 1, ')', ',', a, membrane, protein, with, similarity, to, 'NMDA', '(', 'N-methyl-D-aspartate)', receptor, channels, that, localizes, in, the, plasma, membrane, and, the, 'ER', '(', endoplasmic, 'reticulum)', of, 'neurons,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, generate, a, 'plasma-membrane', 'Ca(2+)', conductance, and, has, been, proposed, to, influence, 'Alzheimer\'s', disease, risk])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, study, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, effects, of, 'CALHM1', on, intracellular, 'Ca(2+)', handling, in, 'HEK-293T', '[', 'HEK', '(', human, embryonic, 'kidney)-293', cells, expressing, the, large, 'T-antigen', of, 'SV40', '(', simian, virus, 40, ')', ']', cells, by, using, targeted, aequorins, for, selective, monitorization, of, 'Ca(2+)', transport, by, organelles])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'CALHM1', increases, 'Ca(2+)', leak, from, the, 'ER', 'and,', more, 'importantly,', reduces, 'ER', 'Ca(2+)', uptake, by, decreasing, both, the, transport, capacity, and, the, 'Ca(2+)', affinity, of, 'SERCA', '(', 'sarcoplasmic/endoplasmic', reticulum, 'Ca(2+)-ATPase)'])].
[sujeto(['This', reduction, in, the, 'Ca(2+)', content, of, the, 'ER']), verbo([triggered]), complemento([the, 'UPR', '(', unfolded, protein, 'response)', with, induction, of, several, 'ER', stress, 'markers,', such, as, 'CHOP', '[', 'C/EBP', '(', 'CCAAT/enhancer-binding', 'protein)-homologous', 'protein],', 'ERdj4,', 'GRP78', '(', 'glucose-regulated', protein, of, 78, 'kDa)', and, 'XBP1', '(', 'X-box-binding', protein, 1, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Thus', 'CALHM1', might]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, relevant, link, between, 'Ca(2+)', homoeostasis, 'disruption,', 'ER', stress, and, cell, damage, in, the, pathogenesis, of, neurodegenerative, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Synapse-associated', protein, 102, '(', 'SAP102)', is, a, 'MAGUK', that, is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([early, in, development, and, mediates, receptor, trafficking, during, synaptogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', in, human, 'SAP102']), verbo([cause]), complemento([mental, 'retardation,', which, is, often, accompanied, with, abnormalities, in, dendritic, spines])].
[sujeto(['However,', little, is, known, about, the, role, of, 'SAP102', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([synapse, formation, or, spine, morphology])].
[sujeto(['We', now]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'SAP102', contains, a, novel, 'NMDA', receptor, binding, site, in, the, 'N-terminal', 'domain,', which, is, specific, for, the, 'NR2B', subunit])].
[sujeto(['The', interaction, between, 'SAP102', and, 'NR2B', is, 'PDZ', '(', postsynaptic, 'density-95/Discs', 'large/zona', 'occludens-1)', domain, independent, and, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, alternative, splicing, of, 'SAP102'])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'SAP102', that, possesses, an, 'N-terminal', insert, is, developmentally]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([at, both, mRNA, and, protein, levels])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', expression, of, 'SAP102']), verbo([increases]), complemento([synapse, formation])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, alternative, splicing, of, 'SAP102']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([dendritic, spine, morphology])].
[sujeto(['SAP102', containing, the, 'N-terminal', insert]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([lengthening, of, dendritic, spines, and, preferentially, promotes, the, formation, of, synapses, at, long, 'spines,', whereas, a, short, hairpin, 'RNA', knockdown, of, the, same, 'SAP102', splice, variant, causes, spine, shrinkage])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', blocking, 'NMDA', receptor, activity]), verbo([prevents]), complemento([the, spine, lengthening, induced, by, the, 'N-terminal', splice, variant, of, 'SAP102'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', our, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, first, evidence, that, 'SAP102', links, 'NMDA', receptor, activation, to, alterations, in, spine, morphology])].
[sujeto(['Membrane', receptors, transduce, external, signals, into, cellular, responses, by]), verbo([activating]), complemento([cytosolic, metabolic, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Regulation', of, the, spatial, and, temporal, distribution, of, membrane, receptors, begins, to, be]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([as, an, important, mechanism, for, controlling, the, magnitude, and, time, course, of, cellular, signaling, '[', 1, ']'])].
[sujeto(['Similarly,', 'short-term', changes, in, synaptic, function, can, be, achieved, by, altering, the, levels, of, key, surface, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, synaptic, 'transmission,', such, as, neurotransmitter, receptors, and, transporters, '[', 1, ']'])].
[sujeto(['These', processes]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, complexity, of, the, signaling, mechanisms, in, peripheral, and, central, synapses])].
[sujeto(['Protein', trafficking, 'studies,', carried, out, in, yeast, and, mammalian, 'cells,']), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, the, underlying, mechanism, by, which, proteins, travel, between, intracellular, compartments, and, the, plasma, membrane])].
[sujeto(['Membrane', proteins, are]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([in, the, endoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'ER),', and, ensuing, posttranslational, modifications, such, as, glycosylation, take, place, in, both, the, 'ER', and, the, 'Golgi', apparatus])].
[sujeto(['Appropriately', folded, and, assembled, membrane, proteins, are, subsequently, sorted, out, into, vesicles, for, trafficking, and, delivery, to, the, cell, surface, by, a, constitutive, or]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([pathway, of, vesicle, exocytosis, '[', 4, ']'])].
[sujeto(['The', constitutive, exocytotic, route, is, primarily, used, by, cells, for, turnover, of, both, membrane, proteins, and, 'lipids,', thus]), verbo([ensuring]), complemento([the, removal, of, aged, or, damaged, membrane, components])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([secretory, pathway, is, used, by, specialized, 'cells,', such, as, endocrine, 'cells,', 'neurons,', acinar, cells, of, the, 'pancreas,', mast, 'cells,', 'insulin-sensitive', 'cells,', and, many, other, cell, 'types,', as, a, mechanism, of, cellular, communication])].
[sujeto(['Regulated', exocytosis, is, produced, only, in, response, to, a, stimulus, that]), verbo([provokes]), complemento([the, 'mobilization,', 'docking,', and, fusion, of, an, intracellular, pool, of, vesicles, stored, near, the, membrane, region, where, they, will, fuse, and, release, their, components, '[', 1, '–', 5, ']'])].
[sujeto(['Mechanistically,', both, types, of, exocytosis, use, a, cascade, of, 'protein–protein', interactions, to]), verbo([ensure]), complemento([the, efficient, delivery, of, their, vesicle, cargo, to, the, membrane, '[', 2, ',', 5, ']'])].
[sujeto(['At', a, molecular, 'level,', vesicle, traffic, uses, the, 'SNAREs', '(', soluble, 'N-ethylmaleimide-sensitive', factor, attachment, protein, 'receptors),', a, large, family, of, proteins, that, are, present, on, all, organelles, and]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([intracellular, vesicle, trafficking, and, secretion, '(', 'Figure', 23.1, ')', '[', 2, ',', 5, ']'])].
[sujeto(['The', interaction, of, complementary, 'SNARE', proteins]), verbo([found]), complemento([on, opposing, membranes, exemplifies, an, attractive, 'lock-and-key', 'mechanism,', which, presumably, underlies, the, remarkable, specificity, of, vesicle, docking, to, target, membranes, and, their, consequent, fusion, '[', 5, ']'])].
[sujeto(['For', 'instance,', the, interaction, of, the, vesicle, membrane, 'SNARE', '(', 'v-SNARE)', synaptobrevin, 2, ',', and, the, corresponding, 'SNAREs', in, the]), verbo([target]), complemento([membrane, '(', 't-SNAREs),', syntaxin, 1, and, 'SNAP25,', results, in, the, formation, of, a, remarkably, stable, ternary, complex, that, ensures, the, docking, and, fusion, of, vesicles, at, the, active, zone, upon, receiving, the, 'stimulus,', normally, an, increase, in, the, intracellular, concentration, of, 'Ca2+', '(', '[', 'Ca', '[', 2, ']', ']', 'i)'])].
[sujeto([+, 5, 'Similarly,', molecular, interactions, of, synaptobrevin, 2, analogues, with, syntaxin, 1, and, 'SNAP25-like']), verbo([target]), complemento([membrane, proteins, are, thought, to, be, essential, for, vesicle, targeting, and, fusion, in, all, eukaryotes, '[', 2, ']'])].
[sujeto(['It', is, quite, well, established, that, a, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, '[', 'Ca2+]i', is, required, for, triggering, the, 'SNARE-mediated', fusion, of, secretory, 'vesicles,', although, 'SNARE-dependent', exocytosis, of, 'vesicles,', in, particular, recycling, 'vesicles,', may, occur, at, resting, '[', 'Ca2+]i', by, the, activation, of, other, signaling, pathways, '[', 2, ']'])].
[sujeto(['Nonetheless,', the, rate, of, vesicle, recycling, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, changes, in, the, '[', 'Ca2+]i', 'Vesicle', exocytosis, is, a, highly, regulated, process, counterbalanced, by, endocytosis, of, membrane, components, that, ensures, constant, plasma, membrane, content])].
[sujeto(['Internalization', of, receptors, and, transporters, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, a, general, 'clathrin-dependent', pathway, that, moves, endocytosed, proteins, to, the, endosome, for, appropriate, sorting, into, 'vesicles,', either, for, release, or, for, transport, depending, on, their, final, destination, '[', 3, ',', 4, ']'])].
[sujeto(['The', endosome, also]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, mechanism, to, maintain, the, proper, composition, of, release, vesicle, proteins, by, adding, newly, synthesized, vesicle, 'proteins,', removing, aged, polypeptides, for, 'degradation,', and, separating, nonsecretory, vesicle, proteins, '[', 3, ']'])].
[sujeto(['Recent', evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, synaptic, vesicles, are, most, likely, formed, at, the, nerve, terminal, by, endocytosis])].
[sujeto(['This', novel, notion, considers, that, newly]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([membrane, proteins, traffic, to, the, nerve, terminal, in, transport, packets, and, become, incorporated, into, synaptic, vesicles, at, the, 'synapse,', thus, indicating, that, synaptic, vesicle, formation, relies, primarily, on, an, endocytotic, pathway, '[', 3, ',', 4, ']'])].
[sujeto(['Traditionally,', the, constitutive, exocytotic, pathway]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, to, the, traffic, of, membrane, proteins, to, the, cell, 'surface,', while, the, regulated, secretory, pathway, has, been, implicated, in, the, 'activity-dependent', release, of, 'neurotransmitters,', 'neuropeptides,', and, hormones])].
[sujeto(['However,', in, the, past, decade, emerged, the, notion, that, the, surface, expression, of, membrane, 'proteins,', especially, ion, 'channels,', 'receptors,', and, 'transporters,', may, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, a, regulated, release, pathway, as, well, '[', 2, '–', 4, ']'])].
[sujeto(['Indeed,', cumulative, evidence, indicates, that, the, function, of, these, plasma, membrane, proteins, can, be]), verbo([increased]), complemento([or, decreased, by, accommodating, the, level, of, the, 'surface-expressed', protein])].
[sujeto(['Examples', of, receptors, and, transporters, that, are]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, vesicle, trafficking, are, the, glucose, transporter, '(', 'GluT4)', '[', 6, ']', ',', 'Aquaporin', 2, '(', 'AQP2)', '[', 7, ']', ',', epithelial, sodium, channel, '(', 'ENac)', '[', 8, ']', ',', cystic, fibrosis, transmembrane, conductance, regulator, '(', 'CFTR)', '[', 8, ']', ',', as, well, as, ionotropic, 'ligand-gated', receptors, such, as, -, 'amino-3-hydroxy-5-methylisoxazole-4-propionate', '(', 'AMPA),', 'N-methyl-D-aspartate', '(', 'NMDA),', 'gamma-aminobutyrate', '(', 'GABAA),', and, the, purinergic, receptor, 'P2X4', '[', 9, ']'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', several, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, this, signaling, pathway, is, also, commonly, used, by, members, of, the, transient, receptor, potential, '(', 'TRP)', family, of, ion, channels, for, modulation, of, their, physiological, function, '[', 10, ']'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'CB(1)', receptor, agonist, 'ACEA,', neurokinin, 1, '(', 'NK(1))', receptor, antagonists, and, 'NMDA', receptor, 'antagonists,']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([i])].
[sujeto(['The', selective, iNOS, 'inhibitor,', 1400, 'W,', in, relatively, large, 'doses,']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([in, a, non, 'dose-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'nNOS-ERK', pathway, in, spinal, cord, neurones, plays, an, important, role, in, 'AM251-induced', nocifensive, behavior, and, its, inhibition, may, provide, significant, 'anti-nociception'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'ST2825', at, doses, of, 5, μg, and, 10, μg, significantly, inhibited, the, 'pilocarpine-induced', behavioral, and, electrographic, seizures])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 10, μg, 'ST2825']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, proconvulsant, actions, of, 'IL-1β'])].

[sujeto(['Sub-anesthetic', doses, of, ketamine]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, found, to, provide, rapid, antidepressant, 'actions,', indicating, that, the, cellular, signaling, systems, targeted, by, ketamine, are, potential, sites, for, therapeutic, intervention])].

[sujeto(['Importantly,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, pathological, role, in, 'Alzheimer', disease, '(', 'AD)', as, it, generates, the, neurotoxic, amyloid, 'β-peptide', from, the, amyloid, precursor, protein, '(', 'APP)'])].

[sujeto(['N-Methyl-d-aspartate', receptors, '(', 'NMDARs)', are, major]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, both, acute, and, chronic, 'alcohol,', as, well, as, regulators, of, plasticity, in, a, number, of, brain, regions])].

[sujeto(['Excessive', 'N-methyl-D-aspartate', receptor, '(', 'NMDAR)', activation, and, the, resulting, activation, of, neuronal, nitric, oxide, synthase, '(', 'nNOS)']), verbo([cause]), complemento([neuronal, injury])].

[sujeto(['So', 'far,', the, molecular, analysis, of, synapses, during, learning]), verbo([has]), complemento([focused, on, small, groups, of, 'proteins,', whereas, the, dynamic, global, changes, at, these, synapses, have, remained, unknown])].
[sujeto(['However,', 423, proteins, were, significantly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([4, h, later, of, which, 164, proteins, showed, a, temporal, regulation, after, a, delayed, shock, and, 273, proteins, after, the, stress, of, an, immediate, shock])].
[sujeto(['From', the, proteins, that, were, differentially]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([between, the, 'delayed-', and, the, 'immediate-shock', groups, at, 4, 'h,', 48, 'proteins,', most, prominently, representing, 'endocytosis,', '(', 'amphiphysin,', 'dynamin,', and, 'synaptojanin1),', glutamate, signaling, '(', glutamate, '[', 'NMDA]', receptor, subunit, 'epsilon-1,', disks, large, homolog, 3, ')', ',', and, neurotransmitter, metabolism, '(', excitatory, amino, acid, transporter, 1, ',', excitatory, amino, acid, transporter, 2, ',', 'sodium-', and, 'chloride-dependent', 'GABA', transporter, 3, ')', were, regulated, in, both, 'protocols,', but, in, opposite, 'directions,', pointing, toward, an, interaction, of, learning, and, stress])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, synaptic, activity, results, in, a, 'rapid,', but, 'transient,', increase, in, eEF2K, activity, that, is, regulated, by, a, combination, of, 'AMPA', and, 'NMDA-type', glutamate, receptors, and, the, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MEK)/extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'ERK)', and, mammalian, target, of, rapamycin, complex, 1, '(', 'mTORC1)', pathways])].

[sujeto(['Recent', 'large-scale', genomic, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, two, broad, classes, of, risk, alleles, for, 'schizophrenia:', a, polygenic, component, of, risk, mediated, through, multiple, common, risk, variants, and, rarer, more, highly, penetrant, submicroscopic, chromosomal, deletions, and, 'duplications,', known, as, copy, number, variants])].

[sujeto(['We', previously, cloned, an, isoform, of, 'ERRalpha1', cDNA, and, demonstrated, that, 'ERRalpha1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, human, lactoferrin, gene, promoter, and, enhances, estrogen, responsiveness, during, transient, transfection, experiments])].

[sujeto(['This', chimera]), verbo([activated]), complemento([reporter, constructs, containing, the, human, lactoferrin, gene, estrogen, response, element, '(', 'ERE)', and, the, synthetic, palindromic, 3, 'X-ERE,', suggesting, that, 'ERRalpha1', binds, to, these, 'EREs'])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', 'ERRalpha1', can, compete, with, 'ERalpha', for]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, same, 'EREs'])].

[sujeto(['The', activation, function, of, 'ERRalpha1', was, mapped, to, the]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['AF2', region, in, the, 'C-terminus', by, deletion, analysis])].
[sujeto(['The', transactivation, activity, of, 'ERRalpha1', can, be]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, coactivator, '(', 'SRC-1a)', and, suppressed, by, 'ERalpha', in, the, presence, of, 'estrogen,', suggesting, that, 'SRC-1a', is, required, by, both, receptors, for, their, activity])].
[sujeto(['The', repression, of, 'ERRalpha1', activation, function, by, estrogen]), verbo([bound]), complemento(['ERalpha,', 'however,', could, not, be, reversed, by, increasing, concentration, of, 'SRC-1a', in, the, cells])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([finding]), complemento([is, consistent, with, the, squelching, phenomenon, that, exists, between, 'ERalpha', and, other, steroid, receptor, family, members])].
[sujeto(['The', studies, demonstrated, that, 'ERRalpha1', and, 'ERalpha', may, potentially]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, same, target, gene, independently, as, well, as, interfere, with, each, 'other\'s', functional, activity, by, competition, for, binding, and, coactivator])].
[sujeto(['Although', it, is, coded, by, a, single, 'gene,', it, is, usually]), verbo([found]), complemento([as, a, mixture, of, three, isoforms, which, vary, with, regard, to, the, length, of, their, 'N-terminal', cytoplasmic, tail])].
[sujeto(['We', show, here, that, although, the, cytoplasmic, tail, seems, to, play, no, role, in, the, dimerization, of, 'PBP1b,', as, was, originally, 'suspected,', only, the, 'full-length', protein, is, able, to, protect, the, cells, against, lysis, when, both, 'PBP1a', and, 'PBP3', are]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, antibiotics])].

[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, the, 'C-terminal', region, of, p160, coactivators, glucocorticoid, receptor, interacting, protein, 1, '(', 'GRIP1),', steroid, receptor, coactivator, 1, '(', 'SRC-1a),', and, 'SRC-1e', binds, the, 'N-terminal', 'AF-1', activation, function, of, the, androgen, receptor, '(', 'AR),', and, p160, coactivators, can, thereby, enhance, transcriptional, activation, by, 'AR'])].

[sujeto(['A', new, class, of, antifungal, agents]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, discovered, which, exert, their, activity, by, blockade, of, 'myristoylCoA:', protein, 'N-myristoyltransferase', '(', 'NMT;', 'EC', 2.1])].

[sujeto(['The', estrogen, receptor, '(', 'ER)', is, a, member, of, a, large, superfamily, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, that, regulates, the, transcription, of, 'estrogen-responsive', genes])].

[sujeto(['We', performed, quantitative, 'Nt-acetylome', analyses, on, a, control, yeast, strain, '(', 'yNatA),', a, yeast, 'NatA', deletion, strain, '(', 'yNatA-Δ),', a, yeast, 'NatA', deletion, strain]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['wild-type', human, 'NatA', '(', 'hNatA),', and, a, yeast, 'NatA', deletion, strain, expressing, mutant, human, 'NatA', '(', hNatA, 'S37P)'])].

[sujeto(['Comparative', analysis, between, human, and, yeast, 'NatA', also]), verbo([provided]), complemento([new, insights, into, the, 'co-evolution', of, the, 'NatA', complexes, and, their, substrates])].

[sujeto(['The', 'SrtA-mediated', ligation, reaction, is, 'reversible,', so, most, labeling, protocols, that, use, this, enzyme]), verbo([require]), complemento([a, large, excess, of, both, substrate, and, sortase, to, produce, high, yields, of, ligation, product])].

[sujeto(['In', 'particular,', 'G(q)-coupled', receptors, such, as, muscarinic, 'M(1)', receptors, '(', 'M(1)R)', and, 5, -, hydroxytryptamine, '(', 5, -, 'HT)', type, 2, 'A', receptors]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, be, targets, for, anesthetics])].
