[sujeto(['Although', 'ACh', did, not]), verbo([induce]), complemento([any, currents, in, oocytes, expressing, 'M(2)R', 'alone,', it, caused, robust, 'Cl(-)', currents, in, oocytes, coexpressing, 'M(2)R', with, 'G', 'alpha(qi5)'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'EC(50)', of, the, 'ACh-induced', 'Cl(-)', current]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, 'G', 'alpha(qi5)', was, 0.2, 'micromol/l,', which, was, 2.2, times, higher, than, that, of, the, 'ACh-induced', 'G', 'protein-activated', inwardly, rectifying, 'K(+)', currents, activated, by, 'G', beta, gamma, subunits, liberated, from, endogenously, expressed, 'G', 'alpha(i)', in, 'Xenopus', oocytes])].
[sujeto(['Other', 'G(i)-coupled', somatostatin, type, 2, ',', 5, -, 'HT(1A)', and, 'delta-opioid', 'receptors,', when, coexpressed, with, 'G', 'alpha(qi5)', in, 'oocytes,', also]), verbo([caused]), complemento([robust, 'Ca(2+)-activated', 'Cl(-)', currents])].
[sujeto(['In', oocytes, coexpressing, 'M(2)R', and, 'G', 'alpha(qi5),', a, volatile, anesthetic, halothane]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['M(2)R-induced', 'Cl(-)', currents, in, a, 'concentration-dependent', manner, with, the, 'IC(50)', of, 1.1, 'mmol/l,', suggesting, that, halothane, inhibits, 'M(2)R-induced', cellular, responses, at, clinically, relevant, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', with, the, protein, kinase, 'C', inhibitor, 'GF109203X', produced, a, 3.5, -, fold, enhancement, of, the, initial, 'Cl(-)', currents]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 1, 'micromol/l', 'ACh', in, oocytes, expressing, 'M(2)R', and, 'G(qi5)'])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, halothane, inhibits, the, 'M(2)R-induced', signaling, by, acting, at, sites, other, than, 'PKC', activity])].
[sujeto(['Collectively', these, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, use, of, oocyte, expressing, 'G', 'alpha(qi5)', would, be, helpful, to, examine, the, effects, of, anesthetics, or, analgesics, on, the, function, of, 'G(i)-coupled', receptors, in, the, 'Xenopus', oocyte, expression, system])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, tachykinins, mediate, slow, synaptic, transmission, to, myenteric, 'AH', '(', 'afterhyperpolarising)', neurons, via, 'neurokinin-3', receptors, '(', 'NK(3)R)'])].
[sujeto(['SR142801,', a, selective, 'NK(3)R', antagonist, '(', 100, 'nM),']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([slow, 'EPSPs', and, responses, to, 'senktide,', but, had, no, effect, on, depolarisations, evoked, by, 'forskolin,', an, activator, of, adenylate, cyclase])].
[sujeto(['SR140333,', a, selective, 'NK(1)R', 'antagonist,']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([slow, 'EPSPs', in, a, subset, of, neurons, and, blocked, responses, to, '[', 'Sar(9),Met(O(2))(11)]-substance', 'P,', but, not, to, senktide, or, forskolin])].
[sujeto(['Slow', 'EPSPs', that, were, predominantly]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'NK(1)R', had, significantly, shorter, latencies, than, those, due, to, activation, of, 'NK(3)R'])].
[sujeto(['These', 'events,', which, were]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, a, decrease, in, input, resistance, and, blocked, by, 'tetrodotoxin,', were, equated, with, slow, inhibitory, postsynaptic, potentials])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', these, results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, first, direct, evidence, that, 'NK(1)R', mediate, some, slow, excitatory, synaptic, input, to, myenteric, 'AH', 'neurons,', and, suggest, that, 'NK(1)R', and, 'NK(3)R', activate, distinct, signal, transduction, pathways])].
[sujeto(['These', results, also, demonstrate, that, slow, inhibitory, synaptic, 'transmission,', which, may, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 5, -, 'hydroxytryptamine,', is, more, prevalent, in, the, myenteric, plexus, than, previously, indicated])].
[sujeto(['Future', demographic, developments, will, challenge, urology, with, a, steadily]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([incidence, of, lower, urinary, tract, symptoms, '(', 'LUTS)', derived, from, the, aging, bladder])].
[sujeto(['Obstruction,', instability, and, 'hypocontractility,', which, may, be]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, changes, in, the, receptor, profile, of, the, 'detrusor,', are, typical, pathophysiologic, findings, in, geriatric, bladder, dysfunction])].
[sujeto(['Muscarinic', '(', 'M(2),', 'M(3)),', purinergic, '(', 'P2X,', 'P2Y)', and, adrenergic, receptors, '(', 'alpha(1),', 'beta(3))', are]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, efferent, sympathetic, and, parasympathetic, bladder, innervation])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, results, from, animal, experiments, are, somewhat, 'inconsistent,', aging, and, bladder, outlet, obstruction, '(', 'BOO)', probably]), verbo([cause]), complemento([partial, cholinergic, denervation, of, the, detrusor, with, a, subsequent, upregulation, of, muscarinic, receptor, sensitivity, leading, to, bladder, instability])].

[sujeto(['Pharmacogenetics,', the, inherited, basis, for, interindividual, differences, in, drug, 'response,']), verbo([has]), complemento([rapidly, expanded, with, the, advent, of, new, molecular, tools, and, the, sequencing, of, the, human, 'genome,', yielding, pharmacogenomics])].
[sujeto(['The', receptor, subtypes, that]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([these, 'responses,', 'M(1-3)', muscarinic, cholinergic, receptors, '(', 'mAChRs),', and, 'alpha(1A,B,D)-,', 'alpha(2A,B,C)-,', and, 'beta(1,2,3)-adrenergic', receptors, '(', 'AR),', show, highly, variable, expression, of, genetic, 'variants;', variants, of, mAChRs, and, 'alpha(1)-ARs', are, relatively, 'rare,', whereas, 'alpha(2)-AR', and, 'beta-AR', subtype, variants, are, quite, common])].
[sujeto(['The', largest, amount, of, data, is, available, regarding, variants, of, the, latter, 'ARs', and, represents, efforts, to]), verbo([associate]), complemento([certain, receptor, 'genotypes,', most, 'commonly,', single, nucleotide, 'polymorphisms,', with, particular, phenotypes, '(', e])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro, and, in, vivo, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([yielded, inconsistent, 'results;', definitive, conclusions, are, limited])].

[sujeto(['Clozapine', '(', 'CLZ),', an, atypical, antipsychotic, drug, '(', 'APD),', produces, minimal, extrapyramidal, side, effects, '(', 'EPS)', and]), verbo([has]), complemento([significant, advantages, for, treating, both, positive, and, negative, symptoms, in, schizophrenic, patients])].
[sujeto(['CLZ']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, established, as, a, discriminative, cue, in, the, drug, discrimination, paradigm, and, in, generalization, tests, the, 'CLZ', cue, is, more, selective, for, 'atypical,', rather, than, 'typical,', 'APDs'])].
[sujeto(['However,', greater, selectivity, for, atypical, antipsychotics]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, with, a, lower, '(', 1.25, 'mg/kg)', 'CLZ', training, dose, in, rats, '[', 'Psychopharmacology,', 149, '(', 2000, ')', 189, ']', ',', rather, than, the, 'traditional,', higher, training, dose, '(', 5.0, 'mg/kg)'])].
[sujeto(['It', is, therefore, of, interest, to, evaluate, the, properties]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([the, 1.25, 'mg/kg', 'CLZ', discriminative, cue])].

[sujeto(['Drug', discrimination, studies, with, clozapine]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, such, assays, are, of, value, in, analysing, the, actions, of, novel, antipsychotic, agents, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Together', with, data, from, a, previous, study, '(', 'Smith', and, 'Goudie', 2002, ')', in, which, we, observed, full, generalization, to, quetiapine, with, 'olanzapine,', risperidone, and, 'clozapine,', but, not, with, typical, antipsychotics, '(', such, as, 'haloperidol)', or, the, novel, antipsychotic, 'amisulpride,', these, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['that:', 'i)', the, discriminative, stimulus, properties, of, 'quetiapine,', like, those, of, 'clozapine,', probably, reflect, a, '"', 'compound"', stimulus, which, involves, several, classes, of, 'receptor;', 'ii)', the, quetiapine, cue, is, of, value, in, 'analysing,', and, screening, 'for,', 'quetiapine-', and, 'clozapine-like', agents, in, 'vivo;', 'iii)', blockade, of, muscarinic, receptors, is, 'sufficient,', although, not, 'necessary,', to, achieve, full, generalization, to, 'quetiapine;', and, 'iv)', 'alpha(1-)adrenoceptors', may, be, implicated, in, the, quetiapine, discriminative, stimulus])].

[sujeto(['In', aged, transgenic, mice, 'GABA(A),', 'NMDA,', 'AMPA,', 'kainate,', and, 'beta-adrenergic', as, well, 5, -, 'HT(1A)-', and, 5, -, 'HT(2A)-receptor']), verbo([binding]), complemento([levels, were, hardly, 'affected,', whereas, 'alpha(1)-', and, 'alpha(2)-adrenoceptor', binding, was, increased, in, selected, cerebral, cortical, regions, as, compared, to, 'non-transgenic', littermates])].

[sujeto(['The', present, study, examined, the, ability, of, two, selective, 5, -, 'HT(1A)', receptor, antagonists, 'WAY', 100635, and, 'NAD-299', '(', 'robalzotan)', and, two, acetylcholinesterase, '(', 'AChE)', inhibitors, tacrine, and, donepezil, to, attenuate, the, impairment, of, 'PA', retention]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, the, nonselective, muscarinic, receptor, antagonist, scopolamine, in, the, rat])].

[sujeto(['Several', 'behavioural,', 'neurochemical,', and, structural, alterations]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 'isolation-reared', rats, are, similar, to, those, in, human, schizophrenia])].

[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, possible, change, in, reuptake, following, isolation])].

[sujeto(['The', selective, 5, -, 'HT(1B)', antagonist, 'CP-294253', '(', 1, 'microM),']), verbo([increased]), complemento([endogenous, 5, -, 'HT', release, from, hippocampal, slices, in, vitro, and, this, effect, was, greater, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')', in, group, compared, to, 'isolation-reared', rats])].
[sujeto(['Carbachol', '(', 1, 'microM)']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, firing, rate, of, all, neurones, recorded, but, only, a, proportion, of, these, showed, a, 'concentration-related', increase])].

[sujeto(['Isolation', rearing, in, the, rat, results, in, hippocampal, 'dysfunction,', including, reduced, serotonergic, and]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([muscarinic, activity, of, some, neurones])].

[sujeto(['These', findings, indicate, that, 'CMG', cells]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['alpha(1A),', 'alpha(1B),', and, 'alpha(1D)', receptors, before, differentiation, and, expressed, 'beta(1),', 'beta(2),', 'M(1),', and, 'M(2)', receptors, after, they, obtained, the, cardiomyocyte, phenotype])].
[sujeto(['These', receptors, had, functional, signal, transduction, pathways, and, could]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([cell, function])].

[sujeto(['Repinotan', 'HCl', treatment, markedly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([spontaneous, activities, in, the, small, 'open-field', at, any, 'time-point', investigated])].

[sujeto(['The', effect, of, metabotropic, glutamate, receptor, agonists, and, antagonists, on, 'KCl', '(', 20, 'mm)-induced', endogenous, acetylcholine]), verbo([release]), complemento([from, rat, striatal, synaptosomes, was, investigated])].

[sujeto(['Immunoreactivity', for, 'VIP,', 'TH,', and, 'DBH', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([adjacent, to, mouse, and, human, goblet, cells])].

[sujeto(['beta(3)-Adrenergic', receptors, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([on, both, epithelial, and, goblet, cells, in, human, conjunctiva, but, not, on, mouse, conjunctival, cells])].
[sujeto(['The', adrenergic, receptors, 'beta(1)', and, 'beta(2,)', but, not, 'alpha(1A)', and, 'beta(3)', are, present, on, mouse, conjunctival, goblet, 'cells,', whereas, 'alpha(1A)', and, 'beta(3,)', but, not, 'beta(1)', and, 'beta(2)', are, present, on, human, conjunctival, goblet, 'cells,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, these, nerves, and, receptors, could, activate, goblet, cell, secretion, in, mouse, and, humans])].
[sujeto(['The', molecules, were, tested, for, their, antinociceptive, activity, '(', formalin, licking, and, acetic, acid, writhing, 'tests)', and, for, their, ability, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([tremor, in, mice])].
[sujeto(['All', of, the, acetylenic, compounds]), verbo([acted]), complemento([as, muscarinic, analgesics, displaying, the, same, order, of, potency, shown, in, in, vitro, studies])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, such, a, derivative, could, be, a, candidate, for, further, development, of, selective, muscarinic, analgesics])].
[sujeto(['The', 'design,', 'synthesis,', and, evaluation, of, 3, 'alpha-(diphenylmethoxy)tropane', '(', 'benztropine)', analogues]), verbo([have]), complemento([provided, potent, and, selective, probes, for, the, dopamine, transporter])].
[sujeto(['Structure-activity', relationships, '(', 'SARs)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, developed, that, contrast, with, those, described, for, 'cocaine,', despite, significant, structural, similarity])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', behavioral, evaluation, of, many, of, the, benztropine, analogues, in, animal, models, of, cocaine, abuse]), verbo([has]), complemento([suggested, that, these, two, classes, of, 'tropane-based', dopamine, uptake, inhibitors, have, distinct, pharmacological, profiles])].

[sujeto(['Blocking', open, ion, channels]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, promising, way, to, modulate, synaptic, transmission])].
[sujeto(['Using', the, 'muscle-type', acetylcholine, receptor, '(', 'AChR)', as, a, test, 'system,', we, seek, to, develop, blockers, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([blockade, kinetics, tunable, via, structural, modifications])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, investigate, whether, the, blockade, kinetics, can, be]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, specifying, the, length, of, a, 'poly(ethylene', 'glycol)', '(', 'PEG)', spacer, incorporated, into, the, blocker])].

[sujeto(['The', blockade, kinetics, are]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, depend, on, spacer, 'length:', both, the, association, and, dissociation, rate, constants, decrease, with, increasing, spacer, length])].

[sujeto(['The', developmental, neurotoxicity, of, organophosphates, such, as, chlorpyrifos, '(', 'CPF)']), verbo([involves]), complemento([multiple, mechanisms, that, ultimately, compromise, the, function, of, specific, neurotransmitter, 'systems,', notably, acetylcholine, '(', 'ACh)', and, serotonin, '(', 5, -, 'hydroxytryptamine,', 5, 'HT)'])].

[sujeto(['The', present, data, support, the, hypothesis, that, cholinergic, transmission, in, 'cortico-limbic', regions, can, be]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([via, blockade, of, postsynaptic, 5, -, 'HT(1A)', 'receptors,', which, may, underlie, the, proposed, cognitive, enhancing, properties, of, 'NAD-299', in, models, characterized, by, cholinergic, deficit])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([sex, differences, in, the, basal, levels, of, 'alpha(1)-AR', subtypes, '(', females, had, 2, -, 3, times, higher, density, of, receptors, than, 'males)', and, 'MR', '(', males, had, twice, the, density, found, in, 'females)'])].
[sujeto(['CRH', gene, disruption]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([all, three, studied, receptors, in, intact, mice, '(', to, 20, -, 50, '%', of, 'WT)', in, both, sexes, '(', except, 'beta(1)-AR', in, 'females)'])].
[sujeto(['Stress']), verbo([induced]), complemento([sexually, dimorphic, 'responses,', while, all, 'alpha(1)-AR', subtypes, decreased, in, females, '(', to, 30, '%', of, control, 'approximately),', only, 'alpha(1A)-AR', level, diminished, '(', about, 50, '%', ')', in, males])].

[sujeto(['MR']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, both, sexes, '(', approximately, to, 50, '%', ')'])].

[sujeto(['At', least, with, regard, to, promotion, and, progression, of, 'cancer,', oxysterols, actually, appear, as, typical, 'Janus', 'molecules,', by]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([early, inflammatory, reaction, against, cancer, expansion, and, apoptotic, death, of, cancer, 'cells,', but, on, the, other, hand, sustaining, a, complex, survival, signaling, pathway, that, eventually, turns, in, favor, of, the, neoplastic, process, itself])].
[sujeto(['The', 'pro-tumoral', and, 'anti-tumoral', properties, of, this, class, of, compounds, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, both, 'LXR-dependent', and, independent, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['They', are, the, natural, ligands, of, liver, 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs)', and, are, generally]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([as, hypocholesterolemic, and, 'anti-inflammatory', molecules, although, this, latter, property, is, still, controversial])].
[sujeto(['Most', oxysterol, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, performed, in, 'macrophages,', whereas, the, effects, of, oxysterols, in, neutrophils, are, poorly, known])].
[sujeto(['An']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'ROS', production, was, observed, within, a, short, period, of, time, '(', 'minutes)', with, both, molecules])].
[sujeto(['These', oxysterols, also]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([the, cellular, membrane, translocation, of, the, 'NADPH', oxidase, cytosolic, 'components,', p47phox, and, p67phox])].

[sujeto(['Classically']), verbo([activated]), complemento(['M1', macrophages, have, been, found, in, 'rupture-prone', atherosclerotic, plaques, whereas, alternatively, activated, 'macrophages,', 'M2,', localize, in, stable, plaque])].

[sujeto(['Owing', to, the, abundance, of, these, synthetic, molecules, in, the, 'environment,', and, to, the, established]), verbo([target]), complemento([role, of, this, 'receptor,', a, number, of, representative, compounds, of, 'phthalate,', organophosphate, and, fibrate, classes, were, tested, as, 'ligands/modulators', of, human, liver, 'X', 'receptor,', using, an, integrated, 'approach,', combining, an, in, silico, molecular, docking, technique, with, an, optical, 'SPR', biosensor, binding, study])].

[sujeto(['Chronic', ethanol, consumption]), verbo([causes]), complemento([hepatic, steatosis, and, 'inflammation,', which, are, associated, with, liver, hypoxia])].

[sujeto(['These', data, show, that, 'LXRα', and, its, 'ligand-induced', 'up-regulation', of, 'MCP-1', and, 'MCP-1-induced', 'LXRα-dependent', lipogenesis, play, a, key, role, in, the, autocrine, and, paracrine, activation, of, 'MCP-1', in, the, pathogenesis, of, alcoholic, fatty, liver, 'disease,', and, that, this, activation, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, promising, new, target, for, 'ALD', therapy])].
[sujeto(['Oleic', '(', 'OA)', and, linoleic, '(', 'LA)', fatty, acids, may, be, important, regulators, of, 'Slc2a4', gene, '(', 'GLUT4', 'protein)', in, skeletal, 'muscle,', thus]), verbo([participating]), complemento([in, insulin, resistance])].
[sujeto(['OA', and, 'LA', '(', 50, -, 400, 'µM)']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, 'Slc2a4/GLUT4', expression, in, a, 'dose-dependent', way, '(', maximum, of, '~50%,', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')'])].

[sujeto(['α-', and, 'γ-tocopherol', efflux, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'CHO', cells, overexpressing, human, 'ABCG1', compared, to, control, cells])].

[sujeto(['One', hypothesis, is, that, dyslipidemia, results, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([cholesterol, content, in, cell, 'membranes,', thus, impacting, upon, membrane, fluidity, and, subsequent, signaling])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', studies, demonstrate, that, the, 'metabolite,', 27, -, hydroxycholesterol, '(', 27, 'HC),', can, function, as, an, 'estrogen,']), verbo([increasing]), complemento([the, proliferation, of, estrogen, receptor, '(', 'ER)-positive', breast, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['This', was, unexpected, because, 27, 'HC', and, other, oxysterols]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, liver, 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXR),', resulting, in, a, reduction, of, intracellular, cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['Resolution', of, this, paradox, will]), verbo([require]), complemento([dissection, of, the, molecular, mechanisms, by, which, 'ER', and, 'LXR', converge, in, breast, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Regardless,', the, observation, that, 27, 'HC', influences, breast, cancer]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, rationale, for, strategies, that, target, cholesterol, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['Despite']), verbo([increased]), complemento([survivorship, among, 'patients,', breast, cancer, remains, the, most, common, cancer, among, women, and, is, the, second, leading, cause, of, cancer, death, in, women])].
[sujeto(['The', magnitude, of, this, problem]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, strong, impetus, for, new, chemopreventative, strategies, 'and/or', lifestyle, changes, that, reduce, cancer, incidence])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', obesity, is, also, highly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, elevated, 'cholesterol,', and, cholesterol, itself, is, a, risk, factor, for, breast, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', patients, taking, statins, demonstrate, a, lower, breast, cancer, incidence, and]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([recurrence])].
[sujeto(['The', recent, observation, that, 27, -, hydroxycholesterol, '(', 27, 'HC)', is, produced, in, a, stoichiometric, manner, from, 'cholesterol,', together, with, our, recent, demonstration, that, it, exerts, partial, agonist, activity, on, both, the, estrogen, and, liver, 'X', 'receptors,']), verbo([suggested]), complemento([a, potential, mechanistic, link, between, 'hyper-cholesterolemia', and, breast, cancer, incidence])].
[sujeto(['Using', genetic, and, pharmacological, 'approaches,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, shown, that, elevation, of, circulating, 27, 'HC', significantly, increases, tumor, growth, and, metastasis, in, murine, models, of, breast, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Further,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, in, appropriate, animal, models, that, the, impact, of, 'high-fat', diet, on, tumor, pathogenesis, can, be, mitigated, by, statins, or, by, small, molecule, inhibitors, of, 'CYP27A1'])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, pharmacological, or, dietary, modifications, that, lower, total, 'cholesterol,', and, by, inference, 27, 'HC,', are, likely, to, reduce, the, impact, of, 'obesity/metabolic', syndrome, on, breast, cancer, incidence])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, critical, roles, that, nuclear, receptors, like, 'LXR-α', '(', 'Liver', 'X', 'Receptor-', 'alpha)', plays, as, a, class, of, 'post-transcriptional', gene, regulator, in, skin, development, and, diseases])].

[sujeto(['Exposure', to, 'T0901317']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([lipid, droplet, formation, and, inhibited, 'differentiation,', while, 25, 'OHC', induced, trophoblast, 'toxicity,', promoted, hCG, and, progesterone, release, at, lower, concentrations, with, inhibition, at, higher, 'concentrations,', and, had, no, effect, on, lipid, droplet, formation])].

[sujeto(['Soluble', endoglin, '(', 'sEng)', is]), verbo([released]), complemento([from, the, placenta, and, contributes, to, the, maternal, endothelial, dysfunction, seen, in, preeclampsia])].

[sujeto(['We', characterized, 'LXR', in, severe, preeclamptic, 'placentas,', and, assessed, whether, oxysterols]), verbo([increase]), complemento([release, of, sEng, from, primary, human, umbilical, vein, endothelial, cells, '(', 'HUVECs),', primary, trophoblasts, and, placental, explants])].
[sujeto(['Given', pravastatin, is, thought, to, block, oxysterol, production, and]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, 'LXR,', we, examined, whether, pravastatin, reduces, sEng, release])].
[sujeto(['Oxysterols', upregulated, sEng, production, in, 'HUVECs', and, placental, explants, although, the]), verbo([increases]), complemento([were, far, more, modest, than, that, recently, reported])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', pravastatin, did, not]), verbo([decrease]), complemento(['oxysterol-induced', upregulation, of, sEng])].
[sujeto(['Oxysterols', upregulate, sEng, production, from, human, 'tissues,', but, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([is, 'modest,', suggesting, this, may, not, be, the, main, mechanism, for, the, very, significant, elevations, in, sEng, seen, in, preeclampsia])].
[sujeto(['Pravastatin', does, not]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([sEng, production])].
[sujeto(['The', 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, 'A1', '(', 'ABCA1)', protein]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([the, transport, of, cholesterol, and, phospholipids, from, cells, to, apolipoprotein, 'A-I', '(', 'apoA-I)', to, generate, nascent, 'HDL', particles])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, examined, the, effect, of, 'apoA-I', and, 'ABCA1', overexpression, on, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, fatty, acid, synthesis, in, 'QSG-7701', hepatocytes, and, in, mice])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, either, 'apoA-I', or, 'ABCA1', resulted, in, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, cholesterol, efflux, and, a, decrease, in, cellular, 'cholesterol,', fatty, 'acids,', and, triglycerides])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, these, genes, also, resulted, in, a, reduction, in, 27, -, hydroxycholesterol, levels, and, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, mRNA, levels, of, fatty, acid, synthase, and, 'acetyl-CoA', carboxylase, 1])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, expression, of, 'apoA-I', or, 'ABCA1', can, reduce, steatosis, by, decreasing, lipid, storage, and, modifying, lipid, transport, in, hepatocytes, and, may, also, inhibit, fatty, acid, synthesis, by, decreasing, 27, -, hydroxycholesterol, levels])].
[sujeto(['Oxysterols', are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, maintaining, cellular, cholesterol, levels])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', oxysterols]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, demonstrated, to, modulate, the, function, of, immune, cells, and, tumor, growth])].
[sujeto(['LXR-dependent', oxysterol, effects, can, be, ascribed, to, the, activation, of, 'LXRα,', 'LXRβ', or, 'LXRαβ', 'isoforms,', which]), verbo([induces]), complemento([transcriptional, activation, or, 'trans-repression', of, target, genes])].
[sujeto(['Oxysterol-LXR', signaling]), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, shown, to, inhibit, antitumor, immune, 'responses,', as, well, as, to, modulate, tumor, cell, growth])].
[sujeto(['Several', lines, of, evidence]), verbo([have]), complemento([indicated, that, the, activation, of, either, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, gamma, '(', 'PPARγ)', or, liver, 'X', receptor, α, '(', 'LXRα)', relates, to, cholesterol, efflux])].
[sujeto(['While', pioglitazone, can]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, activation, of, 'PPARγ,', 22, '(', 'R)-hydroxycholesterol', can, activate, 'LXRα', and, is, a, metabolic, intermediate, in, the, biosynthesis, of, steroid, hormones])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, showed, that, 22, '(', 'R)-hydroxycholesterol', can, modestly, 'up-regulate', 'LXRα', while, simultaneously]), verbo([increasing]), complemento(['ABCA1', by, 56, '%'])].
[sujeto(['The', combination, of, 22, '(', 'R)-hydroxycholesterol', and, pioglitazone, resulted, in, a, 3.64, -, fold]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'ABCA1', expression, and, a, high, rate, of, cholesterol, efflux])].
[sujeto(['Oil', 'Red', 'O', staining, showed, an, obvious, reduction, in, the, lipid, droplets]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, cholesterosis, in, 'GBECs'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', the, present, findings, indicate, that, the, 'anti-lipid', deposition, action, of, 22, '(', 'R)-hydroxycholesterol', combined, with, pioglitazone]), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, activation, of, the, 'PPARγ-LXRα-ABCA1', 'pathway,', increased, 'ABCA1', expression, and, the, efflux, of, cholesterol, from, 'GBECs'])].
[sujeto(['Cholesterol', plays, an, indispensable, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, properties, of, cell, membranes, in, mammalian, cells])].
[sujeto(['Accumulation', of, cholesterol, and, its, 'intermediates,', such, as, 'oxysterols,']), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, activation, of, the, nuclear, receptors, 'LXRs', '(', liver, 'X', 'receptors)'])].
[sujeto(['Accumulating', evidence, indicates, that, the, endogenous, ligands, of, 'LXRs,', 'oxysterols,', play, an, active, and, important, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, fate, and, function, of, immune, cells])].
[sujeto(['Recent', advances]), verbo([have]), complemento([highlighted, a, controversial, role, for, 'LXR', in, cancer])].
[sujeto(['This', protective, effect]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'LXR', appears, to, be, dependent, on, 'IFN-γ'])].
[sujeto(['This', novel, evidence]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, new, perspective, for, targeting, 'LXR', in, 'cancer,', although, controversial, studies, can, be, also, found, in, the, literature])].

[sujeto(['The', liver, 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs)', are, members, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, superfamily, that, regulate, sterol, metabolism, and, inflammation])].
[sujeto(['We', sought, to, identify, previously, unknown, genes]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'LXRs', in, macrophages, and, to, determine, their, contribution, to, atherogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, characterize, a, novel, 'LXR']), verbo([target]), complemento(['gene,', the, lipopolysaccharide, binding, protein, '(', 'LBP)', gene])].

[sujeto([24, '(', 'S)-hydroxycholesterol', '(', 24, 'S-OHC)', which, is, enzymatically, produced, in, the, brain, plays, important, physiological, roles, in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([brain, cholesterol, homeostasis])].

[sujeto(['Several', 'LXR', antagonists]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, and, their, possible, indication, for, neurodegenerative, disorders, will, be, discussed])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, demonstrated, that, 0.1, '\240\μM', 25, -, 'HC']), verbo([promoted]), complemento(['ADC', cell, migration, and, invasion, without, affecting, cell, 'proliferation,', especially, after, coculture, with, 'THP1-derived', macrophages])].

[sujeto(['Liver', 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, increasingly, recognized, as, a, potential, therapeutic, target, to, treat, pathological, conditions, ranging, from, vascular, and, metabolic, 'diseases,', neurological, 'degeneration,', to, cancers, that, are, driven, by, lipid, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['Amidst', intensifying, efforts, to, discover, ligands, that]), verbo([act]), complemento([through, 'LXRs', to, achieve, the, 'sought-after', pharmacological, 'outcomes,', several, lead, compounds, are, already, being, tested, in, clinical, trials, for, a, variety, of, disease, interventions])].
[sujeto(['This', review]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, summary, of, known, 'endogenous,', naturally, 'occurring,', and, synthetic, ligands])].

[sujeto(['Gene', 'duplication,']), verbo([loss]), complemento([and, mutation, have, shaped, the, repertoire, and, function, of, 'NRs', in, metazoans])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'LXRα', and, 'LXRβ', genes, emerged, in, the, mammalian, ancestor])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, show, that, 'LXR', duplicated, before, gnathostome, 'radiation,', followed, by, asymmetric, paralogue]), verbo([loss]), complemento([in, some, lineages])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, tighter, control, of, cholesterol, levels, in, vertebrates, was, achieved, through, the, exploitation, of, a, wider, range, of, 'oxysterols,', an, ability, contingent, on, 'ligand-binding', pocket, remodeling])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', its, synthetic, epimer, 22, '(', 'S)-hydroxycholesterol', '(', 22, 'SHC,', 8, ')']), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, specific, antagonistic, effects, in, recent, 'studies,', avoiding, unwanted, side, effects, provided, by, potent, 'LXR', agonists])].
[sujeto(['In', terms, of, 'LXR', 'modulation,', the, aim, of, this, study, was, to, compare, 22, 'SHC', '(', 8, ')', ',', 22, 'RHC', '(', 1, ')', and]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([ligands, with, 'keto-', and, amide, functionality, in, the, 22, nd, position, of, the, cholesterol, scaffold])].
[sujeto(['A', new]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([amide, 'derivate,', 'Fernholtz', cyclohexylamide, '(', 13, ')', was, shown, to, reduce, lipogenesis, in, a, 'dose-responsive', manner, and, abolish, the, effect, of, the, potent, 'LXR', agonist, 'T0901317', when, administered, simultaneously])].
[sujeto(['When', 'inhaled,', ozone, '(', 'O3)']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, cholesterols, of, airway, epithelial, cell, membranes, or, the, 'lung-lining', 'fluid,', generating, chemically, reactive, oxysterols])].
[sujeto(['As', 'expected,', 'O3-derived', oxysterols]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, 'pro-inflammatory', effect, and, increase, 'NF-κB', activity])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', expression, of, the, cholesterol, efflux, pump, 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, 1, '(', 'ABCA1),', which, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, activation, of, the, liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR),', was, suppressed, in, epithelial, cells, exposed, to, 'O3', 'Additionally,', exposure, of, 'LXR', 'knock-out', mice, to, 'O3', enhanced, 'pro-inflammatory', cytokine, production, in, the, 'lung,', suggesting, 'LXR', inhibits, 'O3-induced', inflammation])].
[sujeto(['Similarly,', supplementation, of, epithelial, cells, with, 'alkynyl-tagged', cholesterol, followed, by, 'O3', exposure]), verbo([causes]), complemento([observable, 'lipid-LXR', adduct, formation])].
[sujeto(['Experiments', using, 'Seco', 'A', and, the, 'LXR', agonist, 'T0901317', '(', 'T09)', showed, reduced, expression, of, 'ABCA1', as, compared, with, stimulation, with, 'T0901317', 'alone,', indicating, that, 'Seco', 'A-LXR', protein, adduct, formation]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['LXR', activation, by, traditional, agonists])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', these, data, demonstrate, that, 'O3-derived', oxysterols]), verbo([have]), complemento(['pro-inflammatory', functions, and, form, 'lipid-protein', adducts, with, 'LXR,', thus, leading, to, suppressed, cholesterol, regulatory, gene, expression, and, providing, a, biochemical, mechanism, mediating, 'O3-derived', formation, of, oxidized, lipids, in, the, airways, and, subsequent, adverse, health, effects])].
[sujeto(['Small-molecule', inhibitors]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([growth, factor, receptors, have, failed, to, show, efficacy, for, brain, 'cancers,', potentially, due, to, their, inability, to, achieve, sufficient, drug, levels, in, the, 'CNS'])].
[sujeto(['Targeting', 'non-oncogene', tumor, 'co-dependencies']), verbo([provides]), complemento([an, alternative, 'approach,', particularly, if, drugs, with, high, brain, penetration, can, be, identified])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'LXR-623,', a, clinically, 'viable,', highly, 'brain-penetrant', 'LXRα-partial/LXRβ-full', agonist, selectively, kills, 'GBM', cells, in, an, 'LXRβ-', and, 'cholesterol-dependent', 'fashion,']), verbo([causing]), complemento([tumor, regression, and, prolonged, survival, in, mouse, models])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', a, metabolic, 'co-dependency']), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, pharmacological, means, to, kill, growth, 'factor-activated', cancers, in, the, 'CNS'])].
[sujeto(['The', widespread, involvement, of, the, 'Hedgehog', '(', 'Hh)', signaling, pathway, in, human, malignancies]), verbo([has]), complemento([driven, efforts, to, develop, 'Hh', pathway, inhibitors, as, 'anti-cancer', agents])].
[sujeto(['However,', several, such, 'Smo', antagonists]), verbo([have]), complemento([failed, in, clinical, trials, to, benefit, patients, with, cancers, that, arise, from, aberrant, 'Hh', signaling, '(', which, often, bypasses, 'Smo)'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, a, naturally, occurring, 'oxysterol,', 20, 'α,', 22, '(', 'R)-dihydroxycholesterol', '(', 'Oxy16),', a, known, metabolite, in, the, biosynthesis, of, steroid, 'hormones,', strongly, inhibits, 'Hh', signaling, induced, in, 'C3H10T1/2', embryonic, fibroblasts, and, 'NIH3T3-E1', fibroblasts, through, a, mechanism, that, is, independent, of, liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR)', activation])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, 'Oxy16']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['Hh', signaling, in, 'Suppressor', of, 'Fused', '(', 'Sufu)', null, mouse, embryonic, fibroblast, '(', 'MEF)', 'cells,', indicating, that, its, inhibitory, effect, on, 'Hh', signaling, is, epistatic, to, 'Sufu'])].
[sujeto(['We', further, demonstrate, that, 'Oxy16']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['Gli1', transcriptional, activity, in, 'NIH3T3-E1', cells, overexpressing, 'Gli1', and, a, 'Gli-dependent', reporter, construct])].
[sujeto(['Altogether,', data, presented, here]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Oxy16', may, be, a, suitable, starting, point, for, the, development, of, new, drugs, that, inhibit, 'Hh', signaling, downstream, of, 'Smo'])].
[sujeto(['By']), verbo([targeting]), complemento([aberrant, 'Hh', 'signaling,', such, novel, 'Hh', pathway, inhibitors, could, significantly, broaden, the, range, of, clinical, applications, compared, to, existing, 'Smo', antagonists])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, present, study, adds, a, new, facet, to, the, spectrum, of, 'Hh', pathway, modulation, that, naturally, occurring, oxysterol, derivatives, are, capable, 'of,', ranging, from, allosteric, activation, of, the, pathway, via, 'Smo']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, inhibition, of, the, pathway, downstream, of, 'Smo'])].
[sujeto(['Liver', 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs)', are]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, that, play, central, roles, in, the, transcriptional, control, of, lipid, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['The', ability, of, 'LXRs', to, integrate, metabolic, and, inflammation, signalling, makes, them, attractive]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, intervention, in, human, metabolic, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Several', oxidized, metabolites, of, cholesterol, '(', 'oxysterols)', are, endogenous, 'LXR', 'ligands,', that]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([their, transcriptional, responses])].
[sujeto(['This', change, in, the, activity, profile, is]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, a, disruption, of, a, key, interaction, between, residues, 'His435', and, 'Trp457', that, destabilizes, the, 'H11-H12', region, of, the, receptor, and, favors, the, binding, of, corepressors])].
[sujeto(['The', introduction, of, fluorine, atoms, on, the, oxysterol, side, chain, can, favor, both, hydrophobic, interactions, as, well, as, hydrogen, bonds, with, the, fluorine, atoms, and, may, thus]), verbo([induce]), complemento([changes, in, the, receptor, that, may, lead, to, changes, in, the, activity, profile])].
[sujeto(['To', evaluate, these, effects, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([synthesized, two, fluorinated, 27, -, 'nor-steroids,', analogues, of, 27, -, norcholestenoic, 'acid,', the, 25, ',', 25, -, difluoroacid, and, the, corresponding, 26, -, alcohol])].
[sujeto(['Molecular', dynamics, simulation, of, the, 'ligand-receptor', complexes, showed, that, the, difluoroacid, disrupted, the, 'His435-Trp457', interaction, although, the, resulting, conformational, changes, were, different, from, those]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, the, 'non-fluorinated', analogue])].
[sujeto(['In', the, case, of, the, 'difluoroalcohol,', the, fluorine, atoms, actively]), verbo([participated]), complemento([in, the, interaction, with, several, residues, in, the, ligand, binding, pocket, leading, to, a, stabilization, of, the, active, receptor, conformation])].
[sujeto(['Bacterial', infection, of, macrophages, usually]), verbo([triggers]), complemento([strong, innate, immune, 'mechanisms,', including, 'IL-1', cytokine, secretion])].
[sujeto(['The', newer, member, of, the, 'IL-1', 'family,', 'IL-36,', was, recently, shown, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cellular, defense, against, 'Mtb'])].
[sujeto(['To', unveil, the, underlying, mechanism, of, 'IL-36']), verbo([induced]), complemento([antibacterial, 'activity,', we, analyzed, its, role, in, the, regulation, of, cholesterol, 'metabolism,', together, with, the, involvement, of, 'Liver', 'X', 'Receptor', '(', 'LXR)', in, this, process])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento(['that,', in, 'Mtb-infected', 'macrophages,', 'IL-36', signaling, modulates, cholesterol, biosynthesis, and, efflux, via, 'LXR'])].

[sujeto(['By']), verbo([modulating]), complemento([the, activity, of, many, proteins, '(', for, 'instance,', liver, 'X', 'receptors,', 'oxysterol-binding', 'proteins,', some, 'ATP-binding', cassette, 'transporters),', oxysterols, can, affect, many, cellular, functions, and, influence, various, physiological, processes, '(', e])].
[sujeto(['Phytosterols', are, stucturally, correlated, to, the, endogenous, ligands, of, 'Liver', 'X', 'Receptor', '(', 'LXR),', a, 'ligand-activated']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, has, emerged, as, an, attractive, drug, target, due, to, its, ability, to, integrate, metabolic, and, inflammatory, signaling])].
[sujeto(['Natural', and, 'semi-synthetic', phytosterol, derivatives, characterized, by, the, presence, of, 'side-chain', oxygenated, functions]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, to, be, able, to, modulate, 'LXR', activity])].
[sujeto(['The', subsequent, luciferase, assays, with, 'GAL-4', chimeric, receptors, evidenced, the, ability, of, the, two, 24, '(', 'S)-epimers,', 10, b, and, 11, 'b,', to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'LXRs,', showing, the, same, degree, of, affinity, as, '(', 22, 'R)-hydroxycholesterol', '(', 1, ')'])].
[sujeto(['The', gene, expression, profiling, of, '(', 24, 'S)-stigmasta-5,28-diene-3β,24-ol', '(', 10, 'a)', and, '(', 24, 'S)-stigmasta-5-ene-3β,24-ol', '(', 11, 'a)', demonstrated, the, capability, of, both, the, compounds, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([the, expression, of, four, 'well-known', 'LXR', target, 'genes,', such, as, 'ABCA1,', 'SREBP1c,', 'FASN,', and, 'SCD1', in, 'U937', monocytic, cell, 'line,', thus, supporting, the, hypothesis, they, were, 'LXR', positive, modulators])].
[sujeto(['The', lung]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, unique, relationship, to, cholesterol, that, is, shaped, by, its, singular, physiology])].
[sujeto(['On', the, one, 'hand,', the, lungs, receive, the, full, cardiac, output, and]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, predominant, dependence, on, plasma, lipoprotein, uptake, for, their, cholesterol, supply])].

[sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, lipid, dysregulation, may, be, a, unifying, and, perhaps, contributory, event, in, chronic, lung, disease, pathogenesis])].

[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR)', α, and, 'LXRβ', are, involved, in, the, regulation, of, lipid, 'metabolism,', 'inflammation,', 'immunity,', cellular, 'proliferation,', and, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Oxysterols', are, endogenous, 'LXR', 'ligands,', and, also]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, other, nuclear, and, membrane, receptors])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, a, phytosterol, derivative, with, a, 1, 'α-hydroxy', group, acts, as, a, potent, 'LXR', agonist, with, 'intestine-selective', action, and, that, 25, -, hydroxy, and, 26, /, 27, -, hydroxy, metabolites, of, 7, -, dehydrocholesterol, '(', 7, -, 'DHC)', exhibit, partial, 'LXR', agonism])].

[sujeto([1, ',', 25, -, '(', 'OH)2-7-DHC', effectively]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['lipopolysaccharide-stimulated', proinflammatory, gene, expression, in, an, 'LXR-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['These', oxysterols]), verbo([have]), complemento([potential, as, 'LXR-targeted', therapeutics, for, inflammatory, disease])].
[sujeto(['As', previously, 'shown,', triclosan, is]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, 'plasma,', urine, and, milk, from, large, parts, of, different, human, populations])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, that, triclosan, is, able, to, activate, the, human, pregnane, 'X', receptor, in, vitro, and, thus, possibly, affecting, metabolism, of, drugs, in, humans, via, the, induction, of, 'CYP3A4'])].
[sujeto(['Besides,', triclosan]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, affect, thyroid, hormonal, levels, in, rats, in, vivo])].

[sujeto(['This', indicates, that, the, normal, use, of, 'triclosan-containing', toothpaste, is, not, likely, to, alter, metabolism, of, drugs, via, 'CYP3A4', induction, or]), verbo([cause]), complemento([adverse, events, because, of, thyroid, disturbances, in, humans])].
[sujeto([24, 'S-hydroxycholesterol', '(', 24, 'OHC)', is, a, 'brain-generated', cholesterol, metabolite, which]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, with, 'neurodegeneration,', and, alterations, of, cholesterol, metabolism, in, murine, 'HD', models, and, 'patients\'', tissues, have, been, recently, identified])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', we, demonstrate, that, 24, 'OHC', levels, parallel, the, large]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, caudate, volumes, observed, in, 'gene-positive', subjects, from, 'pre-manifest', to, 'HD', stage, 1, ',', thus, reflecting, a, critical, phase, characterized, by, neuronal, loss])].
[sujeto(['Oxidative', stress]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, various, oxidants, in, a, random, and, destructive, manner, is, considered, to, play, an, important, role, in, the, pathophysiology, of, a, number, of, human, disorders, and, diseases])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, an, improved, method, for, the, measurement, of, in, vivo, lipid, peroxidation, by, using, a, single, plasma, or, liver, 'sample,', where, total, 8, -, 'iso-prostaglandin', 'F(2alpha)', '(', 't8-iso-PGF(2alpha)),', total, hydroxyoctadecadienoic, acids, '(', 'tHODEs),', total, hydroxyeicosatetraenoic, acids, '(', 'tHETEs),', and, total, 7, -, hydroxycholesterol, '(', 't7-OHCh),', as, well, as, their, parent, molecules, linoleic, acid, '(', 't18:2)', and, cholesterol, '(', 'tCh),', are, determined, by, 'LC-MS/MS', '(', for, 't8-iso-PGF(2alpha),', 'tHODE,', and, 'tHETE)', and, 'GC-MS', '(', for, 't7-OHCh,', 't18:2,', and, 'tCh)', analyses])].
[sujeto(['It', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, in, the, plasma, of, patients, and, 'controls,', the, concentrations, of, oxidized, lipids, decreased, in, the, following, 'order:', tHODE, tHETE, 't7-OHCh', &, 'gt;', 't8-iso-PGF(2alpha)'])].
[sujeto(['As', 'expected,', the, virus, clearly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([these, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['A', significant]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, stereoisomer, ratio, for, the, liver, of, patients, was, 'observed,', indicating, liver, dysfunction])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([suggested, that, 4, 'beta-hydroxycholesterol', could, be, used, as, a, clinical, marker, for, 'CYP3A4', activity, aiding, in, dose, adjustments])].
[sujeto(['The', concentration, of, 4, 'beta-hydroxycholesterol']), verbo([increases]), complemento([very, slowly, during, 'CYP3A4/5', induction, in, paediatric, patients])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', induction, of, 'CYP3A4/5', was, apparently, complete, within, 1, -, 2, weeks, of, carbamazepine, 'treatment,', plasma, 4, 'beta-hydroxycholesterol', levels, continued, to]), verbo([increase]), complemento([until, at, least, 8, weeks, of, treatment])].
[sujeto(['AIMS', 'To', investigate, the, time, course, of, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 4, 'beta-hydroxycholesterol', and, carbamazepine, plasma, concentrations, during, treatment, of, paediatric, patients, with, epilepsy])].
[sujeto(['Carbamazepine', treatment]), verbo([increased]), complemento([mean, plasma, 4, 'beta-hydroxycholesterol', significantly, already, after, 1, week, of, treatment, '(', from, 43, to, 80, ng, 'ml(-1),', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')'])].
[sujeto([4, 'beta-Hydroxycholesterol', concentrations, continued, to]), verbo([increase]), complemento([until, at, least, 8, weeks, of, treatment, and, the, concentrations, in, the, final, samples, '(', 8, -, 23, weeks, of, 'treatment)', varied, between, 122, and, 494, ng, 'ml(-1)'])].
[sujeto(['Carbamazepine', treatment, of, paediatric, patients, with, epilepsy, resulted, in, an, induction, of, 'CYP3A4/5', and, a, concomitant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, plasma, 4, 'beta-hydroxycholesterol'])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', the, induction, of, 'CYP3A4/5', was, apparently, complete, after, 1, -, 2, 'weeks,', the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 4, 'beta-hydroxycholesterol', continued, for, several, weeks])].
[sujeto(['Our', previous, study, showed, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, total, cholesterol, level, of, the, hippocampus, after, 'kainate-induced', 'injury,', but, whether, this, is, further, metabolized, to, neurosteroids, is, not, known])].
[sujeto(['A', net]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'P450scc', protein, was, detected, in, hippocampal, homogenates, by, 'Western', blots, at, 2, weeks, 'post-kainate', injection, '(', time, of, peak, cholesterol, concentration, after, kainate, 'injury)'])].
[sujeto(['Immunohistochemistry', showed]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([labeling, of, the, enzyme, in, 'neurons,', but, increased, expression, in, a, small, number, of, astrocytes])].
[sujeto(['A', 'non-significant', tendency, to, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, pregnenolone, level, was, detected, 2, weeks, 'post-lesion'])].
[sujeto(['This', is, in, contrast, to, a, large]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, oxysterols, in, the, lesioned, hippocampus, at, this, time, '(', 'He', et, al])].
[sujeto(['Together,', they, indicate, that]), verbo([increased]), complemento([cholesterol, in, the, kainate, lesioned, hippocampus, is, mostly, metabolized, to, 'oxysterols,', and, not, neurosteroids])].
[sujeto(['Defects', in, 'Niemann-Pick,', 'Type', 'C-1', protein, '(', 'NPC1)']), verbo([cause]), complemento(['cholesterol,', 'sphingolipids,', 'phospholipids,', and, glycolipids, to, accumulate, in, lysosomes, of, 'liver,', 'spleen,', and, brain])].
[sujeto(['In', cultured, 'fibroblasts,', 'NPC1', deficiency]), verbo([causes]), complemento([lysosomal, retention, of, 'lipoprotein-derived', cholesterol, after, uptake, by, 'receptor-mediated', endocytosis])].
[sujeto(['We', showed, earlier, that, 'NPC1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([cholesterol, and, oxysterols])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, localize, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, to, luminal, 'loop-1,', a, 240, -, amino, acid, domain, with, 18, cysteines])].
[sujeto(['This', loop]), verbo([bound]), complemento(['[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]cholesterol', '(', 'K(d),', 130, 'nM)', and, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]25-hydroxycholesterol', '(', 25, -, 'HC,', 'K(d),', 10, 'nM)', with, one, sterol, binding, site, per, dimer])].
[sujeto(['Unlabeled', cholesterol, competed, strongly, for]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]cholesterol,', but, weakly, for, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]25-HC', binding])].
[sujeto(['Binding', of, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]cholesterol', but, not, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]25-HC', was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, detergents])].
[sujeto(['We', also, studied, 'NPC2,', a, soluble, protein, whose, deficiency]), verbo([causes]), complemento([a, similar, disease, phenotype])].
[sujeto(['NPC2']), verbo([bound]), complemento(['cholesterol,', but, not, oxysterols])].
[sujeto(['Epicholesterol', and, cholesteryl, sulfate, competed, for, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]cholesterol']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'NPC2,', but, not, 'NPC1'])].
[sujeto(['Glutamine', 79, in, luminal, 'loop-1', of, 'NPC-1', is, important, for, sterol, 'binding;', a, 'Q79A', mutation, abolished]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]cholesterol', and, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]25-HC', to, 'full-length', 'NPC1'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', the, sterol]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, on, luminal, 'loop-1', is, not, essential, for, 'NPC1', function, in, 'fibroblasts,', but, it, may, function, in, other, cells, where, 'NPC1', deficiency, produces, more, complicated, lipid, abnormalities])].
[sujeto(['The', processes, may]), verbo([involve]), complemento([the, 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, 'A1', '(', 'ABCA1),', a, transport, protein, shown, to, be, crucial, in, apolipoprotein, 'A-I', '(', 'apoA-I)-mediated', mobilization, of, cellular, cholesterol, and, phospholipid])].
[sujeto(['Upon', incubation, of, the, type, 'I-like', pneumocytes, with, agents, that, 'up-regulate', the, 'ABCA1', gene, '(', 9, -, 'cis-retinoic', acid, '[', 9, 'cRA]', and, 22, -, hydroxycholesterol, '[', 22, -, 'OH,', 9, 'cRA/22-OH]),', 'ABCA1', protein, levels, were]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([to, maximum, levels, after, 8, to, 16, hours, and, remained, elevated, for, 24, hours])].

[sujeto(['Lipid', efflux, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'Probucol'])].
[sujeto(['Sucrose', density, gradient, analysis, of, the, media, from]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([cells, incubated, with, 'apoA-I', identified, heterogeneous, lipid, particles, that, isolated, at, a, density, between, 1.063, and, 1.21, 'g/ml,', with, low, or, high, 'apoA-I', content])].

[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, membrane, dipole, potential, led, to, '(', 'i)', an, increase, in, 'SRE', channel, 'conductance,', '(', 'ii)', an, increase, in, the, 'channel\'s', 'lifetime,', and, '(', 'iii)', a, decrease, in, a, number, of, synchronously, operating, small, channels, in, the, clusters])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', the, results, support, the, model, of, the, small, 'SRE', channel, synchronization, in, the, cluster, as, 'voltage-dependent', orientation, of, the, lipid, dipoles]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, channel, pores])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, use, the, excitation, generalized, polarization, '(', 'GPex)', of, 6, -, 'lauroyl-2-(dimethylamino)naphthalene', '(', 'Laurdan)', fluorescence, in, fluid, 'cholesterol/1-palmitoyl-2-oleoyl-l-alpha-phosphatidylcholine', large, unilamellar, vesicles, to, explore, the, experimental, conditions, that, would, be]), verbo([required]), complemento([in, order, to, detect, a, biphasic, change, in, membrane, properties, at, specific, sterol, mole, fractions, '(', 'Cr)', '(', e])].
[sujeto(['The', depth, of, the, 'GPex', dip]), verbo([increases]), complemento([with, increasing, incubation, time, and, eventually, reaches, a, 'plateau,', at, which, the, maximum, area, covered, by, superlattices, is, expected, to, be, achieved])].
[sujeto(['These', effects, can, be, attributed, to, the]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['inter-bilayer', lipid, exchange, and, the, increased, 'vesicle-vesicle', interactions, present, at, high, lipid, '(', 'vesicle)', concentrations, as, well, as, the, decreased, interactions, between, oxysterols, and, phospholipids])].
[sujeto(['These', possible, explanations]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, incorporated, into, a, kinetic, model, that, is, able, to, calculate, the, effects, of, sterol, oxidation, and, lipid, concentration, on, the, depth, of, the, 'GPex', dip])].
[sujeto(['The', depth, of, the, 'GPex', 'dip,', the]), verbo([required]), complemento([incubation, time, for, the, dip, 'formation,', and, the, lipid, concentration, dependence, of, the, 'GPex', dip, vary, with, 'Cr,', suggesting, different, physical, properties, for, different, sterol, superlattices])].
[sujeto(['These', results, improve, our, mechanistic, understanding, of, sterol, superlattice, formation, and, explain, why, some, 'studies,', especially, those]), verbo([requiring]), complemento([high, lipid, 'concentrations,', did, not, detect, a, biphasic, change, in, membrane, properties, at, 'Cr'])].
[sujeto(['The', mechanisms, directing, the, intracellular, trafficking, of, this, nearly, insoluble, molecule]), verbo([have]), complemento([received, increased, attention, through, the, discovery, of, the, steroidogenic, acute, regulatory, protein, '(', 'StAR)', and, similar, proteins, containing, 'StAR-related', lipid, transfer, '(', 'START)', domains])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'trans-cytoplasmic', cholesterol, transport, in, vivo, appears, to]), verbo([involve]), complemento([the, 'recently-described', protein, 'StarD4,', which, is, expressed, in, most, cells])].
[sujeto(['Steroidogenic', cells, must, also, move, large, amounts, of, cholesterol, from, the, outer, mitochondrial, membrane, to, the, first, steroidogenic, 'enzyme,', which, lies, on, the, matrix, side, of, the, inner, 'membrane;', this, action]), verbo([requires]), complemento(['StAR'])].
[sujeto(['Congenital', lipoid, adrenal, 'hyperplasia,', a, rare, and, severe, disorder, of, human, 'steroidogenesis,', results, from, mutations, in, 'StAR,']), verbo([providing]), complemento([a, 'StAR', knockout, of, nature, that, has, provided, key, insights, into, its, activity])].

[sujeto(['To', clarify, whether, lipids, deposited, in, human, atheromatous, lesions]), verbo([induce]), complemento([apoptosis, of, vascular, smooth, muscle, cells, '(', 'SMC)', and, to, identify, the, main, component, in, deposited, lipids, responsible, for, inducing, 'apoptosis,', we, examined, the, effect, of, lipids, extracted, from, human, atheromatous, lesions, on, apoptosis, of, cultured, 'SMC', and, analyzed, the, content, of, cholesterol, in, the, lipids])].

[sujeto(['It', was, recently, identified, as, a, substrate, of, the, polymorphic, organic, anion, transporting, polypeptide, 1, 'B1', '(', 'OATP1B1)']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([on, the, sinusoidal, membrane, of, human, hepatocytes])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study, aimed, to, investigate, the, possible, association, of, single, nucleotide, polymorphisms, '(', 'SNP)', in, the, 'SLCO1B1', gene, encoding, for, 'OATP1B1', with, the]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([effect, of, rifampicin, on, hepatic, 'CYP3A4'])].

[sujeto(['Oxysterols,', oxidation, products, of, 'cholesterol,']), verbo([mediate]), complemento([numerous, and, diverse, biological, processes])].

[sujeto(['According', to, a, recently, solved, structure, for, a, yeast, oxysterol]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['protein-related', 'protein,', 'Osh4,', some, members, of, this, large, family, of, proteins, are, likely, sterol, transporters])].

[sujeto(['Human', atherosclerotic, lesions, typically, contain, large, amounts, of, ferritin]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, apoptotic, macrophages, and, foam, 'cells,', although, the, reasons, are, unknown])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 7, 'beta-OH', enlarges, the, intracellular, labile, iron, 'pool,', increases, formation, of, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS),', and, induces, ferritin, and, cytosolic, accumulation, of, lipid, 'droplets,', lysosomal, 'destabilization,', and, apoptototic, macrophage, death])].

[sujeto(['Much', experimental, evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, lipid, oxidation, is, important, in, atherogenesis, and, in, epidemiological, studies, dietary, antioxidants, appear, protective, against, cardiovascular, events])].

[sujeto(['The', difference, in, 'acetylcholine-mediated', vasodilation, in, the, microcirculation, was, -, 52.1, '%', -, point, '(', 95, '%', confidence, interval, -, 132.8, to, 28.1, ')', ;, in, 'sodium-nitroprusside-mediated', vasodilation, in, the, 'microcirculation,', 2.6, '%', -, point, '(', -, 95.1, to, 100.2, ')', ;, in, capillary, 'recruitment,', 2.5, '%', -, point, '(', -, 6.8, to, 11.7, ')', ;, in, 'acetylcholine-induced']), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, 'FBF', '(', 'n=28),', 23, '%', -, point, '(', -, 173, to, 126, ')', ;, in, 'L-NMMA-induced', reduction, of, basal, 'FBF,', -, 2.8, '%', -, point, '(', -, 29.3, to, 23.8, ')', ;, in, 'flow-mediated', vasodilation, of, the, brachial, 'artery,', 0.3, '%', -, points, '(', -, 2.7, to, 3.3, ')', ;, in, 24, -, h, systolic, blood, 'pressure,', 2.1, mmHg, '(', -, 1.3, to, 5.5, ')', ;, in, soluble, 'VCAM-1,', 54, 'ng/ml', '(', -, 8, to, 115, ')', ;, in, soluble, 'ICAM-1,', 9, 'ng/ml', '(', -, 49, to, 67, ')', ;, in, 'sE-selectin,', -, 17, 'ng/ml', '(', -, 44, to, 11, ')', ;, in, ketocholesterol, 5, nM, '(', -, 17, to, 26, ')', ;, and, in, oxidised, 'LDL', -, 1.6, 'U/l', '(', -, 6.7, to, 3.5, ')'])].

[sujeto(['Thus,', our, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([no, evidence, of, an, effect, on, vascular, function, of, calcium, dobesilate, in, humans])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'work,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, possibility, of, modifying, the, electrostatic, properties, of, the, skin, by, treating, human, epidermis, with, compounds, whose, structures, possess, a, large, molecular, dipole, moment])].

[sujeto(['In', both, cell, lines, 7, 'beta-OH', at, 30, mu, 'M']), verbo([induces]), complemento([cell, death, by, apoptosis, within, the, first, hours, of, treatment])].

[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results, indicate, for, the, first, time, 'that:', 1, ')', oxysterols, hydroxylated, on, the, sterol, nucleus, are, also, able, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['apoptosis,', 2, ')', apoptosis, can, be, induced, by, these, substances, in, cells, belonging, to, the, myeloid, lineage, and, 3, ')', as, far, as, apoptosis, is, 'concerned,', a, combined, treatment, with, 7, 'beta-OH', and, 25, -, 'OH', can, lead, to, opposite, effects, depending, on, the, cell, type])].
[sujeto(['Obesity', and, the, related, entity, metabolic, syndrome, are, characterized, by, altered, lipid, metabolism, and]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, increased, morbidity, risk, for, cardiovascular, disease, and, cancer])].

[sujeto(['Concerning', fatty, 'acids,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([minor, differences, in, the, levels, of, these, variables, in, males, of, the, three, groups])].
