[sujeto(['Bile', acids]), verbo([repress]), complemento([the, transcription, of, cytochrome, 'P450', 7, 'A1', '(', 'CYP7A1),', which, catalyzes, the, 'rate-limiting', step, in, bile, acid, biosynthesis])].
[sujeto(['Although', bile, acids]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', the, mechanism, underlying, bile, 'acid-mediated', repression, of, 'CYP7A1', remained, unclear])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([used, a, 'potent,', nonsteroidal, 'FXR', ligand, to, show, that, 'FXR', induces, expression, of, small, heterodimer, partner, 1, '(', 'SHP-1),', an, atypical, member, of, the, nuclear, receptor, family, that, lacks, a, 'DNA-binding', domain])].
[sujeto(['SHP-1']), verbo([represses]), complemento([expression, of, 'CYP7A1', by, inhibiting, the, activity, of, liver, receptor, homolog, 1, '(', 'LRH-1),', an, orphan, nuclear, receptor, that, is, known, to, regulate, 'CYP7A1', expression, positively])].
[sujeto(['This', bile, 'acid-activated', regulatory, cascade]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, molecular, basis, for, the, coordinate, suppression, of, 'CYP7A1', and, other, genes, involved, in, bile, acid, biosynthesis])].
[sujeto(['Two', bile, acid, response, elements]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, localized, within, the, 5, '\'', -, flanking, region, of, the, rat, gene, and, these, elements, overlap, three, nuclear, receptor, binding, sites, for, hepatocyte, nuclear, factor, '(', 'HNF-4),', liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR)', and, 'alpha(1)-fetoprotein', transcription, factor, '(', 'FTF)'])].
[sujeto(['Recently', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, that, bile, acids, are, physiological, ligands, for, the, farnesyl, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', which, suggested, that, 'FXR', could, function, by, binding, to, one, of, the, three, nuclear, receptor, sites, to, mediate, regulation, of, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', transcription, by, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['In', this, study, we, show, that, 'FXR', is, indeed, a, crucial, factor, for, bile, 'acid-mediated', 'regulation,', but, that, it, functions, without]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'DNA'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we, also, demonstrate, that, neither, the, 'LXR', nor, the, 'HNF-4', sites, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, bile, 'acid-mediated', regulation, of, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', transcription])].
[sujeto(['Most', 'importantly,', we, show, that, the, 'FTF', site, is, essential, for, regulation, of, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', by, bile, 'acids,', similar, to, what, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, demonstrated, for, another, gene, of, the, bile, acid, biosynthetic, 'pathway,', the, sterol, 12, 'alpha-hydroxylase', gene])].
[sujeto(['Bile', acids, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, intestinal, absorption, and, biliary, solubilization, of, cholesterol, and, lipids])].
[sujeto(['Two']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['receptors,', hepatocyte, nuclear, factor, 4, alpha, '(', 'HNF-4alpha)', and, 'alpha(1)-fetoprotein', transcription, 'factor,', are, required, for, both, transcription, and, regulation, by, different, physiological, events])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, that, some, 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinases,', such, as, the, 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, and, the, 'ERK,', play, important, roles, in, the, regulation, of, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', transcription])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, p38, kinase, activity, diminishes, 'HNF-4alpha']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([protein, levels, and, its, phosphorylation, in, vivo, and, in, 'vitro,', and, it, renders, a, less, stable, protein])].
[sujeto(['Induction', of, the, p38, kinase, pathway, by, insulin, results, in, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'HNF-4alpha', protein, and, a, concomitant, induction, of, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', expression, that, is, blocked, by, inhibiting, the, p38, pathway])].
[sujeto(['By', using]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([somatic, mutagenesis, of, the, nuclear, receptor, liver, receptor, homolog, 1, '(', 'LRH-1)', in, mouse, 'hepatocytes,', we, demonstrate, here, that, 'LRH-1', critically, regulates, the, physicochemical, properties, of, 'BAs'])].
[sujeto(['The', absence, of, 'LRH-1', and, subsequent, deficiency, of, 'Cyp8b1', eliminate, the, production, of, cholic, acid, and, its, amino, acid, conjugate, taurocholic, acid, and]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, relative, amounts, of, less, amphipathic, 'BA', species])].
[sujeto(['Our', studies, unequivocally, demonstrate, a, pivotal, role, for, 'LRH-1', in, determining, the, composition, of, 'BAs,', 'which,', in, turn]), verbo([has]), complemento([major, consequences, on, 'whole-body', lipid, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['Liver', receptor, 'homolog-1', '(', 'LRH-1)', is, a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, controls, a, variety, of, metabolic, pathways])].
[sujeto(['In', cultured, 'cells,', 'LRH-1']), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'CYP7A1', and, 'CYP8B1,', key, enzymes, in, bile, salt, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['The', reason, for, this, apparent, paradox]), verbo([has]), complemento([remained, elusive])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', 'Cyp7a1', expression, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([rather, than, decreased, under, 'chow-fed', conditions, in, 'LRH-1-KD', mice])].
[sujeto(['This', coincided, with, a, significant, reduction, in, expression, of, intestinal, 'Fgf15,', a, suppressor, of, 'Cyp7a1', 'expression,', and, a, 58, '%']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, bile, salt, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['However,', when, fecal, bile, salt]), verbo([loss]), complemento([was, stimulated, by, feeding, the, bile, salt, sequestrant, 'colesevelam,', 'Cyp7a1', expression, was, 'up-regulated', in, wildtype, mice, but, not, in, 'LRH-1-KD', mice, '(', +, 593, '%', in, wildtype, versus, +, 9, '%', in, 'LRH-1-KD)'])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([translated]), complemento([into, an, increase, in, bile, salt, synthesis, of, +, 272, '%', in, wildtype, versus, +, 21, '%', in, 'LRH-1-KD', mice])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([mechanistic, insight, into, a, missing, link, in, the, maintenance, of, bile, salt, homeostasis, during, enhanced, fecal, loss, and, support, the, view, that, 'LRH-1', controls, 'Cyp7a1', expression, from, two, distinct, 'sites,', i])].
[sujeto(['Bile', acids, also, are, signaling, molecules, and, inflammatory, agents, that, rapidly]), verbo([activate]), complemento([nuclear, receptors, and, cell, signaling, pathways, that, regulate, 'lipid,', 'glucose,', and, energy, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'liver,', bile, acids]), verbo([activate]), complemento([a, nuclear, 'receptor,', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', that, induces, an, atypical, nuclear, receptor, small, heterodimer, 'partner,', which, subsequently, inhibits, nuclear, 'receptors,', 'liver-related', 'homolog-1,', and, hepatocyte, nuclear, factor, 4, alpha, and, results, in, inhibiting, transcription, of, the, critical, regulatory, gene, in, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'intestine,', 'FXR']), verbo([induces]), complemento([an, intestinal, 'hormone,', fibroblast, growth, factor, 15, '(', 'FGF15;', or, 'FGF19', in, 'human),', which, activates, hepatic, 'FGF', receptor, 4, '(', 'FGFR4)', signaling, to, inhibit, bile, acid, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanism, by, which, 'FXR/FGF19/FGFR4', signaling]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['CYP7A1', remains, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Bile', acids, are, able, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['FGF19', in, human, 'hepatocytes,', and, the, 'FGF19', autocrine, pathway, may, exist, in, the, human, livers])].
[sujeto(['Bile', acids, and, bile, acid, receptors, are, therapeutic]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, development, of, drugs, for, treatment, of, cholestatic, liver, 'diseases,', fatty, liver, 'diseases,', 'diabetes,', 'obesity,', and, metabolic, syndrome])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', bile, acid, '(', 'BA)', metabolism]), verbo([has]), complemento([become, a, therapeutic, focus, in, 'NASH', patients])].
[sujeto(['The', intrahepatic, expression, levels, of, genes]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'BA', metabolism, were, determined, by, quantitative, 'PCR', and, immunohistochemistry])].
[sujeto(['The', expression, levels, of, farnesoid, 'X', 'receptor,', liver, receptor, homolog, 1, ',', and, small, heterodimer, 'partner,', key, proteins, in, 'BA', 'synthesis,', significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([as, the, 'NAFLD', activity, score, '(', 'NAS)', increased, in, either, males, or, females])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', the, expression, levels, of, a, main, export, 'transporter,', bile, salt, export, pump, '(', 'BSEP),', significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([as, the, 'NAS', and, the, each, 'NAS', component, increased, in, both, genders])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([decreases]), complemento([of, 'BSEP', levels, were, also, observed, by, 'immunohistochemistry,', particularly, in, areas, with, pronounced, fatty, changes, in, cases, with, high, 'NAS'])].
[sujeto(['Such', 'down-regulation', may]), verbo([cause]), complemento([excessive, 'BA', levels, in, 'hepatocytes,', leading, to, cell, injury])].
[sujeto(['They', are, products, of, cholesterol, catabolism, and, ligands, for, some]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, regulating, crucial, metabolic, pathways])].
[sujeto(['The', main, enzyme]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([bile, acids, biosynthesis, is, 'CYP7A1', '(', 7, 'alpha-cholesterol', 'hydroxylase)'])].
[sujeto(['It', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, other, nuclear, receptors, like, 'SHP,', 'HNF-4alpha', or, 'LRH-1', and, bile, acids, 'themselves,', and, represses, 'CYP7A1', gene])].
[sujeto(['The', other, transcription, factors, that]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['CYP7A1', 'activity,', are, 'PXR,', 'VDR,', 'PPARalpha'])].
[sujeto(['The', main, activator, is, 'LXR', '(', in, 'rodents),']), verbo([increasing]), complemento(['CYP7A1', transcriptional, activity])].
[sujeto(['CYP7A1', activity]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, presence, of, insulin, and, glucocorticoids])].
[sujeto(['It', is, also]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, diurnal, rhythm])].
[sujeto(['alpha1-Antitrypsin', '(', 'alpha1-AT)', is, a, serum, protease, inhibitor, that, is]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([mainly, in, the, 'liver,', and, its, rate, of, synthesis, markedly, increases, in, response, to, inflammation])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'alpha1-AT', synthesis, results, in, an, increase, in, 'peptides,', like, its, 'carboxyl-terminal', 'C-36', peptide, '(', 'C-36),', resulting, from, 'alpha1-AT', cleavage, by, proteases])].
[sujeto(['Mice', injected, with, the, 'C-36', peptide, also, showed, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', mRNA])].
[sujeto(['A', mutated, but, very, similar, peptide, did, not]), verbo([have]), complemento([any, effect, on, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', mRNA, or, its, promoter])].
[sujeto(['The', 'DNA', element]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'C-36-mediated', regulation, of, 7, 'alpha-', and, 12, 'alpha-hydroxylase', promoters, mapped, to, the, 'alpha1-fetoprotein', transcription, factor, '(', 'FTF)', site, in, both, promoters])].
[sujeto(['The', 'C-36', peptide]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([binding, of, 'FTF', to, its, target, 'DNA', recognition, site, by, direct, interaction, with, 'FTF'])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesize, that, the, 'C-36', peptide, specifically]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'FTF', and, induces, a, conformational, change, that, results, in, loss, of, its, 'DNA', binding, 'ability,', which, results, in, suppression, of, 7, 'alpha-', and, 12, 'alpha-hydroxylase', transcription])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, peptides, derived, from, specific, serum, proteins, may, alter, hepatic, gene, expression, in, a, highly, specific, manner])].
[sujeto(['Cholesterol', 7, 'α-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', catalyzes, the, first, and, 'rate-limiting', step, in, the, classical, pathway, of, bile, acids, synthesis, in, liver, and, is, crucial, for]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([lipid, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['Hepatocyte']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, 4, α, '(', 'HNF4α)', and, 'α1-fetoprotein', transcription, factor, '(', 'FTF)', are, two, major, transcription, factors, driving, 'CYP7A1', promoter, activity, in, hepatocytes])].
[sujeto(['Previous', researches]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'Prospero-related', homeobox, '(', 'Prox1)', directly, interacts, with, both, 'HNF4α', and, 'FTF', and, potently, 'co-represses', 'CYP7A1', transcription, and, bile, acid, synthesis, through, unidentified, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'work,', mechanisms]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'Prox1-mediated', 'co-repression', were, explored, by, identifying, 'Prox1-associated', proteins, using, immunoprecipitation, followed, by, mass, spectrometry, '(', 'IP-MS)', methodology])].
[sujeto(['Multiple', components, of, the, epigenetically, repressive, 'lysine-specific', demethylase, 1, '(', 'LSD1)/nucleosome', remodeling, and, histone, deacetylase, '(', 'NuRD)', 'complex,', most, notably, 'LSD1', and, histone, deacetylase, 2, '(', 'HDAC2),', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, associated, with, 'Prox1', and, 'GST', pulldown, assay, demonstrated, that, 'Prox1', directly, interacts, with, 'LSD1'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', by, using, 'ChIP', assay, on, 'HepG2', cells, with, endogenous, 'Prox1', knocked, down, by, 'RNA', 'interference,', 'Prox1', was, shown, to]), verbo([recruit]), complemento(['LSD1', and, 'HDAC2', onto, 'CYP7A1', promoter, and, cause, increased, 'H3K4', demethylation])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', bile, acids, treatment, of, 'HepG2', 'cells,', which, significantly]), verbo([repressed]), complemento(['CYP7A1', 'transcription,', resulted, in, increased, 'Prox1', and, 'LSD1/NuRD', complex, occupancy, on, 'CYP7A1', promoter, with, a, concurrent, increase, in, 'H3K4', demethylation, and, 'H3/H4', deacetylation])].
[sujeto(['These', results, showed, that, 'Prox1']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'LSD1', to, recruit, the, repressive, 'LSD1/NuRD', complex, to, 'CYP7A1', promoter, and, 'co-represses', transcription, through, epigenetic, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', such, 'Prox1-mediated', epigenetic, repression, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, physiologically, essential, negative, feedback, inhibition, of, 'CYP7A1', transcription, by, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['The', liver, receptor, 'homolog-1', '(', 'LRH-1;', 'NR5A2)', belongs, to]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptor, 'superfamily,', and, is, expressed, mainly, in, the, 'liver,', 'intestine,', exocrine, 'pancreas,', and, ovary])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['DNA', as, a, 'monomer,', and, is, best, known, as, a, regulator, of, hepatic, expression, of, the, key, bile, acid, biosynthetic, enzyme, cholesterol, 7, alpha, hydroxylase, '(', 'Cyp7A1)'])].
[sujeto(['It', is, also]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, embryonic, stem, cells, and, the, initial, stages, of, embryonic, 'development,', and, the, very, early, lethality, of, 'LRH-1', knockout, mice, highlights, its, essential, developmental, role])].
[sujeto(['This', intriguing, discovery, raises, the, possibility, of, an, unexpected, new, class, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, signaling, 'molecules,', but, the, broader, functional, roles, of, 'LRH-1', and, these, new, ligands, remain, to, be, established])].
[sujeto(['Cholesteryl', ester, transfer, protein, '(', 'CETP)', is, a, key, protein]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, reverse, cholesterol, transport, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Transgenic', mice]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([human, 'CETP', under, the, control, of, its, natural, flanking, region, were, fed, 'low-', or, 'high-fat', diets, enriched, in, monounsaturated, fatty, acids, '(', 'MUFAs)', or, saturated, fatty, acids, in, the, presence, or, absence, of, cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['Addition', of, cholesterol, to, the, 'low-fat', 'MUFA', diet]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['CETP', activity, and, mRNA, 'expression,', whereas, addition, of, cholesterol, to, the, 'high-fat', 'MUFA', diet, led, to, a, decrease, in, 'CETP', activity, and, mRNA, expression])].
[sujeto(['In', 'SW', 872, 'cells,', oleic, acid, and, cholesterol]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento(['CETP', gene, expression, when, given, alone])].
[sujeto(['Cholesterol-mediated', stimulation, of, 'CETP']), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, transcription, factor, liver, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'LXRalpha)'])].
[sujeto(['High-fat', 'MUFA', diets]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'LXRalpha,', and, addition, of, cholesterol, to, the, 'high-fat', 'MUFA', diet, did, not, rescue, 'LXRalpha', expression])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', we, present, evidence, for, the, first, time, that, inhibition, of, 'LXRalpha', expression, by, a, 'high-fat', 'MUFA', diet]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, inhibition, of, 'CETP', stimulation, by, cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, lead, nitrate, '(', 'LN),', an, inducer, of, hepatic, tumor, necrosis, 'factor-alpha', '(', 'TNF-alpha),', downregulated, gene, expression, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase'])].
[sujeto(['Gene', expression, of, hepatic, 'Cyp7a1', in, both, 'WT', and, 'KO', mice]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([to, less, than, 5, '%', of, the, corresponding, controls, at, 6, -, 12, h, after, treatment, with, 'LN', '(', 100, 'mumol/kg', body, 'weight,', 'iv)'])].
[sujeto(['Levels', of, hepatic, 'TNF-alpha', protein, in, either, 'WT', or, 'KO', mice, were, below, the, detection, 'limit,', although, expression, levels, of, the, 'TNF-alpha', gene, markedly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([at, 6, h, in, 'WT', mice, by, 'LN', 'treatment,', but, not, in, 'KO', mice])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', in, both, 'WT', and, 'KO', 'mice,', levels, of, hepatic, 'IL-1beta', 'protein,', which, is, known, to, be, a, suppressor, of, the, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', gene, in, 'hamsters,', were, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([3, -, 6, h, after, 'LN', treatment])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'LN-induced', downregulation, of, the, 'Cyp7a1', gene, did, not, necessarily, result, from, altered, gene, expression, of, hepatic, transcription, 'factors,', including, positive, regulators, '(', liver, 'X', receptor, 'alpha,', retinoid, 'X', receptor, 'alpha,', fetoprotein, transcription, 'factor,', and, hepatocyte]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, 4, 'alpha)', and, a, negative, regulator, small, heterodimer, partner, responsible, for, expression, of, the, 'Cyp7a1', gene])].
[sujeto(['There', is, evidence, that, a]), verbo([soy]), complemento([protein, diet, prevents, the, overexpression, of, hepatic, 'sterol-regulatory', element, binding, 'protein-1', '(', 'SREBP-1),', decreasing, lipid, accumulation])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', the, aim, of, the, present, work, was, to, study, whether, a]), verbo([soy]), complemento([protein, diet, may, prevent, the, development, of, fatty, liver, through, the, regulation, of, transcription, factors, involved, in, lipid, metabolism, in, hyperinsulinemic, and, hyperleptinemic, 'Zucker', obese, 'fa/fa', rats])].
[sujeto(['Serum', and, hepatic, cholesterol, and, triglyceride, 'levels,', as, well, as, 'VLDL-triglyceride', and, 'LDL-cholesterol,', were, significantly, lower, in, rats, fed]), verbo([soy]), complemento([protein, than, in, rats, fed, a, casein, diet, for, 160, days])].
[sujeto(['The', reduction, in, hepatic, cholesterol, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, a, low, expression, of, liver, 'X', 'receptor-alpha', and, its, target, 'genes,', 7, -, alpha, hydroxylase, and, 'ABCA1'])].
[sujeto(['Soy', protein, also]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'SREBP-1', and, several, of, its, target, 'genes,', 'FAS,', 'stearoyl-CoA', 'desaturase-1,', and, delta5, and, delta6, 'desaturases,', decreasing, lipogenesis, even, in, the, presence, of, hyperinsulinemia])].
[sujeto(['Reduction', in, 'SREBP-1', was, not]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, presence, of, soy, isoflavones])].
[sujeto(['Finally,']), verbo([soy]), complemento([protein, reduced, 'SREBP-1', expression, in, 'adipocytes,', preventing, 'hypertrophy,', which, also, helps, prevent, the, development, of, hepatic, lipotoxicity])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR)', alpha, and, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', are, positive, and, negative, regulators, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', 'transcription,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['To', clarify, their, roles, in, the, regulation, of, 'CYP7A1', in, 'mice,', we, investigated, mRNA, expression, of, their]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, in, the, livers, of, 'C57BL/6', mice, fed, the, following, five, diets, for, 2, 'weeks:', a, standard, 'diet,', cholic, 'acid,', 'cholesterol,', 'cholesterol+high', 'fat,', or, an, atherogenic, diet, '(', cholic, 'acid+cholesterol+high', 'fat)'])].
[sujeto(['The', mRNA, level, of, 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, '(', 'ABC)', 'A1', 'gene,', one, of, 'LXRalpha']), verbo([target]), complemento(['genes,', significantly, increased, on, the, diets, containing, cholic, acid, 'and/or', 'cholesterol+high', 'fat,', but, not, on, the, diet, containing, cholesterol, alone])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', the, mRNA, levels, of, the, 'FXR']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, 'ABCB11,', 'ABCC2,', and, short, heterodimer, partner, increased, only, on, the, diet, containing, cholic, acid, with, or, without, 'cholesterol+high', fat])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', in, the, atherogenic, 'diet-fed', 'mice,', cholic, acid, component, is, needed, for, the, 'FXR', 'activation,', and, 'FXR', dominantly]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['CYP7A1', transcription])].
[sujeto(['Peroxisome', 'proliferator-activated', receptor, gamma, 'coactivator-1alpha', '(', 'PGC-1alpha)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, play, an, important, role, in, energy, metabolism, by, coordinating, transcriptional, programs, involved, in, mitochondrial, 'biogenesis,', adaptive, 'thermogenesis,', 'gluconeogenesis,', and, fatty, acid, oxidation])].
[sujeto(['PGC-1alpha', also, plays, a, crucial, role, in, cholesterol, metabolism, by, serving, as, a, coactivator, of, the, liver, 'X', 'receptor-alpha', and]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([the, expression, of, cholesterol, 7, -, 'alpha-hydroxylase'])].
[sujeto(['Transient', cotransfection, assays, demonstrate, that, 'PGC-1alpha']), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['ligand-mediated', 'FXR', transcription, when, either, 'full-length', 'FXR', or, 'Gal4', 'DNA', binding, 'domain-FXR-ligand', binding, domain, chimeras, were, analyzed])].
[sujeto(['PGC-1alpha-mediated', coactivation, of, 'FXR', was, highly, 'ligand-dependent', and, absolutely]), verbo([required]), complemento([an, intact, activation, 'function-2', '(', 'AF-2)', domain, of, 'FXR', and, the, 'LXXLL', motif, in, 'PGC-1alpha'])].
[sujeto(['The', integrity, of, the, charge, clamp, was, 'required,', further, illustrating, the, role, of, the, ligand]), verbo([binding]), complemento([domain, of, 'FXR', in, 'PGC-1alpha', recognition])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, results, indicate, that, 'PGC-1alpha', functions, as, a, potent, coactivator, for, 'FXR', and, further, implicates, its, role, in, the, regulation, of, genes, that, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, bile, acid, and, lipid, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['The', expression, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7alpha),', the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, the, catabolism, of, cholesterol, to, bile, 'acid,', is]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, oxysterol, 'receptor,', liver, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'LXRalpha)', and, negatively, regulated, by, a, bile, acid, 'receptor,', farnesoid, 'X', receptor])].
[sujeto(['In', 'co-transfection', experiments, in, 'HepG2', 'cells,', 'VDR']), verbo([repressed]), complemento([the, activity, of, rat, 'CYP7alpha', promoter, in, a, 'ligand-dependent', manner, through, inhibition, of, 'LXRalpha', signaling])].
[sujeto(['We', also, confirmed, the, ability, of, 'VDR', to]), verbo([repress]), complemento(['LXRalpha', transcriptional, activation, using, a, synthetic, 'LXRalpha', responsive, reporter])].
[sujeto(['Deletion', analyses, revealed, that, the, 'ligand-binding', domain, of, 'VDR', was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, suppression, and, the, 'DNA-binding', domain, was, dispensable])].
[sujeto(['Given', the, fact, that, 'VDR', can, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, the, secondary, bile, acid, as, well, as, 1, ',', 25, -, '(', 'OH)(2)D3,', the, crosstalk, between, 'LXRalpha', and, 'VDR', signaling, in, regulation, of, bile, acid, metabolism, provides, a, possible, contribution, of, 'VDR', to, modulate, bile, acid, and, cholesterol, 'homeostasis,', and, highlights, a, physiological, function, of, 'VDR', beyond, calcium, metabolism, in, the, body])].
[sujeto(['Constitutive', expression, of, a, 'cholesterol-7alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', transgene, in, 'LDL', 'receptor-deficient', mice, blocked, the, ability, of, a, 'cholesterol-enriched', diet, to]), verbo([increase]), complemento([plasma, levels, of, apolipoprotein, 'B-containing', lipoproteins])].
[sujeto(['LDL', 'receptor-deficient', mice]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([the, 'CYP7A1', transgene, exhibited, complete, resistance, to, 'diet-induced', hypercholesterolemia, and, to, the, accumulation, of, cholesterol, in, the, liver])].
[sujeto(['Hepatic', mRNA, expression, of, liver, 'X', 'receptor-inducible', 'ABCG5', and, 'ABCG8', was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, 'CYP7A1', 'transgenic,', 'LDL', 'receptor-deficient', mice, fed, a, 'cholesterol-enriched', diet])].
[sujeto(['Thus,']), verbo([increased]), complemento([biliary, cholesterol, excretion, could, not, account, for, the, maintenance, of, cholesterol, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['CYP7A1', 'transgenic,', 'LDL', 'receptor-deficient', mice, fed, the, 'cholesterol-enriched', diet, exhibited]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([jejunal, 'Niemann-Pick', 'C1-Like', 1, protein, '(', 'NPC1L1)', mRNA, 'expression,', an, important, mediator, of, intestinal, cholesterol, absorption])].
[sujeto(['A', 'taurocholate-enriched', diet, also]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['NPC1L1', mRNA, expression, in, a, farnesoid, 'X', 'receptor-independent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Reduced', expression, of, 'NPC1L1', mRNA, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, decreased, cholesterol, absorption, '(', approximately, 20, '%', ;, 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')', exhibited, by, 'CYP7A1', transgenic, 'LDL', 'receptor-deficient', mice, fed, the, 'cholesterol-enriched', diet])].
[sujeto(['The', combined, data, show, that]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([expression, of, 'CYP7A1', is, an, effective, means, to, prevent, the, accumulation, of, cholesterol, in, the, liver, and, of, atherogenic, apolipoprotein, 'B-containing', lipoproteins, in, plasma])].
[sujeto(['The', orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, 'FXR', and, 'LXRalpha', have, become, challenging, targets, for, the, discovery, of, new, therapeutic, agents])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'FXR', and, 'LXRalpha;', are, thought, to, play, a, major, role, in, the, control, of, cholesterol, catabolism, by]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, expression, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', the, rate, limiting, enzyme, of, bile, acid, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['Reverse', cholesterol, transport, might, also, be, affected, by, 'FXR', and, 'LXR', since, they, control, the, expression, of, 'PLTP', and, 'CETP,', two, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, transfer, of, 'phospholipid,', cholesterol, and, cholesteryl, esters, among, plasma, lipoproteins])].
[sujeto(['A', new, class, of, potent, synthetic, activators, of, 'FXR,', the, 1, ',', 1, -, bisphosphonate, 'esters,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, discovered, which, up, regulate, the, 'Intestinal', 'Bile', 'Acid', 'Binding', 'Protein', gene, '(', 'I-BABP)', as, demonstrated, for, chenodeoxycholic, 'acid,', however, there, are, no, known, synthetic, activators, yet, identified, for, 'LXRalpha'])].
[sujeto(['The', evaluation, of, 'FXR', as, a, potential]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, the, development, of, drugs, affecting, plasma, cholesterol, can, take, advantage, of, the, fact, that, the, activators, of, 'FXR', '(', 'farnesol,', bile, acids, and, the, 1, ',', 1, -, bisphosphonate, 'esters)', have, been, studied, in, various, in, vitro, and, in, vivo, models])].
[sujeto(['Administration', of, chenodeoxycholic, acid, to, animals, and, man, did, not, result, in, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, plasma, cholesterol, expected, from, a, decrease, in, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', expression])].
[sujeto(['Like', 'farnesol,', the, 1, ',', 1, -, bisphosphonate, esters]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, rate, of, degradation, of, 'HMGCoA', reductase, and, have, the, unexpected, property, of, inducing, hypocholesterolemia, in, normal, animals])].
[sujeto(['The', natural, and, synthetic, 'FXR', agonists]), verbo([trigger]), complemento(['differentiation,', inhibit, cell, proliferation, and, are, potent, inducers, of, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Thyroid', hormone, '(', 'T3)', influences, hepatic, cholesterol, 'metabolism,', and, previous, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([established, an, important, role, of, this, hormone, in, the, regulation, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A),', the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, the, synthesis, of, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['Fibroblast', growth, factor]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, definition, of, liver, from, foregut, endoderm, where, 'FGFR4', is, expressed, and, stimulation, of, hepatocyte, 'DNA', synthesis, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['Cholesterol-', and, bile, 'acid-controlled', liver, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', the, limiting, enzyme, for, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', was, 'elevated,', unresponsive, to, dietary, 'cholesterol,', but]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([normally, by, dietary, cholate])].
[sujeto(['Expression', pattern, and, 'cholate-dependent,', 'cholesterol-induced', hepatomegaly, in, the, 'FGFR4', '(', -, /, -, ')', mice]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, activation, of, receptor, interacting, protein, 140, ',', a, 'co-repressor', of, 'feed-forward', activator, liver, 'X', receptor, 'alpha,', may, mediate, the, negative, regulation, of, 'cholesterol-', and, bile, 'acid-controlled', liver, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', transcription, by, 'FGFR4', and, cholate])].
[sujeto(['The', results, demonstrate, that, transmembrane, sensors, interface, with, 'metabolite-controlled', transcription, networks, and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, pericellular, 'matrix-controlled', liver, 'FGFR4', in, particular, may, ensure, adequate, cholesterol, for, cell, structures, and, signal, transduction])].
[sujeto(['Cholesterol', biosynthesis, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, transcription, factors, named, steroid, regulatory, 'element-binding', proteins])].
[sujeto(['A', newly, discovered, transcription, 'factor,', 'LXR,']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, catabolic, degradation, of, cholesterol, by, activation, of, the, gene, controlling, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, the, formation, of, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['Excessive', dietary, cholesterol]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, increased, oxysterol, formation])].
[sujeto(['Oxysterol']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'LXR', and, thereby, induces, transcription, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', thus, increasing, the, removal, of, cholesterol, as, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['Initially,', we, observed, that, up, to, 40, '%', of, the, overall, transcriptional, activity, of, the, promoter, in, 'HepG2', cells, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'DNA', sequences, from, -, 65, to, -, 1, of, the, human, gene])].
[sujeto(['Within', this, 'region,', a]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, for, the, 'liver-enriched', transcription, factor, 'HNF-1', '(', -, 56, to, -, 49, ')', has, been, identified])].
[sujeto(['Binding', of, 'HNF-1', to, this, site]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, transcriptional, activation, of, the, human, promoter])].
[sujeto(['The', corresponding, segment, from, the, rat, 'CYP7A1', gene, does, not]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['HNF-1;', 'instead,', it, is, bound, by, the, orphan, receptors, 'ARP-1', '(', 'COUP-TFII)', and, 'LXRalpha,', that, are, implicated, in, dietary, regulation])].
[sujeto(['LXRalpha', and, -, beta, are]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, that, regulate, the, metabolism, of, several, important, 'lipids,', including, cholesterol, and, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([proposed, that, 'LXRs', regulate, these, pathways, through, their, interaction, with, 'specific,', naturally, occurring, 'oxysterols,', including, 22, '(', 'R)-hydroxycholesterol,', 24, '(', 'S)-hydroxycholesterol,', and, 24, '(', 'S),25-epoxycholesterol'])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, ligand]), verbo([binding]), complemento([assay, that, incorporates, scintillation, proximity, technology, to, circumvent, many, of, the, problems, associated, with, assaying, extremely, hydrophobic, 'ligands,', we, now, demonstrate, that, these, oxysterols, bind, directly, to, 'LXRs', at, concentrations, that, occur, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['To', characterize, further, the, structural, determinants]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, potent, 'LXR', 'ligands,', we, synthesized, and, tested, a, series, of, related, compounds, for, binding, to, 'LXRs', and, activation, of, transcription])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, revealed, that, 'position-specific', monooxidation, of, the, sterol, side, chain, is, requisite, for, 'LXR', 'high-affinity']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, activation])].
[sujeto(['Enhanced']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, activation, can, also, be, achieved, through, the, use, of, 24, -, oxo, ligands, that, act, as, hydrogen, bond, acceptors, in, the, side, chain])].
[sujeto(['Accumulation', of, cholesterol]), verbo([causes]), complemento([both, repression, of, genes, controlling, cholesterol, biosynthesis, and, cellular, uptake, and, induction, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', which, leads, to, the, removal, of, cholesterol, by, increased, metabolism, to, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'LXRalpha', and, 'LXRbeta,', two, orphan, members, of, the, nuclear, receptor, 'superfamily,', are, activated, by, 24, '(', 'S),', 25, -, epoxycholesterol, and, 24, '(', 'S)-hydroxycholesterol', at, physiologic, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, an, 'LXR', response, element, in, the, promoter, region, of, the, rat, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', gene])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, for, a, new, hormonal, signaling, pathway, that, activates, transcription, in, response, to, oxysterols, and, suggest, that, 'LXRs', play, a, critical, role, in, the, regulation, of, cholesterol, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['We', investigated, how, cholesterol, feeding]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', via, the, nuclear, receptors, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', and, liver, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'LXRalpha)', in, 'New', 'Zealand', white, rabbits])].
[sujeto(['After', 1, day, of, 2, '%', cholesterol, 'feeding,', when, the, bile, acid, pool, size, had, not, 'expanded,', mRNA, levels, of, the, 'FXR']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, 'short-heterodimer', partner, '(', 'SHP)', and, sterol, 12, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP8B)', were, 'unchanged,', indicating, that, 'FXR', activation, remained, constant])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, mRNA, levels, of, the, 'LXRalpha']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, 'ATP', binding, cassette, transporter, 'A1', '(', 'ABCA1)', and, cholesteryl, ester, transfer, protein, '(', 'CETP)', increased, 5, -, fold, and, 2.3, -, 'fold,', 'respectively,', associated, with, significant, increases, in, hepatic, concentrations, of, oxysterols])].
[sujeto(['Activity', and, mRNA, levels, of, 'CYP7A1']), verbo([increased]), complemento([2.4, times, and, 2.2, 'times,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['After', 10, days, of, cholesterol, 'feeding,', the, bile, acid, pool, size]), verbo([increased]), complemento([nearly, 2, -, fold])].
[sujeto(['SHP', mRNA, levels]), verbo([increased]), complemento([4.1, -, fold, while, 'CYP8B', declined, 64, '%'])].
[sujeto(['Activity', and, mRNA, of, 'CYP7A1']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([60, '%', and, 90, '%', ',', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Feeding', cholesterol, for, 1, day, did, not, enlarge, the, ligand, pool, size, or, change, 'FXR', 'activation,', while, 'LXRalpha', was]), verbo([activated]), complemento([highly, secondary, to, increased, hepatic, oxysterols])].
[sujeto(['After', 10, days, of, cholesterol, 'feeding,', the, bile, acid, '(', 'FXR', 'ligand)', pool, size, 'increased,', which]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['FXR', and, inhibited, 'CYP7A1', despite, continued, activation, of, 'LXRalpha'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', in, 'rabbits,', when, 'FXR', and, 'LXRalpha', are]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['simultaneously,', the, inhibitory, effect, of, 'FXR', overrides, the, stimulatory, effect, of, 'LXRalpha', to, suppress, 'CYP7A1', mRNA, expression])].
[sujeto(['In', rodent, 'liver,', transcription, of, the, gene, encoding, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1),', which, catalyzes, the, 'rate-limiting', step, in, the, classic, bile, acid, synthetic, 'pathway,', is]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, the, liver, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'LXRalpha),', a, nuclear, receptor, for, oxysterol, metabolites, of, cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['This', 'feed-forward', regulatory, loop]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, mechanism, for, the, elimination, of, excess, cholesterol, from, the, body])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'report,', we, demonstrate, that, in, primary, cultures, of, human, 'hepatocytes,', activation, of, 'LXRalpha']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, opposite, 'effect,', repressing, 'CYP7A1', expression])].
[sujeto(['This', repression, is, 'mediated,', at, least, in, 'part,', through, induction, of, the, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['receptor,', short, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP),', which, is, also, induced, by, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, 'SHP', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([directly, by, 'LXRalpha', through, a, 'DNA', response, element, that, overlaps, with, the, previously, characterized, bile, acid, response, element])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, fundamental, difference, in, the, regulation, of, 'CYP7A1', in, rodent, and, human, hepatocytes, and, provide, evidence, that, different, species, employ, distinct, molecular, strategies, to, regulate, cholesterol, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['Cholesterol', 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'cyp7a)']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([cholesterol, elimination, in, the, liver, by, catalyzing, the, first, and, 'rate-limiting', step, in, the, conversion, of, cholesterol, into, bile, acids])].
[sujeto(['Peroxisome', 'proliferator-activated', receptor, alpha, '(', 'PPARalpha;', 'NR1C1)', and, liver, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'LXRalpha;', 'NR1H3)', are, two]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, that, stimulate, the, murine, 'Cyp7a1', gene])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'co-expression', of, 'PPARalpha', and, 'LXRalpha', in, hepatoma, cells, abolishes, the, stimulation, of, 'Cyp7a1', gene, promoter, in, response, to, their, respective, agonists])].
[sujeto(['PPARalpha', and, 'LXRalpha', form, an, atypical, heterodimer, that]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, two, directly, adjacent, hexameric, sequences, localized, within, overlapping, 'PPARalpha', and, 'LXRalpha', response, elements, '(', termed, 'Site', 'I),', antagonizing, the, interaction, of, 'PPARalpha:retinoid', 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'RXRalpha)', or, 'RXRalpha:LXRalpha', with, the, 'Cyp7a1', gene, promoter])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', within, either, hexameric, sequences, that, specifically, abolished, 'LXRalpha:PPARalpha', heterodimer]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, murine, 'Cyp7a1', 'Site', 'I', also, relieved, promoter, inhibition])].
[sujeto(['The', 'LXRalpha:PPARalpha', heterodimer, may, be, important, in, coordinating, the, expression, of, genes, that, encode, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, metabolism, of, fats, and, cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['The', liver, 'X', 'receptors,', 'LXRalpha', and, 'LXRbeta,', are, members, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, superfamily])].
[sujeto(['Originally', identified, as, 'orphans,', both, receptor, subtypes]), verbo([have]), complemento([since, been, shown, to, be, activated, by, naturally, occurring, oxysterols])].
[sujeto(['LXRalpha', knockout, mice, fail, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([cyp7a, mRNA, levels, upon, cholesterol, 'feeding,', implicating, the, role, of, this, receptor, in, cholesterol, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['LXR', activation, also]), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, expression, of, the, lipid, pump, involved, in, cholesterol, 'efflux,', the, gene, encoding, 'ATP', binding, cassette, protein, 'A1', '(', 'ABCA1)'])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', 'LXR', is, believed, to, be, a, sensor, of, cholesterol, levels, and, a, potential, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, atherosclerosis])].
[sujeto(['F(3)MethylAA', is, capable, not, only, of]), verbo([inducing]), complemento(['ABCA1', mRNA, 'levels,', but, also, increasing, cholesterol, efflux, from, 'THP-1', macrophages])].
[sujeto(['In', rat, 'hepatocytes,', 'F(3)MethylAA']), verbo([induced]), complemento([cyp7a, 'mRNA,', confirming, conclusions, from, the, knockout, mouse, studies])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', in, rat, in, vivo, 'studies,', 'F(3)MethylAA']), verbo([induced]), complemento([liver, cyp7a, mRNA, and, enzyme, activity])].
[sujeto(['A', critical, species, difference, is, also]), verbo([reported]), complemento([in, that, neither, 'F(3)MethylAA', nor, 22, '(', 'R)-hydroxycholesterol', induced, cyp7a, in, human, primary, hepatocytes])].
[sujeto(['However,', other, 'LXR']), verbo([target]), complemento(['genes,', 'ABCA1,', 'ABCG1,', and, 'SREBP1,', were, regulated])].
[sujeto(['The', in, vivo, role, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, 'SHP', in, feedback, regulation, of, bile, acid, synthesis, was, examined])].
[sujeto(['Loss', of, 'SHP', in, mice]), verbo([caused]), complemento([abnormal, accumulation, and, increased, synthesis, of, bile, acids, due, to, derepression, of, 'rate-limiting', 'CYP7A1', and, 'CYP8B1', hydroxylase, enzymes, in, the, biosynthetic, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Dietary', bile, acids]), verbo([induced]), complemento([liver, damage, and, restored, feedback, regulation])].
[sujeto(['A', synthetic, agonist, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, 'FXR', was, not, hepatotoxic, and, had, no, regulatory, effects])].
[sujeto(['Reduction', of, the, bile, acid, pool, with, cholestyramine]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['CYP7A1', and, 'CYP8B1', expression])].
[sujeto(['One', is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'SHP,', and, two, are, 'SHP', independent, and, invoked, by, liver, damage, and, changes, in, bile, acid, pool, size])].
[sujeto(['Dietary', cholesterol]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento(['CYP7A1', transcription, via, activation, of, oxysterol, 'receptor,', 'LXR', 'alpha,', whereas, bile, acids, repress, transcription, through, 'FXR-mediated', induction, of, 'SHP', protein])].
[sujeto(['The', aim, of, this, study, was, to, determine, the, quantitative, role, that, 'LXR-', and, 'FXR-regulated', pathways, play, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['CYP7A1', and, 'SHP', in, both, rat, and, hamster, models])].
[sujeto(['The', inability, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['CYP7A1', mRNA, levels, by, cholesterol, feeding, in, hamsters, led, to, a, decline, in, 'SHP', mRNA, levels])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, under, conditions, of, both, 'SHP', and, 'LXR', alpha, 'activation,', stimulatory, effect, of, 'LXR', alpha, overrides, the, inhibitory, effect, of, 'FXR', and, results, in, an, induction, of, rat, 'CYP7A1', mRNA, levels])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, revealed, elevated, expression, levels, in, 'B6By', liver, for, key, bile, acid, synthesis, 'proteins,', including, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', and, 'sterol-27-hydroxylase,', and, the, oxysterol]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, liver, 'X', receptor, alpha])].
[sujeto(['Expression', levels, for, several, other, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, bile, acid, metabolism, were, subsequently, found, to, differ, between, 'B6By', and, 'B6J', 'mice,', including, the, bile, acid, receptor, farnesoid, 'X', 'receptor,', oxysterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', 'sterol-12alpha-hydroxylase,', and, hepatic, bile, acid, transporters, on, both, sinusoidal, and, canalicular, membranes])].
[sujeto(['The', overall, expression, profile, of, the, 'B6By', strain]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([a, higher, rate, of, bile, acid, synthesis, and, transport, in, these, mice])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, this, 'interpretation,', fecal, bile, acid, excretion, is]), verbo([increased]), complemento([2, -, fold, in, 'B6By', 'mice,', and, bile, acid, levels, in, blood, and, urine, are, elevated, 3, -, and, 18, -, 'fold,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Genetic', analysis, of, serum, bile, acid, levels, revealed, 'co-segregation', with, 'Diet1,', indicating, that, this, locus, is, likely, responsible, for, both]), verbo([increased]), complemento([bile, acid, excretion, and, resistance, to, hypercholesterolemia, in, 'B6By', mice])].
[sujeto(['Excessive', inorganic, phosphate, '(', 'Pi)', intake, and, hyperphosphatemia]), verbo([have]), complemento([both, been, speculated, to, be, risk, factors, for, cardiovascular, disease, and, 'hypercholesterolemia,', and, dysregulation, of, cholesterol, metabolism, can, lead, to, atherosclerosis])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, relationship, between, 'Pi', and, cholesterol, metabolism]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, investigated, in, detail])].
[sujeto(['Our', recent, study, showed, that, triiodothyronine, can]), verbo([induce]), complemento([both, hyperphosphatemia, and, hypocholesterolemia, in, mice])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', dietary, 'Pi', restriction, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['high-cholesterol', 'diet-induced', hepatic, lipid, accumulation])].
[sujeto(['Real-time', polymerase, chain, reaction, analysis, revealed, that, dietary, 'Pi', restriction]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([expression, of, hepatic, genes, involved, in, cholesterol, metabolism, and, fatty, acid, biosynthesis])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', hepatic, messenger, 'RNA', levels, of, several, transcription, factors, including, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptors, and, liver, 'X', receptor, were, markedly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([by, 'Pi', restriction])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, there, was, a, significant, negative, correlation, between, plasma, levels, of, 'Pi', and, total, cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, dietary, 'Pi', plays, an, important, role, in, the, development, of, fatty, liver, disease, and, hyperlipidemia, induced, by, a, 'high-cholesterol', diet, through, regulation, of, lipid, 'metabolism-related', gene, expression, in, the, liver])].
[sujeto(['RP']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, activity, and, mRNA, level, of, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase,', whereas, 'acyl-CoA:cholesterol', acyltransferase, activity, and, gene, expression, were, significantly, depressed, with, consumption, of, 'RP'])].
[sujeto(['The', gene, expression, of, the, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, α, and, liver, 'X', receptor, α, were, significantly]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, consumption, of, 'RP'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['RP', can, induce, a, 'cholesterol-lowering', effect, through, modifying, cholesterol, 'metabolism-related', gene, expression, and, enzyme, activity, in, adult, rats])].
[sujeto([')', diets]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([dietary, cholesterol, and, introduces, phytosterols])].
[sujeto(['Replacing', '≥\240\70\240\%', of, 'FM', with, 'PP', and, '≥\240\70\240\%', of, 'FO', with, either, a, 'VO', blend, or, rapeseed, oil]), verbo([increased]), complemento([plasma, and, liver, 'TAG', concentrations])].

[sujeto(['However,', there, was, no, difference, in, 'liver,', and, '(', 3, ')', 'H-tracer', of, intestinal, wall, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, 43, '%', for, male, and, 27, '%', for, female])].
[sujeto(['Meanwhile,', 'Western', 'Blot', analysis, showed, the, expressions, of, reverse, cholesterol, transport, -, related, protein, liver, 'X', receptor, α, '(', 'LXRα),', 'ATP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([cassette, transporter, 'A1,', and, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', 'A1', were, upregulated, in, liver, of, phospholipid, transfer, protein, 'KO', mice, compared, with, 'WT', mice])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, systemic, phospholipid, transfer, protein, deficiency, in, mice, impairs, 'macrophage-specific', reverse, cholesterol, transport, 'in\240\vivo'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([recruited]), complemento([30, patients, with, type, 'II', 'DM', '(', including, 15, patients, complicated, with, coronary, heart, disease, and, 15, patients, with, 'DM', 'only)', and, 15, normal, controls, for, this, study])].
[sujeto(['We', determined, that, the, expression, levels, of, macrophage, 'CYP7A1', mRNA, and, protein, in, the, type, 'II', 'DM', group, were, significantly, lower, than, those, in, the, control, 'group,', but, no, differences, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, 'ABCG5', and, 'LXRβ', expression, levels, between, the, groups])].
[sujeto(['The', macrophage, cholesterol, efflux, rate, in, the, patients, with, type, 'II', 'DM', was, also, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([compared, with, that, of, the, normal, control, subjects, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'summary,', this, study, demonstrated, that, the, macrophage, cholesterol, efflux, in, patients, with, type, 'II', 'DM', was, significantly, 'reduced,', and, that, this, reduction, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, 'down-regulation', of, 'CYP7A1', expression])].
[sujeto(['Group', with, higher, dose, of, 'RVS', extract, showed, a, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([body, weight, compared, with, western, diet, fed, mice, groups])].
[sujeto(['Next,', synthesis, of, hepatic, bile, acids, were, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'RVS', extract, fed, groups])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'RVS', extracts, significantly]), verbo([increase]), complemento([promoter, activity, of, 'Cyp7a1', via, 'up-regulate', the, transcriptional, expression, level, of, 'LXRα'])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'RVS', extracts, could, be, a, potent, therapeutic, ingredient, for, prevent, a, hyperlipidemia, via, increase, of, bile, acids, biosynthesis])].
[sujeto(['The', expression, levels, and, enzyme, activity, of, 'LXRα', and, 'CYP7α1']), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, conjunction, with, decreases, in, 'TG', and, 'TC', concentrations, following, probiotic, supplementation, to, a, maximum, at, 1000, '\240\mg', 'probiotics/kg', and, decreased, thereafter])].
[sujeto(['It', is, concluded, that, dietary, probiotics, can]), verbo([enhance]), complemento(['LXRα', and, 'CYP7α1', enzyme, activities, in, the, liver, and, reduce, lipid, concentrations, and, fat, deposition, in, ducks])].
[sujeto(['The', expressions, of, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cholesterol, 'regulation,', including, 'low-density', lipoprotein, receptor, '(', 'LDLR),', scavenger, receptor, class, 'B', type, 'I', '(', 'SR-BI),', 3, -, 'hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl', coenzyme, 'A', reductase, '(', 'HMGCR),', cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1),', 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, '(', 'ABC)', 'A1,', and, 'ABCG1/5/8,', were, measured, in, liver, tissues, from, five, of, these, patients])].
[sujeto(['Liver', cholesterol, was, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([compared, with, 'controls,', and, correlated, with, bile, acid, contents])].
[sujeto(['SHP', and, 'LXRα', mRNA, expression, was, also, 'increased,', but, maturation, of, 'SREBP2', was, not]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([in, the, patients])].
[sujeto(['The', major, upregulators, of, liver, cholesterol, might, be]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'AGS', 'patients,', indicating, an, impaired, negative, feedback, mechanism, and, accelerated, liver, cholesterol, accumulation])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, affirmed, that, supplementation, of, 1, or, 2, '%', mung, bean, could]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([plasma, total, cholesterol, and, triacylglycerol, level])].
[sujeto(['Mung', bean]), verbo([increased]), complemento([mRNA, 3, -, 'hydroxy-3-methyl-glutaryl-coenzyme', 'A', reductase])].
[sujeto(['Most', 'importantly,', mung, bean]), verbo([increased]), complemento([not, only, the, protein, level, of, 'cholesterol-7α-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', but, also, mRNA, 'CYP7A1'])].
[sujeto(['It', was, concluded, that, the, hypocholesterolemic, activity, of, mung, bean, was, most, probable]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, enhancement, of, bile, acid, excretion, and, 'up-regulation', of, 'CYP7A1'])].
[sujeto(['Nuclear', receptors, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, regulating, the, expression, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1),', 'however,', their, roles, in, the, 'up-regulation', of, 'CYP7A1', by, cholestyramine, '(', 'CSR)', are, still, unclear])].
[sujeto(['Cholestyramine']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([serum, and, liver, cholesterol, levels, significantly, in, rats, fed, 'C-based', 'diets,', but, had, no, effect, on, these, parameters, in, rats, fed, 'H-based', diets])].
[sujeto(['The', gene, expression, of, hepatic, 'ATP-binding', cassettes, 'A1', and, 'G5,']), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR),', were, unchanged, and, 'down-regulated', by, 'cholestyramine,', respectively])].

[sujeto(['C-based', 'diets,', which, contained, cholesterol, and, cholic, 'acid,']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['SHP', mRNA, levels, compared, to, 'H-based', diets])].
[sujeto(['Consequently,', in, rats, fed, the, 'C+CSR', 'diet,', hepatic, 'FXR', was]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, dietary, bile, 'acids,', but, the, hepatic, 'CYP7A1', mRNA, level, was, increased, 16, -, fold, compared, to, that, in, rats, fed, an, 'H', diet])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, cholestyramine, 'up-regulates', the, expression, of, 'CYP7A1', independently, via, 'LXR-', or, 'FXR-mediated', pathways, in, rats])].
[sujeto(['Transcription', of, the, gene, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, the, size, of, the, bile, acid, pool, and, dietary, and, hormonal, factors])].
[sujeto(['The', mice, '(', 'mCYP7A1(-/-)/hCYP7A1)']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([the, human, gene, at, much, higher, levels, than, did, the, transgenics, bred, in, the, 'wild-type', background])].
[sujeto(['Cholestyramine', '(', 5, '%', ')']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, level, of, expression, of, the, human, gene, and, the, mouse, gene])].
[sujeto(['A', diet, containing, 2, '%', cholesterol]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, the, mouse, gene, in, 'wild-type', 'mice,', but, it, did, not, affect, expression, of, the, human, gene, in, 'mCYP7A1(-/-)/hCYP7A1', mice])].
[sujeto(['None', of, the, diets, altered, the, serum, cholesterol, or, triglyceride, levels, in, these, 'mice;', 1, '%', cholic, acid]), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, redistribution, of, cholesterol, from, the, high, density, lipoprotein, to, the, low, density, lipoprotein, density, in, the, humanized, mice, but, not, in, 'wild-type', mice])].
[sujeto(['A', diet, containing, 30, '%', saturated, fat, and, 2, '%', cholesterol]), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, decrease, in, 'CYP7A1', levels, in, 'mCYP7A1(-/-)/hCYP7A1', mice])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increase]), complemento([was, greater, in, the, 'mCYP7A1(-/-)/hCYP7A1', mice])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, lack, of, an, 'LXR', element, in, the, region, from, -, 56, to, -, 49, of, the, human, 'CYP7A1', promoter, may, account, for, some, of, the, differences, in, response, to, diets, between, humans, and, rodents])].
[sujeto(['The', production, of, apolipoprotein, 'B', '(', 'apoB)-containing', lipoproteins, by, the, liver, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, a, complex, series, of, processes, involving, apoB, being, cotranslationally, translocated, across, the, endoplasmic, reticulum, and, assembled, into, a, lipoprotein, particle])].
[sujeto(['Studies', in, cultured, cells, and, transgenic, mice, indicate, that, the, expression, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', indirectly]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, lipogenic, enzymes, through, changes, in, the, cellular, content, of, mature, sterol, response, element, binding, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Oxysterols', and, bile, acids, may, also]), verbo([act]), complemento([via, the, 'ligand-activated', nuclear, receptors, 'LXR', and, 'FXR', to, link, the, metabolic, pathways, controlling, energy, balance, and, lipid, metabolism, to, nutritional, state])].
[sujeto(['Oxysterol', 'receptor,', 'LXR,', 'stimulates,', whereas, the, bile, acid, 'receptor,', 'FXR,']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['CYP7A1', transcription])].
[sujeto(['Cotransfection', with, 'LXRalpha', and, 'RXRalpha', expression, plasmids, strongly]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([rat, 'CYP7A1/luciferase', reporter, activity, in, 'HepG2', cells, and, oxysterol, was, not, required])].
[sujeto(['In', 'Chinese', hamster, ovary, 'cells,', cotransfection, with, 'LXRalpha']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([reporter, activity, by, less, than, 2, -, fold, and, addition, of, 22, '(', 'R)-hydroxycholesterol', caused, a, small, but, significant, stimulation, of, 'rat,', human, and, hamster, 'CYP7A1', promoter, activity])].
[sujeto(['At', least, two, direct, repeats, of, 'AGGTCA-like', sequences, with, 4, -, base, spacing, '(', 'DR4)', and, 'five-base', spacing, '(', 'DR5),', in, previously, identified, bile, acid, response, elements, of, the, rat, 'CYP7A1', were, able, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['LXRalpha/RXRalpha', and, confer, 'LXRalpha', stimulation])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'LXRalpha', did, not]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, the, corresponding, sequences, of, the, human, gene, and, bound, weakly, to, hamster, and, mouse, 'DR4', sequences])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', rats, and, mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, unusual, capacity, to, convert, cholesterol, to, bile, acids, by, 'LXRalpha-mediated', stimulation, of, 'CYP7A1', 'transcription,', whereas, other, species, do, not, respond, to, cholesterol, and, develop, hypercholesterolemia, on, a, diet, high, in, cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['LP', piglets, showed, significantly, lower, body, weight, and, liver, weight, at, 'weaning,']), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, decreased, liver, and, serum, cholesterol, content])].

[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, chronic, cholesterol, feeding, '(', 0.2, '%', or, 1.25, '%', 'w/w', cholesterol, for, 12, 'weeks)', in, 'FVB/NJ', mice, results, in, a, &, 'gt;60%', suppression, of, hepatic, 'CYP7A1', expression]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, a, &, 'gt;2-fold', increase, in, hepatic, cholesterol, content])].

[sujeto(['Chronic', cholesterol, feeding, also, results, in, activation, of, the, mitogen]), verbo([activated]), complemento([protein, '(', 'MAP)', 'kinases,', 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', and, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'ERK)'])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, chronic, 'high-cholesterol', feeding]), verbo([suppresses]), complemento(['CYP7A1', expression, in, mice])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, chronic, cholesterol, feeding]), verbo([induces]), complemento([inflammatory, cytokine, activation, and, liver, 'damage,', which, leads, to, suppression, of, 'CYP7A1', via, activation, of, 'JNK', and, 'ERK', signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['In', 'general,', a, diet, containing, 1, '%', cholesterol, for, rats, whereas, a, diet, containing, 0.1, '%', cholesterol, for, hamsters, is, used, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([the, hypercholesterolemia])].
[sujeto(['We', investigated, interaction, of, higher, cholesterol, diets, with, 3, -, 'hydroxy-3-methylglutary-CoA', '(', 'HMG-CoA)', 'reductase,', 'low-density', lipoprotein, receptor, '(', 'LDL-R)', and, 'cholesterol-7alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1),', sterol, regulatory, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['protein-2', '(', 'SREBP-2),', and, liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR-alpha)'])].
[sujeto(['In', view, that, hamsters]), verbo([synthesize]), complemento([and, excrete, cholesterol, and, bile, acids, in, a, manner, similar, to, that, in, 'humans,', it, is, concluded, that, hamsters, but, not, rats, shall, be, chosen, as, a, model, to, study, efficacy, of, 'cholesterol-lowering', functional, foods])].
[sujeto(['Regular', exercise]), verbo([prevents]), complemento([and, regresses, atherosclerosis, by, improving, lipid, metabolism, and, antioxidant, defenses])].
[sujeto(['In', this, study, we, analyzed, the, role, of, aerobic, exercise, on, the, in, vivo, 'RCT', and, expression, of, genes, and, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, lipid, flux, and, inflammation, in, peritoneal, 'macrophages,', aortic, arch, and, liver, from, wild, type, mice])].
[sujeto(['(', 14, ')', 'C-cholesterol', efflux]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, apo, 'A-I', and, 'HDL2', and, the, uptake, of, '(', 3, ')', 'H-cholesteryl', oleoyl, ether, '(', '(', 3, ')', 'H-COE)-acetylated-LDL', were, determined, in, macrophages, isolated, from, sedentary, and, trained, animals, 48, h, after, the, last, exercise, session])].
[sujeto(['No', difference, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, '(', 3, ')', 'H-cholesterol', excreted, in, feces, between, trained, and, sedentary, mice])].

[sujeto(['Macrophage', and, aortic, expression, of, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, lipid, efflux, was, not, systematically, changed, by, physical, exercise])].
[sujeto(['Bile', acid, synthesis, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, nuclear, receptors, including, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', and, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP),', and, by, fibroblast, growth, factor, 15, /, 19, '(', 'FGF15/19)'])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, hepatic, cysteine, sulfinic, acid, decarboxylase, '(', 'CSAD)', '(', a, key, enzyme, in, taurine, 'synthesis)', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, bile, acids, '(', 'BA)'])].
[sujeto(['Mice', supplemented, with, dietary, cholate, exhibited, reduced, hepatic, 'CSAD', mRNA, while, those, receiving, cholestyramine, exhibited]), verbo([increased]), complemento([mRNA])].

[sujeto(['Hepatic', hypotaurine, concentration, '(', the, product, of, 'CSAD)', was, higher, in, 'Shp-/-', mice, with, a, corresponding]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, serum, taurine, conjugated, 'BA'])].
[sujeto(['FGF19', administration]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([hepatic, cholesterol, 7, -, 'α-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', mRNA, but, did, not, change, 'CSAD', mRNA, expression])].
[sujeto(['LXR', activation]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['CYP7A1', mRNA, yet, failed, to, induce, 'CSAD', mRNA, expression])].
[sujeto(['BA']), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['CSAD', mRNA, expression, in, a, feedback, fashion, via, mechanisms, involving, 'SHP', and, 'FXR', but, not, 'FGF15/19', or, 'LXR'])].
[sujeto(['Peroxisome', 'proliferator-activated', receptor, '(', 'PPAR)alpha', genes, and, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, fatty, acid, degradation, were, upregulated, by, feeding, 'RPI', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')', ',', accompanied, by, increased, promoter, binding, and, nuclear, expression, of, 'PPARalpha', and, its, heterodimerization, partner, retinoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Feeding', 'RPI', also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([hepatic, genes, involved, in, cholesterol, metabolism, and, transport])].
[sujeto(['However,', feeding, 'RPI', had, no, effect, on]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, liver, 'X-receptor', '(', 'LXR)alpha', to, the, cytochrome, 'P450', '(', 'CYP)7A1', promoter])].
[sujeto(['Increased', liver, triglyceride, 'content,', hypercholesterolemia, and, insulin, resistance, in, the, '\'', 'Western\'', 'diet-fed', rats, were, partially]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, feeding, 'RPI', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto([mRNA, and, protein, expression, of, hepatic, enzymes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, fatty, acid, synthesis, were, suppressed, by, feeding, '\'', 'Western', 'diets\'', containing, 'RPI', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')', ',', despite, a, lack, of, effects, on, nuclear, concentrations, of, sterol, regulatory, element, binding, 'protein-1c'])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, attenuation, of, metabolic, syndrome, observed, in, 'RPI-fed', rats, after, consumption, of, diets, high, in, fat, and, cholesterol, occur, as, a, result, of, improved, lipid, and, glucose, homeostasis, partly, as, a, result, of, activation, of, 'PPARs'])].
[sujeto(['AOPs', are, designed, to]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, 'clear-cut', mechanistic, representation, of, critical, toxicological, effects, that, span, over, different, layers, of, biological, organization])].
[sujeto(['Elaborate', 'AOP', frameworks]), verbo([have]), complemento([yet, been, proposed, for, 'chemical-induced', skin, 'sensitization,', 'cholestasis,', liver, fibrosis, and, liver, steatosis])].
[sujeto(['Dithiolethiones,', a, novel, class, of, adenosine, 'monophosphate-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'AMPK)', 'activators,']), verbo([prevent]), complemento([insulin, resistance, through, 'AMPK-dependent', p70, ribosomal, 'S6', 'kinase-1', '(', 'S6K1)', inhibition])].
[sujeto(['There', is, no, known, effect, of, 'S6K1', for, liver, 'X', 'receptor-alpha', '(', 'LXRalpha)-mediated', lipogenic, gene, expression, and, 'steatosis,', a]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, chronic, liver, disease])].
[sujeto(['Oltipraz']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, ability, of, 'LXRalpha', agonist, '(', 'T0901317)', to, activate, sterol, regulatory, element, binding, 'protein-1c', '(', 'SREBP-1c),', inhibiting, its, own, mRNA, and, protein, induction])].
[sujeto(['Impaired', 'SREBP-1c', activity, by, oltipraz]), verbo([caused]), complemento([inhibition, of, 'LXRalpha-induced', transcription, of, the, fatty, acid, 'synthase,', 'LXRalpha,', 'acetyl-CoA', 'carboxylase,', 'stearoyl-CoA', 'desaturase-1,', and, adenosine, 'triphosphate-binding', cassette, transporter, 'A1', genes])].
[sujeto(['S6K1', activation, antagonized, the, inhibitory, effect, of, oltipraz, on, 'SREBP-1c', 'activation,', whereas, dominant, negative, '(', 'DN)', mutant, 'S6K1', and, rapamycin]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, 'T0901317-induced', 'SREBP-1c', expression])].
[sujeto(['Oltipraz', impaired, 'LXRalpha', 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([activity, and, 'LXR', 'agonist-induced', 'CYP7A1-LXRE-luciferase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', transactivation])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', in, vitro, 'S6K1', directly]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento(['LXRalpha', at, serine, residues, for, gene, 'transactivation,', which, was, antagonized, by, its, 'DN', mutant])].
[sujeto(['S6K1', inhibition, antagonized, 'CYP7A1', induction]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([by, 'AMPK', 'inhibition,', whereas, 'AMPK', activation, abrogated, 'S6K1-dependent', 'CYP7A1', 'induction,', supporting, the, opposing, role, of, 'S6K1', and, 'AMPK', in, 'LXR', activity])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', oltipraz, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, inhibit, hepatic, triglyceride, accumulation, and, lipogenic, gene, induction, in, mice, fed, a, 'high-fat', diet])].
[sujeto(['Other', dithiolethiones, also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['SREBP-1c', induction, by, 'T0901317'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, showing, the, role, of, 'AMPK-S6K1', pathway, in, 'LXR', activity, and, 'S6K1-dependent', inhibition, of, 'LXRalpha-induced', lipogenic, gene, transactivation, by, a, novel, class, of, dithiolethiones]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, identification, of, 'S6K1', as, a, particularly, attractive, target, for, intervention, in, hepatic, steatosis])].
[sujeto(['Maintenance', of, normal, lipid, levels]), verbo([has]), complemento([implicated, the, involvement, of, genes, induced, by, liver, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'LXRalpha)', and, 'Farnesoid', 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)'])].
[sujeto([1, ')', and, 'dose-dependent']), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, concentration, of, hepatic, 'TC', and, 'TG'])].
[sujeto(['Express-level', analysis, indicated, that, both, 'LXRalpha']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, including, 'ABCA1,', 'ABCG5,', 'ABCG8', and, 'FXR', target, genes, including, 'ApoCII', and, 'SHP', were, significantly, induced, by, 'NE3', '(', 'P&lt;0'])].
[sujeto([1, ')', ',', accompanied, with, the, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([expression, levels, of, 'CYP7A1,', 'ApoCIII', and, 'SREBP1c', genes, '(', 'P&lt;0'])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, these, 'results,', it, can, be, concluded, that, 'NE3', as, a, dual, 'FXR/LXRalpha', agonist, largely]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, accumulation, of, abnormal, lipid, in, the, hyperlipidemic, rats])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR)', 'LXRalpha', and, 'LXRbeta', are, differentially, expressed, 'ligand-activated', transcription, factors, that, induce, genes, controlling, cholesterol, homeostasis, and, lipogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Synthetic', ligands, for, both, receptor, subtypes]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['ATP', binding, cassette, transporter, 'A1', '(', 'ABCA1)-mediated', cholesterol, 'metabolism,', increase, reverse, cholesterol, 'transport,', and, provide, atheroprotection, in, mice])].
[sujeto(['However,', these, ligands, may, also]), verbo([increase]), complemento([hepatic, triglyceride, '(', 'TG)', synthesis, via, a, sterol, response, element, binding, protein, 1, c, '(', 'SREBP-1c)-dependent', mechanism, through, a, process, reportedly, regulated, by, 'LXRalpha'])].
[sujeto(['We', studied, 'pan-LXRalpha/beta', agonists, in, 'LXRalpha', knockout, mice, to, assess, the, contribution, of, 'LXRbeta', to, the, regulation, of, selected]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes])].
[sujeto(['High-density', lipoprotein, '(', 'HDL)', cholesterol]), verbo([increased]), complemento([without, significant, changes, in, plasma, 'TG', or, very, low, density, lipoprotein])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', hepatic, 'CYP7A1', and, several, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, fatty, 'acid/TG', biosynthesis, were, not, induced])].
[sujeto(['In', peripheral, tissues, from, these, 'LXRalpha-null', 'mice,', 'LXRbeta', activation]), verbo([increases]), complemento(['ABCA1', and, 'SREBP-1c', gene, expression, in, a, parallel, manner])].
[sujeto(['However,', putative, elevation, of, 'SREBP-1c', activity, in, these, tissues, did, not]), verbo([cause]), complemento([hypertriglyceridemia])].
[sujeto(['In', 'summary,', selective, 'LXRbeta', activation, is, expected, to]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento(['ABCA1', gene, expression, in, 'macrophages,', contribute, to, favorable, 'HDL', 'increases,', but, circumvent, hepatic, 'LXRalpha-dominated', lipogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Liver', 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXR)', alpha, and, beta, play, an, important, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, expression, of, genes, involved, in, hepatic, bile, and, fatty, acid, 'synthesis,', glucose, 'metabolism,', as, well, as, sterol, efflux])].
[sujeto(['Studies', with, human, embryonic, kidney, 293, cells, indicate, that, unsaturated, fatty, acids, interfere, with, oxysterols]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'LXR', and, antagonize, 'oxysterol-induced', 'LXRalpha', activity])].
[sujeto(['The', 'LXR', 'agonist,', 'T1317,']), verbo([induced]), complemento([mRNAs, encoding, sterol, regulatory, 'element-binding', protein, 1, c, '(', 'SREBP-1c)', and, two, 'SREBP-1c-regulated', lipogenic, 'genes,', e])].

[sujeto(['The', 'cis-regulatory', elements]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([by, 'T1317', were, not, required, for, 'fatty-acid', suppression, of, 'FAS', or, 'S14', promoter, activity])].
[sujeto(['These', two, genes]), verbo([require]), complemento(['LXR', but, not, 'SREBP-1c', for, their, expression])].
[sujeto(['Feeding', rats, a, diet, supplemented, with, fish, oil]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([hepatic, 'SREBP-1c-regulated', genes, and, induced, 'PPARalpha-regulated', genes, but, had, no, effect, on, the, 'LXR-regulated', 'transcripts,', 'CYP7A1,', 'ABCG5,', or, 'ABCG8'])].
[sujeto(['Transfection', 'studies,', using, either, 'full-length', hLXRalpha, or, a, chimera, containing, only, the, 'LXRalpha', ligand]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['domain,', indicate, that, a, wide, array, of, unsaturated, fatty, acids, had, little, effect, on, 'LXRalpha', activity, in, primary, hepatocytes, or, 'FTO-2B'])].
[sujeto(['These', studies]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'LXRalpha', is, not, a, target, for, unsaturated, fatty, acid, regulation, in, primary, rat, hepatocytes, or, in, liver])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'oxysterol/LXR-mediated', regulation, of, transcripts]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, bile, acid, synthesis, or, sterol, efflux, appear, insensitive, to, dietary, unsaturated, fatty, acids])].
[sujeto(['The', unsaturated, fatty, acid, suppression, of, 'SREBP-1', and, its]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([lipogenic, genes, is, independent, of, 'LXRalpha', 'The', mechanisms, involved, in, spironolactone, '(', 'SL,', 200, 'micromol/kg', body, 'weight,', 3, days, i])].
[sujeto([')', -]), verbo([induced]), complemento([choleresis, were, explored, in, vivo, by, evaluating, bile, salt, export, pump, '(', 'Bsep)-,', multidrug, 'resistance-associated', protein, 2, '(', 'Mrp2)-,', and, anion, exchanger, 2, '(', 'AE2)-mediated', secretory, processes, in, rat, liver])].
[sujeto(['Total', bile, flow, was, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, 'SL,', primarily, due, to, an, increase, in, bile, 'salt-independent', bile, 'flow,', whereas, bile, salt, secretion, was, decreased])].
[sujeto(['SL']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, de, novo, bile, salt, synthesis, rate, in, concordance, with, impaired, microsomal, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', 'activity,', thus, leading, to, a, decrease, in, endogenous, bile, salt, pool, size])].

[sujeto(['Deoxycholic', acid, '(', 'DCA)', is, a, known, 'hepatotoxicant,', a, tissue, tumor, 'promoter,', and]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, colorectal, cancer])].

[sujeto(['Two', compound, mutations, were, 'identified:', 'TAC', -, -, &, 'gt;', 'AA', at, codons, 436, -, 438, on, exon, 6, ',']), verbo([causing]), complemento([the, amino, acid, missense, mutation, 'Y329K/418X;', and, deletion, of, the, 9, -, bp, sequence, 'GACTCTTTC', at, codons, 487, -, 489, on, exon, 8, ',', causing, deletion, of, three, amino, acids, '(', 'Asp-Ser-Phe)'])].
[sujeto(['Multiple', origins, of, this, compound]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, 'identified,', with, cholesterol, being, the, presumed, precursor])].
[sujeto(['Although', routes, for, formation, of, the, 7, -, keto, compound, from, cholesterol]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, 'established,', we, found, that, 7, -, dehydrocholesterol, '(', the, immediate, precursor, of, 'cholesterol)', is, oxidized, by, 'P450', 7, 'A1', to, 7, -, ketocholesterol, '(', 'k(cat)/K(m)', =, 3, ×, 10, '(', 4, ')', 'm(-1)', 's(-1))'])].
[sujeto(['The', oxidation, of, 7, -, dehydrocholesterol, occured, with, predominant, formation, of, 7, -, ketocholesterol, and, with, the, 7, 'α,8α-epoxide', as, only, a, minor, 'product;', the]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([epoxide, was, stable, in, the, presence, of, 'P450', 7, 'A1'])].

[sujeto(['Mutations', within, the, gene, encoding, 7, -, dehydrocholesterol, 'reductase,', the, last, enzyme, in, the, 'pathway,']), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, the, accumulation, of, 7, -, dehydrocholesterol, in, tissues, and, fluids, of, 'SLOS', patients])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 7, -, ketocholesterol, levels, may, also, be, elevated, in, 'SLOS', tissue, and, fluids, as, a, result, of, 'P450', 7, 'A1', oxidation, of, 7, -, dehydrocholesterol])].
[sujeto(['Cholestasis']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, liver, cell, 'death,', 'fibrosis,', 'cirrhosis,', and, eventually, liver, failure])].
[sujeto(['Retinoic', acid, '(', 'RA)', is, a, ligand, for]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, that, modulate, bile, salt, homeostasis])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, a, protocol, of, differentiation, of, human, embryonic, stem, cells, '(', 'ES)', towards, 'hepatocyte-like', cells, '(', 'ES-Hep)'])].

[sujeto(['Cytochrome', 'P450', '(', 'P450)', 7, 'A1', is, well, known, as, the, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase,', the, first, enzyme]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, bile, acid, synthesis, from, cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['The', human, enzyme]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, have, the, highest, catalytic, activity, of, any, mammalian, 'P450'])].
[sujeto(['Analyses', of, individual, steps, of, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylation', reaction, revealed, several, characteristics, of, this, 'reaction:', '(', 'i)', 'two-step']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, cholesterol, to, ferric, 'P450,', with, an, apparent, 'K(d)', of, 0.51, 'μM,', '(', 'ii)', a, rapid, reduction, rate, in, the, presence, of, cholesterol, '(', '∼10', 's(-1)', for, the, fast, 'phase),', '(', 'iii)', rapid, formation, of, a, ferrous, 'P450-cholesterol-O(2)', complex, '(', 29, 's(-1)),', '(', 'iv)', the, lack, of, a, 'non-competitive', kinetic, deuterium, isotope, 'effect,', '(', 'v)', the, lack, of, a, kinetic, 'burst,', and, '(', 'vi)', the, lack, of, a, deuterium, isotope, effect, when, the, reaction, was, initiated, with, the, ferrous, 'P450-cholesterol', complex])].
[sujeto(['This', is, a, different, phenomenon, compared, with, other, 'P450s', that]), verbo([have]), complemento([much, lower, rates, of, 'catalysis,', attributed, to, the, much, more, efficient, substrate, oxidation, steps, in, this, reaction])].
[sujeto(['Over', the, past, two, 'decades,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([become, increasingly, clear, that, the, 'intestine,', in, addition, to, the, 'liver,', plays, an, important, role, in, the, metabolism, of, xenobiotics])].

[sujeto(['Results', indicate, that, mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, remarkable, ability, to, maintain, liver, 'BA', concentrations])].
